reviews.title: El Bells dive.
reviews.text: Fabulous dive at El Bells with a very sobering wall of “heroes”. Don’t stay for long, just come in to dive or snorkel. We didn’t dive the Blue Hole for clarity, few people do, but El Bells which exits via the Blue Hole is utterly spectacular. Only really recommended to advanced divers with a fair few dives under their belt as the head down descent is challenging.

reviews.title: Terrible place-  do not visit
reviews.text:
Unless you wanna spent 50 USD per person (or more) and be ripped off to see a half destroyed coral littered with rubbish and horrible cafes. Coming in your own taxi to avoid a trip will also land you similar extra fees and all this rubbish. 
Do not visit.  Tourist trap with scammy nonsenses.  Never again.  Sort it out Eypgt 

This place should be protected. It will be gone in 5/10 years 

Get tae

reviews.title: Dive
reviews.text: Excellent dive. very nice place. start going down from the canyon. reach the arch at -26m, then get -30m at Pachyseris spot, follow the current until blue hole. Gorgeous

reviews.title: Spectacular snorkeling with great visibility for walls of coral
reviews.text: Spectacular snorkeling! A lot of hard coral and whole schools of colorful fish, many small "giant clams" showing their curvy phosphorescent mouths. Incredible visibility (in Dec.), huge variety. Delightful. I will say there's probably a better way than to pay a fair amount per person to get up their from Dahab . . .  especially since they often want to charge you extra for a wet suit (needed, just a shorts one), but they do provide snorkel mask and pipe. Some guides take you to better restaurants than others, as well. But the good news is no one's in a hurry. I actually spent close to 3 hours in the water since we had a private driver.

reviews.title: The dive site is incredible, but the experience is a mess
reviews.text: The world-famous dive site has transformed to a tourist trap and a complete noisy, dirty mess. You get charged just to enter but it's a mystery where all these tourist $ go, the site is overcrowded by 'snorkelers' who arrive in tourist buses and most of them can't even swim. They kick around in their floats and then crowd around dirty 'cafes' alongside the site. It was really horrible. if you are a diver, ask your dive club to take you early in the morning.

reviews.title: Bucket List Dive
reviews.text:
We chose to do a day of diving in Dahab while staying in Sharm el Sheikh.  It is not a long drive and we went with a local dive concern.

This was a bucket list dive for me and I was not disappointed.  We dove a route from El Bells to the Blue Hole and got to see the incredible wall between the two sites before entering in to the Blue Hole.  Access to the entry point at El Bells can be daunting if you are not physically strong or have week ankles as you need to get your kit up an incline and across uneven ground to get to the entry point. But don't worry about this as the dive concerns will arrange to get your kit there if it is an issue for you.

The entry to El Bells is awesome as it is like descending down an elevator shaft that is open towards the sea. The sea life is incredible, from the time you get in to the water until you climb out - it is teaming. You probably wont see much large sea life due to the fact that the locals are allowed to fish there, but the corals are alive with the smaller and medium fish.

I did not find this a difficult dive but it does start off deep (33m) before you head off along the wall; so I would imagine that you can only do this dive as an advanced diver.

Besides the diving there is an opportunity to see how the Bedouins live as there are bedoin cafes and homes right there.

reviews.title: Snorkeling, Scuba Diving
reviews.text: Blue Hole is a perfect for Snorkeling and Scuba diving. Lots of different species of fish and corals.  You can combine diving or snorkeling in Canyon.

reviews.title: Moral dilemma
reviews.text:
Would give the reef itself 5 stars, fantastic visibility and so many beautiful species to see. Low rating given based on the “tour” experience and the use of child labour(?).

The tour itself was enjoyable but quite rushed and disorganised. Once in the water we had a great time but unfortunately the beaches were covered in litter.

It’s great that eco-tourism is bringing work and money into the area but without sustainable practice this won’t be a reliable industry for future generations.

I was also shocked to see so many children working - we were driven around by a boy that we were told was 10 years old (he was likely closer to 8 years of age). This left us with a lot of questions …….

reviews.title: Catch it before it's gone...
reviews.text:
Whilst this is an exceptional and unusual reef, it is in great danger of being wrecked. Hundreds of snokellers, some of whom can hardly swim, are let loose of the reef everyday, slowly but surely causing damage. Amazingly it is still in pretty good shape at the moment, but I worry for the future. 
There is now a $10 fee to visit - I'm not sure where that money is going, but it should be spent on looking at ways to educate visitors and so preserve the reef for the future. Fingers crossed....

reviews.title: Best snorkeling in the area
reviews.text: The best snorkeling in the area! Amazing fish but must start snorkeling early before the crowds arrive

description: The Penguin dive centre is located yards from the water's edge on the seafront on the Mashraba reef and the vibe is very friendly, fresh, relaxing and positive. This is life in the slow lane – the most effort required is putting your kit in the back of the truck or putting it on before falling in the water. Our confined and open water areas are only 10 minutes from the centre. Our facilities include Penguin Hotel, restaurant, an air-conditioned classroom, TV/DVD, White Screen and its mini-library with all the DVD and CD-ROM PADI materials. We also have a screened changing area, shower rooms, fresh water rinse tanks, secure kit storage, open-air lounge. our smaller size groups & courses create an intimate and sociable atmosphere between guides, guests and crews. Our multi-national staff speak a range of languages and guests from many different countries will find all their needs catered for, both above and below the water.

reviews.title: I am so pleased I dived with these guys and I would recommend them to anybody.
reviews.text: Me and my son have just completed our Open Water and Advanced PADI courses here. I was absolutely delighted with Penguin Divers. We have had an amazing experience. Ahmed was a fantastic instructor, patient and professional, his instruction was excellent. We've had a lot of fun and visited some incredible dive sites but his attention to detail and to safety was never compromised. The equipment, the location and the facilities are all of a very high standard and the staff are all very friendly. I am so pleased I dived with these guys and I would recommend them to anybody...Thanks again Ahmed and team.

Guests can decide to visit the monastery and hike to the summit to see the sunrise or sunset.

reviews.title: Best historical tourguide in sinai
reviews.text:
I went to Serabit el Khadim. It was beyond my expectations. I came to this trip because I watched the Youtube channel Dahab Live, about the exploration of this site. As I am n archeologist, this place got my attention. 

I booked the owner Joseph as my private guide and we spend 5 nights in the Sinai Desert, He showed me several places of interest and has a phenomonal knowledge of these unknown historical places.

reviews.title: I love Sinai Desert
reviews.text:
I went to do the normal St Catherine trip already, Then I met Joseph and he suggested doing a 2 day trip to Sunset in the Moses Mountain, Sunrise on Gebl Katrin,  which with 2642 meters is the highest mountain in Egypt. 

It was fantastic! I am so in love with the Desert now.  I can recommend this trip for all hikers! 

Thank you Joseph, and thanks for recommending Dahab Live and the nice book about the Sinai Desert. Looking forward to seeing you again for my next trip!

reviews.title: Beautiful  Sunrise
reviews.text:
I went on the first of January to see the sunrise and it was beautiful!
It was very busy but luckily we had a very nice local guide and a good group. It was also colder than i expected but on the top of the mountain, you can rent a blanket to keep warm.

reviews.title: Interesting
reviews.text: I am not religious at all, but my mum really wanted to do this trip. So I used it to try to make some nice pictures with my new camera.  It was actually more interesting than I thought!   The Monastery is sat on a mountain hill and it's easy to imagine how life would have been in the 6th Century when it was built.  Unfortunately there was no time for me to climb to the top of the mountain, but I  think this was really good value for money/

reviews.title: amazing experience
reviews.text: dress warm for the top. Gloves are key. There are cafes along the way up the mountain so you can stop and get a coffee. Bring small bills.

reviews.title: Private desert tour/hikeNov 17, 2018--EXCEPTIONAL EXPERIENCE!
reviews.text:
TRIP #1By email with Joseph Nazir & Annet, set up a private 4WD tour with Bedouin guides to St. Catherine's Monastery, then 4WD trip in desert with hike, cooked lunch on desert.
Cost was $400 US for 2 people all day, but worth it.  We were picked up about 8, driven to St. Catherine's for 1 1/2 hrs, then off road in the desert & mountains.  Stopped in beautiful place, one guide took us on a hike (we are experienced hikers, but were only promised a short hike)--But our guide was  willing, we hiked for 3 hours, to the top of a ridge with beautiful views north and south.  When we returned, the other guide had prepared a meal, hummus,pita bread, nice salad, 1/4 of a chicken for each of us roasted over a fire he had built.   Great food, great experience with Bedouin guides talking about their lifestyle & culture (parents/grandparents nomadic life in this area, now most live in towns, etc.)

description: PADI 5 star instructor development center. This story started when 4 water lovers and marine life enthusiasts came together: a geological scientist, a sea captain, an actor and a diving instructor. Our love of the vast blue waters and marine life made our paths cross. The passion, goal and vision to preserve this planet drove us to start our own diving center and school to spread awareness and share our love and knowledge of diving and marine life with everyone. Our dive center is a unique venue that aims at sharing this passion for diving, learning and keeping our planet sustainable for generations to come. This is why we offer training courses in the field of marine biology, environmental studies and research to ensure and follow up nature's wellness periodically. If you plan on visiting Dahab soon, we would love to meet you and share our excitement for the big blue world.

reviews.title: Thank you, SlyDive!
reviews.text:
SlyDive was quite simply fantastic. The dive guides and instructors were preffesional, personal and fun, not only on the dive but between dives and while learning. 
In many other dive shops, the instructors and dive masters disappear as soon a dive is finished or during surface intervals... Not at SlyDive. You are really made to feel like part of the family and as a result are very comfortable asking questions which in turn makes for more enjoyable diving experience.
On a separate note, the equipment is all top notch and everyone from the dive guides to the drivers are friendly and welcoming. 
If you want a good stay in Dahab, dive with SlyDive.

reviews.title: Next Level Diving Experience
reviews.text:
SlyDive made my diving and overall experience in Dahab absolutely amazing. I could tell from my early interactions with Karim that SlyDive provides professional, friendly service and helps ensure your experience will be what you are looking for. I wanted to complete my advanced open water but was quite apprehensive due to a bad diving experience and my problematic ears. With the encouragement and expertise of Karim and my instructor Anwar, I was able to achieve my goal and complete the course as well as many OUTSTANDING dives! I learned so much, had a blast, and felt fully taken care of the entire time! The last day of the course was on my birthday and Karim arranged a delicious cake to share that evening! So kind and much appreciated. 

The entire team at SlyDive (drivers, equipment assistants, dive masters, everyone) is awesome, the gear is high quality and the restaurants between dives are really delicious! (Bedouin Kofta sandwich at Canyon restaurant, Bells to Blue Hole dive,) was epic).

A final 'thank you' to my wonderful dive instructor Anwar, who is an exceptional teacher and person. He is so knowledgeable, patient, funny, and supportive. I cannot thank him enough for my experience and the confidence I now have for my upcoming dives. 

Next level, don't miss out! :)

reviews.title: Great diving school
reviews.text: I joined SlyDive for 3 dives. The owner and the staff were very helpful and professionell. They also offer a pickup service from the hotel/hostel and the atmosphere at the school is very nice. Also I was very free in choosing my dives and the communication via WhatsApp was uncomplicated.

reviews.title: 100% Recommend
reviews.text:
The team over at SlyDive were super warm, accommodating and extremely friendly. Walking in to the center and you're greeted like old friends, making you feel instantly comfortable and a little less anxious. 

I went in for a Discover dive. The sign up process was super simple and quite quick. I appreciated the care and attention given. Vincent, the instructor, took the time to run through the medical form and address any questions and concerns I had. He provided a little mini briefing session the day before the dive to help prepare and set my expectations. 

The day of the dive was also quick and effortless. Everything was ready to go when I arrived. I put the suit on and got in the water in less than 10 mins. I was a little stressed at first and was unsure but Vincent was very patient and took the time to understand my needs, staying close by and listening to my concerns. It wasn't long before I was able to relax and feel confident with all the gear, he was not overbearing and allowed me to explore and get one with the sea, staying close by. I felt extremely safe. 

The dive itself was magical. I was mesmerized by all the fish and corals. Kudos to Vincent for also taking time to point out the life in the water. I would've surely missed the coolest creatures without him! This is my second time doing this type of dive. My first experience was quite traumatizing and I wanted to get over my fears. The team and Vincent did a great job! I can confidently say that I will be back for that certification.

reviews.title: Top Class
reviews.text:
Absolutely top class dive centre. Karim and the SlyDive team are so accommodating, they have great equipment, we felt completely safe and importantly we enjoyed every minute of it. Anwar our instructor was amazing and fun to work with - we completed our Advanced Open Water with him and spent the majority of the time in fits of laughter. We completed our Enriched Air qualification with Karim and he helped us organise all our adventure dives that we had planned. I can't speak highly enough of our experience.

Karim, Anwar and the rest of the SlyDive team - I wish you all the best, and I hope I will be back again soon!

reviews.title: Glorious Diving, Glamorous Dive Team
reviews.text:
These guys are absolutely fantastic. Dive sites are glorious and the guides know them like the back of their hand - seeking out and finding hidden wildlife and having a great time on the surface too. We did an Advanced Open Water with Anwar ( brilliant bloke, exceptional diver, very patient and very funny!). We mentioned that we were interested in diving the Thistlegorm, and so at very short notice, Karim fit in a late night Nitrox course for us in the classroom to give us more flexibility. We spent time with them all socially, and I would definitely return to the centre to learn, to explore or just have a great time. 
Ps. Thank you again Anwar, my partner loves her Galabeya and we both wear them nightly! 
Let Elliot or I know if either of you are ever in London.
Best,
Jamie D

reviews.title: Amazing experience
reviews.text:
If you are considering diving while in Dahab don’t look any further. The team at SlyDive will make your experience unforgettable. 
I recently completed my Padi Open Water with SlyDive. Nothing but praises for these guys!!!
Professional, accommodating and friendly.
Thank you for everything 🙏🏽

reviews.title: I loved it
reviews.text: Some of the best diving I've gone on, not only because of what I've seen but also because of how sweet and kind everyone is at the dive center.

reviews.title: Fabulous dive center and awesome team!
reviews.text: Fantastic dive operation. SlyDive Dahab is well run, has excellent instructors that really makes you feel at ease and comfortable. The location is easy to find, the dive center is well equipped and in excellent condition, made me feel extra safe. We had everything at our disposal. The dive site at Dahab are wonderful to dive and explore. The team went above and beyond, they arranged a Bedouin dinner, private (just a few divers) by moonlight which was an absolute treat. A massive shout out to our DM and my Advanced instructor Houssam. You rock! Loved our trip to Dahab and will definitely be back to dive with Karim and his team. SlyDive is an absolute recommended dive center in Dahab. If I could give 6 stars I would 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟

reviews.title: Open Water Course
reviews.text:
A really chilled and really professionel place to Go and learn diving. Be and chill with the coolest people in Dahab.
We did an open water dive with Sherif, who is a really really great teacher. He explains everything really well. For the future I will do my next dives at slydive for 100%.

description: Sandana Sandboarding is Egypt's #1 sandboarding company, organizing trips in Cairo and South Sinai out of Dahab and Sharm El Sheikh in affiliation with 'Remal Adventures' and 'Sandboarding Cairo Club'. We see sandboarding as the sort of thing a great potential to grow because of the invigorating rush that comes with the slide down, the fact that it’s wild fun and all the while still safe enough for even children to enjoy. Besides sandboarding isn’t seasonal and is something that can be done all year round. If you haven't yet tried sandboarding, it's time to give it a try! It's safe and it's a whole lot of fun!

reviews.title: Cruising down the dune!
reviews.text: I had SO much fun. I also fell quite a bit in the beginning and got sand into everything - even my mouth and nose! But with a little bit of practice I got the hang of it. Ali was a great instructor and didn't try to overly guide the process, allowing us to 'go with the flow'.

reviews.title: Cool fun:)

reviews.text: Duna di sabbia bellissima e grande. Non ci ho sciato sopra ma l'ho risalita tutta e poi ridiscesa. Tappa del jeep safari al Blue Hole. Veramente suggestiva ed al tramonto con i colori del deserto è splendida. Consigliata...

reviews.title: Сендборд
reviews.text:
Скажу главное - сендборд ничуть не похож на сноуборд. Эстетического удовольствия от катания Вы, конечно, не получите, но свою дозу адреналина испытаете, да и сбросите килограмм 10-15, пока пешком будете взбираться по сыпучему песку к вершине. 
Кстати, при сьезде нужно учитывать, что доска вкапывается в песок и управлять ей (т.е. кантоваться) толком не получается. Поэтому если разогнались слишком быстро, то рассчитывайте достаточное вместо впереди для тормоза.

reviews.title: For us, the final stage of a 12 days and 190 Kms trail
reviews.text:
"Ein Kid" means "Kid's Oasis". It isn't easy to reach: from the Dahab-Sharm el Sheikh road there is a carriageway, which can be traveled only by 4 x 4 vehicles, which after about 40 minutes of not comfortable travel arrives not exactly at the oasis, but at a blind alley, from which 20 minutes more are required of strenuous walking on foot in a narrow and uneven gorge, accessible only by men and camels (and possibly donkeys). This explains why the site is particularly overlooked by lazy tourists (who are obviously the majority).
But when you arrive you are rewarded by the vision of a magical place. To the attraction that the oases of the desert exert, here are added the fantastic shapes of the rocks (mainly granite) that form the gorge, and that contrast with the "domesticated" nature of the palm groves and orchards.
This oasis was for us the point of arrival of the twelfth and last stage of the  of the "Sinai Trail"- first section: a section starting from Ras Shetan near Nuweiba. After twelve days of walking and 190 Kms, the oasis allowed us to end in style our tiring and exciting experience.

reviews.title: Urlaubstraum am Golf von Aquaba.
reviews.text: Ich war nunmehr schon zum zehnten Mal im Swiss Inn in Dahab und komme gerne wieder. Die wunderbare Gartenanlage, die Aufmerksamkeit des Personals, die Sauberkeit der Zimmer und die ausgezeichnete Küche machen diesen Aufenthalt zum Urlaubstraum. Durch die neue Führung unter Manager Hisham T. war zu den vergangenen Jahren noch eine Steigerung möglich.

reviews.title: Amazing marine life
reviews.text: The Coral and marine life is espectacular. Have in mind its the red sea, your buoyancy will vary so adjust your waits if you are planning to due scuba. Water is warm all year around, I dove with a 5.5 mm wet suit and I was very comfortable.

reviews.title: Amazing experience
reviews.text:
I went to Dahab in Sina egypt especially to have a water diving and enjoying the coral reefs. 
Very amazing experience.. recommended

reviews.title: Dahab marine life
reviews.text: Marine life and Corals are terribly destroyed compared to the 90s. Something must be done quickly.  Even fish isn’t as used to be quantity wise. Snorkelers must be put in different places away from professional divers. Finally, diving rest areas must developed to Intl. Standards to preserve habitat. Hi

reviews.title: INCREDIBLE Red Sea diving away from Sharm el Sheik
reviews.text:
You can see by my profile that while I don't dive frequently, I have dived all over the world. The Red Sea is a bucket list site for divers- not just me! We dove a handful of sites around Dahab and snorkeled in a lot of places as well and I have to say that the hype is real. 
Just thinking about it makes me emotional. Vivid, living reef, PACKED with sealife. Even the most casual snorkeling in front of our hotel revealed National Geographic level fish, morays, sea horses, stunning corals of all kinds. Watch out for those lion fish! 
Staggering, amazing, incredible- DIVES OF A LIFETIME!!!!

reviews.title: What a beautiful site
reviews.text: Visit the most beautiful dive sites ever in the whole world , solo or friends diving trips you will really enjoy it

reviews.title: Visit the coral reefs locations
reviews.text: Not every where you can swim, in some places the coral reefs are so high that prevents you from getting in the water, but the best locations from my point of view are blue hole, Abo Galoum and the best is the three pools along with the moray gardens.

reviews.title: Diving
reviews.text:
It should be saved more than this
Coral is destroyed but it's still a peace of heavens 
I loved this place

reviews.title: beautiful
reviews.text:
There are places that don't need a hundred words to sum them up. The riff is one of them. If you came to Dahab and didn't dive in Reef, you weren't in Dahab.
So take a diving mask, snorkel, put on shoes or sandals and quickly dive in the riff.

reviews.title: Beautiful 😁
reviews.text:
The coral reefs in Dahab are wonderful. The are alive and full of colors and textures. They are abundant with all sorts of life. 

The condition of the coral is relatively good - as long as it is not a beaten path. 

Eel garden is an excellent place to snorkel!!

The coral and fish were brilliant, wether you are snorkeling or diving. 

Excellent!!

reviews.title: Beautiful Coral Reefs
reviews.text: These reefs are a great reminder that we need to take care of the ocean. Remember to clean up after yourself and recycle.

description: A source of wellbeing in Dahab, at Nour Wellbeing located in Coral Coast Hotel, we have daily classes in yoga, meditation, fitness & dance with regular workshops & courses. Our International & Local therapists present various types of massage and healing treatments, to offer an all round wellbeing experience in Dahab.

offer_list.title: Dahab Yoga Holiday

reviews.title: Unfriendly business practices
reviews.text:
The class itself was great, this is a review about the business practices.

I went here for the first time and got a single class pass to try it out. Immediately after the class I went to the counter to change that to the 5-pack, and asked to count the class I just took in it (so I pay the difference and would have 4 classes left).

Pretty much every gym or yoga studio I’ve been to lets you do this. 

Instead they just insisted that I would have to buy a whole new 5-pack. Very inflexible and not friendly to new people trying it out.

Not to mention the lady at the counter was arguing with someone on the phone while attending to me.

reviews.title: Desert yoga week
reviews.text: After having enjoyed a in week in Dahab with yoga classes, snorkeling and some day trips I enrolled in a desert yoga week organised by Nour wellness /Embah travel.  One of the most special trips I have done.  They take you into the desert to such a spiritual powerful place where you can practice with sunrise and sunset.  The teacher Iliya guiding us in Yoga/Tai shi and Qi Gong was the perfect choice, to travel with.  Not to forget about Ehab who pampered us the whole time and on top of that cooked like you were in a 5 star restaurant.  I will definitely come back for more adventures.  Thanks also to Emma to make this possible.   The length of organisational skills a trip like this requires is beyond explainable to anyone.  The authenticity of it is just amazing.  Thank you!!!

reviews.title: Magical hotel
reviews.text: A magical cozy and quiet hotel, perfect for relaxation and yoga! Great staff and very helpful hotel owners. I really enjoyed it!

reviews.title: Resident Instructors
reviews.text: We are currently living in Dahab and coral coast provides for us a great space to share our whelness methods and any creative ideas that includes the community, actually it is considered the only reliable and professional space to work with in Dahab.

reviews.title: Great fitness classes
reviews.text: I attend the fitness classes, and as well as getting fit, I really enjoy them! The instructors are great and the location perfect, with classes looking out over the aqua blue sea and the mountains in the distance. The staff at Nour Wellbeing are very friendly

reviews.title: Totaly relaxed
reviews.text:
A cosy hotel with a wide range of  yoga, meditation and fitness classes to choose from. The Yoga Studio has an amazing seaview! 
I’ve spoiled myself by having different massages. Every therapist is a bliss! If you are looking for a chill and relaxing holiday I recommand Coral Coast Hotel as your perfect choise.

reviews.title: Wellness and yoga  break
reviews.text: Beautiful setting on the beach in peaceful bay. fantastic, experienced therapists and yoga teachers.  Staff are  friendly and helpful.  There’s a real ethos of care at this place.  You don’t have to stay here to take a class or book a therapy session, but why would you not  I came away feeling nourished and restored.

reviews.title: Yoga trip
reviews.text: Отличное место для практики йоги и отдыха. Классный зал. Хорошее расположение. Море, дайвинг, прогулки, свежий воздух и ветер

reviews.text:
Sehr schöne und diverse Gemälde in dieser Kunstgalerie. Der Verkäufer, was gleichzeitig der Künstler war, war sehr freundlich und authetisch. Er malt die Gemälde am Eingang seines Ladens. Der Stil der Bilder reicht von lokalen Szenerien bis hin zu "Pop-Art" (bin kein Experte). 

Preis und Qualität war sehr zufriedenstellend (nochmal, kein Experte!!).

description: Our big blue story: In 2005, a couple of passionate divers had a dream about starting a hub where fun meets education. Where learning meets excitement. Where exploring our big blue planet was the passion moving everyone involved. From that day forward, we have been the top diving center in Dahab. Making sure we purchase the best equipment for our divers and students, to hand picking the best instructors and diving professionals to join our team. All while meeting the highest standards in the industry and staying up to date on everything diving. Located in the heart of Dahab. First line on the water. We enjoy such a fun, relaxed and friendly atmosphere. Proud to be the top rated diving center in Dahab on all traveling and activities ranking platforms. Write us an email or give us a call and speak to one of our diving experts about your needs and see for yourself. Looking forward to meeting you in person very soon. Splash! Blob,blob,blob...

reviews.title: Memorable and Beautiful
reviews.text: A BIG thank you to Big Blue Dahab for a fantastic and memorable diving experience. This is the place to choose for your next diving adventure. The entire team was very friendly and professional . A special thank you to Yasser. I hadn't dove in 13 years and was extremely nervous to get back in the water. His experience and knowledge made me feel comfortable and most importantly safe. Thank you for making this day so special and thank you for your friendship. Until we meet again...Inshallah 😊

reviews.title: Fantastic Dive Centre
reviews.text: Great dive centre, good value with friendly and helpful staff. I retook my open water PADI course after a 14 year break alongside my partner who had never dived. We enjoyed our experience so much that after finishing the open water at the lighthouse reef, we booked 3 fun dives and the advanced open water course to experience some of the other Dahab dive sites. Our instructor Yasser was very experienced, knowledgeable and really helped to settle my partner's nerves during our deeper dives at the Canyon and the El Bells to the Blue Hole drift dive. He had a great eye for spotting marine life we may have otherwise missed and took lots of photos and videos on his GoPro which he shared with us before we left. Highly recommend this dive centre for anyone visiting Dahab.

reviews.title: Great experience
reviews.text: Super friendly staff and very quick to organise everything. Great instructor. The equipment is top notch. Very flexible with the times and dates.

reviews.title: BEST Diving centre in Dahab
reviews.text: I couldn't recommend this diving centre enough, they've been AMAZING! Quick response to all our questions before we signed up with them. They're flexible, honest and clear with their prices and expectations from your dives. Personally, it was my first time diving and to be honest I was very nervous about the hole thing, luckily I had THE BEST diver instructor: Yasser Mohamed, seriously I couldn't have asked for a better instructor. He has over 17 years experience, we did all the exercises until we master them, he didn't mind repeating the same thing until we did it right. He reassured me multiple times (as I was very nervous) and hold my hand on a couple of occasions to make me feel safer, which in all honesty it's what I needed to be able to relax and enjoy myself. Yasser genuinely is a nice person to be around; he loves diving, meeting new people and his enthusiasm is quite contagious. To the point where I not only finished my Open Water but went for the Advance and I'm very glad I did. Thanks to Big Blue Dahab and Yasser Mohamed for everything you have done for me; I'll never forget this experience and hopefully this won't be the last time we see each other.

reviews.title: PADI Open Water
reviews.text: It was my pleasure doing the open water course in Big Blue Dahab with Captain Yasser Mohamed. His professionalism and patience throughout the training were admirable. Even though there are many technical things you need to get through for the certification, he managed to keep it fun. He was always taking conservative measures to ensure your safety yet it never felt restrictive nor took your focus away from enjoying the beauty you get to see underwater. I really appreciated the welcoming staff, especially Mr. Mohammed, who organized the course around my tight timeframe. I highly recommend dealing with them if you consider diving at any level in Dahab.

reviews.title: Perfect find
reviews.text: Exceptional for their blend of warmth, friendliness, expertise, and professionalism. Went out of their way to help my son get the dives in he wanted before we had to fly home. We will come back again 🙏🏼

reviews.title: Best diving club
reviews.text: Best diving club, I been diving with them for 2 years, very satisfied, they are professional, highly recommended

reviews.title: Excellent diving experience!
reviews.text: After long time without diving, we (family of 3) had a reactivate dive followed by guided dive. Both were great experiences, mainly thanks to Yasser, our dive instructor who had ton of patience before the dive and underwater (and also took many photos and videos of us). Thank you so much! We will be back again.

reviews.title: Great team, great guide, will be back
reviews.text: Just back from a week of diving with the wonderful team at Big Blue, and it was really excellent. The whole staff was lovely and extremely helpful - they event helped us organize other parts of our trip not related to diving. Diving with Yasser, our guide, was an absolute pleasure. We were a group of varying skill levels and he was able to accommodate all of us on the dives with grace and a smile.  Would definitely recommend Big Blue for anyone looking to get the most out of a diving trip to Dahab.

reviews.title: Superb
reviews.text:
Bigblue dahad diving center exceeded our expectation all the staff are very professional. All our needs and requirements are given to the highest standards. Our instructor/dive guide yasser was the reason we keep coming back to dahab, he will always do a extra mile to cater to your diving trip..  as always it was superb diving experience.. 

Mike Marfil

description: Scuba Seekers Diving Centre is a recreational and technical diving facility offering all levels of diver training from entry-level up to Advanced Trimix instructor. Scuba Seekers is a PADI,TDI, GUE & IDC Dive center providing the very best in training and development for all of our divers. We have developed a unique diver training philosophy that creates safe, self-aware and reliant divers. We are constantly working with our students to make them more confident divers which in turn enhances their enjoyment of the activity. Located at the bridge on the boulevard, we have our house reef Mashraba right on our front doorstep and it takes only minutes by car to get to the rest of Dahabs finest dive sites. We like to think of our dive centre as an oasis where you can relax before and after diving but also have direct access to the main hustle and bustle of Dahab. We are proud to offer only the best quality equipment and the best quality service. Looking forward to having you dive with us!

urgency_tag.tag_text: Tours from Scuba Seekers tend to sell out - travelers recommend booking in advance!

reviews.title: Dive-bee colony!
reviews.text:
It felt like bees colony where everyone knows his or her role in a well maintained and organized entity.

As an AOW, I truly believe that if a diver is unable to dive "properly", they're missing out on the experience as a whole. Diving "properly" and comfortably means that you need to have high self-awareness and focus similar to that you have when on ground. To reach this, one would need to sharpen their skills including breathing, body positioning, and many other skills.

I walked in specifically with the intention of harnessing my skills and of course, have a good time.

Scuba Seekers will surely and gladly help you do that. Simply, this is THE place to learn a "proper" diving.

reviews.title: Diving for everyone
reviews.text:
We were received with a very warm welcome and felt in good hands throughout our entire stay.
Every member of staff was friendly and helpful.
The dive centre is well organised with good equipment.
The instructors made sure that our dives were varied and showed us the best parts.
Even the cappuccino was the best in Dahab.
When we arrived home we got a message from Hend in the office to ask how our journey went which was a lovely surprise.

reviews.title: Great experience
reviews.text:
My experience at scuba seekers was very good. From the communication before arriving, the development of the open water course and the guided dives. The instructors are very kind, friendly, patient and very well trained in diving and teaching. Very attentive to the needs of each student. I felt very comfortable, learned a lot and enjoyed the experience. The facilities of the dive center are very good, they were like our home during our stay in Dahab!
Hundred percent recommendable!

*Special thanks to Khamis for his dedication and good vibes!

reviews.title: Electronic check-in
reviews.text:
Who else hates filling out all these forms when checking in at a dive center? Well, I do. I hate the liabilities, releases, etc. I hate them.
But now, Scuba Seekers have transformed and digitized all of those (Thanks to a mermaid on the team) and now the check-in process is just a breeze. It is even mobile-friendly. And you can even do it before you check in.

reviews.title: Nothing better than Scuba Seekers
reviews.text: Imagine the best scuba experience you can have. Add on it professionalism, openness, friendliness, unbelievable organisation, the best structure you can find in Egypt, open, friendly and kind communication, availability to satisfy ANY of your wishes (Leheta thank you for everything!!! - amazing dive guide in and out of water!) and the only two words you can find is Scuba Seekers. Guarantee of amazing time! Can't wait to be there again.

reviews.title: Amazing!
reviews.text:
I can't recommend Scuba Seekers enough.
Everyone was welcoming, kind and fun. 
Not to mention very professional and knowledgeable.

I did my Open Water course and had the pleasure to do it with 3 instructors. Alex, Amar and Khamis were all great.

Facilities are fantastic, kit in great shape and perfect location.

I will definitely be back!

reviews.title: Great team, great experience, great instruction
reviews.text: After two weeks of diving with Scuba Seekers I can't but recommend the center. This is one of the most thorough and professional teams that I've had the joy to dive with. We've never had a tank below 200 bars, the groups were wonderfully small, all equipment is extremely well maintained and both the guides and instructors were not only remarkably well trained but also went above and beyond to make this a great experience and help us expand our skills. Scuba Seekers offers both recreational and tech-diving but doesn't draw a line between the two. That makes every dive not just an experience but also a learning opportunity even for more seasoned recreational divers who care to learn a thing or two they haven't been taught in standardized courses. We'll definitely be back!

reviews.title: Open Water course with no previous experience
reviews.text:
I had the best experience doing my open water course at scuba seekers.
I did not have any experience diving and now i have finished my course i can say i am confident to dive within the course maximum depth, since I have learnt a lot and practiced a lot of skills.
Khamis our instructor was excellent, a very nice buddy to learn from. Very patient and nice to hang out with.

reviews.title: Revo training
reviews.text: Amazing facilities and great instructors. Great place to train from open water to technical - you will find everything you need. I did my revo rebreather course and I’m really happy I did it here.

reviews.title: A place to come back
reviews.text: We decided to do the Open Water Dive course in Dahab, looking on the internet we saw that the reviews of the school were very good, and we decided to do the course with them, the best decision! From the beginning they informed us very well, they told us how the course was going to be and they gave us a lot of facilities. We had Mohammed as our instructor, he was great! Very attentive, friendly, he explained the whole course very well, the first day he recommended us local places to eat, wonderful! I had problems with the decompression of my ears, both Mohammed and the school were very attentive. You feel like you are in family. After the course we did a fun dives with them, it was amazing. We will definitely come back!🤍

reviews.title: Great diving experience 👍

This was the first time to meet Ehab in person, and as expected he was so welcoming and honest. Moreover, this was my first time to dive with Aqua Divers, and certainly not the last, even I am thinking of continuing my diving career them.

reviews.title: Great adventure
reviews.text: Very professional, supportive and fully immerse you in the climbing experience; we fully enjoyed our half day excursion and we can’t wait to join again soon

reviews.title: Perfect for solo travellers or groups looking for some adventure and introspection
reviews.text:
Amazing experience, beautiful people! 
This is my third time joining Insight Seekers on one-day climbing excursions, and it has honestly become one of my favourite activities in Dahab. I usually travel solo, and have always felt welcomed into their community.
I think my favourite part is that they really invite you to think and reflect about your experience in the mountains and don't just approach their excursions from the physical aspect, really  focusing on the emotional and mental challenges that come with it. 
Joining Insight Seekers is now on my must-do list whenever I'm in Dahab, and I can't wait to join their longer excursions.

reviews.title: Holy
reviews.text: Joining insight seekers that was led by Belal was the highlight of my stay in Dahab. I went with nothing on mind and got out of it with the urge to be more open to love, life, nature, and to being human. It’s more than just a mountain climbing session, it is a lifetime’s experience in one day. I doubt that anyone can introduce you to nature like insight seekers do. I would definitely love to see them again when I revisit Dahab. Stay you, Belal, stay real.

reviews.title: Great climbing session, would recommend!
reviews.text:
We did a half day climbing activity in the desert canyons with Ahmed. 

We had so much fun climbing the cliffs! Ahemd was as professional and skilled as he was friendly and supportive! 

I felt safe throughout the whole session, it was very beginner-friendly but also good fun for more experienced climbers. 

The experience got me hungry for more and I wholeheartedly recommend to anyone!

reviews.title: Nature, challenge, selfexploration - 100% recommendable!
reviews.text:
Beautiful experience in the mountains of Dahab.
The one day climbing programm is designed for beginners as well as more and experienced climbers. The team is sensitive, experienced and professional and approaches climbing as a way of growing and self exploration. A communal dinner in the mountains was the perfect way to close this beautiful day. 
100% recommendable if you wanna get in touch with the nature around Dahab and challenge yourself.

reviews.title: An amazing experience
reviews.text:
Climbing was great! The team was very safety conscious. Ahmed el masry was an excellent instructor..very supportive very patient we felt extremely cared for and safe.
After climbing we talked a bit about the mental benefits and challenges..that was really deep!
 A great time and will definitely do it again with my kids.

reviews.title: Great
reviews.text:
It was the best time of my whole trip 
Thank you for this great experience it was the time of my life 
Thank you guys for the great effort

reviews.title: Life changing experience
reviews.text: Amazing experience, humble, organized and professional seekers , they helped me though out the process leaning me how to conquer my fears and learn from nature , thank you guys

reviews.title: Perfect climbing afternoon
reviews.text:
The afternoon climbing with Belal and Insight seekers was perfect!! It was the perfect blend of epic, fun and peace. 
Belal is an amazing guide teacher, and you feel completely at ease with him and his team challenging yourself to scale up amazingly beautiful mountains. 
I would love to go climbing with them again and couldn’t recommend the trip more!

reviews.title: Magical
reviews.text:
It's not my first exp with Insights seekers... but this 3 days hiking across the desert and the mountains of Sinai for the New Year is.... there is no words to describe it !!!

You need to live it ! Stunning sceneries,  amazing bedouin's guides,  and the food they cook, the night in an oasis and then in the desert. Climbing the mountain at 4am to arrive on the top and watch the 1st sunrise of the year.  The symbolic is so powerful. 

And the cherry on the top... Belal's stories about his own journey,  why this trip.  This humility and this generosity to share with us all this.  We had very nice talk,  laugh,  moments of silence and reflection...
Sharing our different philosophies of life,  spiritualities... I absolutely loved this. 

I think I will book now the one for next year 🤗

reviews.title: An experience Ill never forget
reviews.text:
I dived with Bedouin divers for a month and it was one of the best diving experiences I have experienced in a while. The entire team is professional, experienced and go out of their way to give you the best time. I did many dives and hardly dived the same location twice which allowed me to experience all of what Dahab has to offer. And it has a lot and still more I need to explore. There are a variety of dives from walls, caves, reefs, drift, blue holes and more and each one was a dive to remember.

I especially felt like Bedouin was a second home as everyone treated you as a friend. I would definitely dive there again. A special shout out to Ahmed, Soliman, and Rabea who made this experience one to remember.

reviews.title: My diving Family
reviews.text: One of the best decision I have taken is to chose Bedouin divers dahab for taking my diving course open water and advanced, i got certified. Not that only I now have a family there and definetly will come back to my new addiction. Thank you for making it an unforgettavle experience and always helping in removing all obstacles. If you want to be diver I strongly recommend Bedouin divers. Looking forward for my next tripp

reviews.title: The best!
reviews.text:
I can’t recommend The Bedouin divers team enough!!!!!!
Starting my diving journey has been on my to do list for years and there couldn’t have been a better place to start.
The whole team at Bedouin divers are so professional, kind, genuine and so much fun!
Ahmed is a fantastic instructor who’s very thorough on safety and looking after all his divers, while having the most possible fun!
You don’t leave Bedouin divers with just diving skills you leave with a whole diving family! Have already planned my next trip back ☺️ recommend The Bedouin divers team enough.
Starting my diving journey has been on my to do list for years and there couldn’t have been a better place to start the adventure.
The whole team at Bedouin divers are so professional, kind, genuine and so much fun!
Ahmed is a fantastic instructor who’s very thorough on safety and looking after all his divers, while having the most possible fun!
You don’t leave Bedouin divers with just diving skills you leave with a whole diving family!
Have already planned my next trip back to continue diving with the team ☺️
I cannot recommend them highly enough in every regard, I can never ever imagine anyone being disappointed.

reviews.title: Nice dive center
reviews.text: One of the most professionals dive centers in Dahab, the staff, instructors, dive masters and guides are very nice people, cooperative and honest

reviews.title: Amazing experience
reviews.text:
The dive center is truly amazing. Ahmed has been very professional and a perfect teacher. I spent really good time with the center, both in the water and outside. Bedouin divers is a great family. I hope to come back soon.

p.s. Marcello and Amy best assistants ever!

reviews.title: Just great
reviews.text: Great school and dive center. 20 years on the market speaks for itself. Cross of chilled, relaxed, and friendly atmosphere with very experienced instructors and professional approach. If you look for cutting corners or other crazy sh*t, look elsewhere. If you want to learn, or just dive, this is the best place for it.

reviews.title: Alhamdulillah, I found the best dive school in Dahab!
reviews.text:
After arriving in the city and walking around a few other dive schools in the lighthouse/eel garden area a friend suggested that I came over to Mashraba to meet Ahmed and the team. I am SO very lucky I listened to them and ended up finding a place I can only call a second home here in Dahab!

Ahmed, Soliman and the rest of the team at Bedouin divers are some of the most friendly and professional members of the dive community I have ever encountered. After diving with many dive schools across Asia, I can honestly say that the team at Bedouin have a managed to find a perfect balance of professionalism and organization mixed a laid back and very friendly atmosphere - you usually find one or the other but these guys have NAILED it. 

I was slightly unconfident when diving in the Red Sea for the first time (my first shore dive) but all of the dive guides were so gentle, informative and patient. I have been lucky enough to dive with Ahmed, Soliman, Rabea, Ata and Molo and it's safe to say that they know each and every dive site like the back of their hand. It's so important for me as a diver to find a school that uses local, knowledgeable guides who really care about the corals and marine life, you can sense all of their passion and love for the Red Sea on every single dive. 

I'd also like to draw attention to the dive community that Bedouin attracts in general. Ahmed and the team have managed to build up a great community through both returning and new divers. Fantastic conversation, many laughs and great buddies on every dive. 

The team at Bedouin have transformed me from a nervous diver to someone who feels confident in the water and comfortable amongst other divers. 

Thank you for transforming me as a diver Bedouin divers and thank you to Bedouin's four legged fluff ball Sina for many warm post dive cuddles.

reviews.title: Amazing diving experience
reviews.text:
My girlfriend and I came for 1 week to Dahab planning to only do the Open Water course, but after spending the first 3 days with Ahmed and the Bedouin Divers Team, we actually decided to stay for another 2 and do the Advanced course as well.

Ahmed and the Bedouin Divers Team are professional, thorough, pay a lot of attention to their students (above and below the water), and are very fun to be around. Resulting in a couple of evenings spent together having dinner after a day of diving.

I'd definitely recommend Bedouin Divers to anyone who is looking for an instructor to start (or to continue) his/hers diving "adventures" in one of the most beautiful diving spots.

location.address: El Mashraba St Bedouin Lodge Hotel, Dahab 71 Egypt

reviews.title: Excellent dive center
reviews.text:
We spent six days diving during our recent trip to Dahab. Highly recommended! 
Dives were greatly organized, dive center is amazingly run and made perfect for divers!
What is the most important- all people working are always with a smile 😊

reviews.title: Best dive shop EVER!
reviews.text: I was impressed with everything about Liquid Adventures. Super quick and helpful with our pre arrival questions. Helpful, kind, organized and accommodating all the time once we arrived! Great dives, safely planned and executed. They made sure we were able to do all the dives we wanted with no pressure, and no hurryIng. Best dive shop EVER!

reviews.title: Excellent service
reviews.text: They were extremely well organized, and made us feel welcome. Cannot recommend this place enough. I recommend doing one of the diving and accommodation bundles

reviews.title: Excellent Dive Shop
reviews.text: I have done both my open water and advanced open water certifications with liquid adventures and both have been a fantastic experience.  Bassem is so calm and always accommodating and has great diving instructors. I have had a great experience every time.

reviews.title: Dive here! Don’t miss out!
reviews.text: All the staff at liquid adventures are soo welcoming and make you feel like family. I always feel heard, and taken care of. Every dive I have competed with them has been an amazing experience! I highly recommend! You will not forget it! I completed my Open Water and Advanced PADI diving courses with them and would suggest you do the same! I cannot wait for my next dive with liquid adventures!

reviews.title: Advanced Open Water
reviews.text: Bassem set us up with amazing dive instructors for our advanced open water diving course. They made us feel safe and were so positive, encouraging and supportive. We had amazing dives!

reviews.title: Amazing dive shop and hotel!
reviews.text: Did my open water and advanced diving course with liquid adventure in Dahab. Amazing staff, amazing service, amazing people in general! Everything so well organized from the airport to diving to back. I always have an amazing time with Liquid Adventures. I recommend this diving ship and hotel very much.

reviews.title: Love the Liquid adventures family!!
reviews.text: We love liquid! Every time we go to Dahab we dive here and stay at the Bridge. Bassem is an outstanding host and such a great person. The diving equipment is new, the dive masters are experienced and qualified and I feel safe every time I dive with them. I completed my open water and my advanced with them. The bridge is a clean, cute and friendly atmosphere. The workers are nothing but kind and remember me each time I return. Breakfast is amazing! Would highly recommend and I will be back as I always am!

reviews.title: Many great diving adventures with Liquid Adventure Dahab!
reviews.text: I had the pleasure of, not only staying in their hotel, but also completing my Open Water and Advanced Open Water courses with Liquid Adventures Dahab. All the staff was so helpful and knowledgeable about all of the equipment and all of the dive sites. Transportation was always provided to and from the center to the dive sites. I had such a great experience during my Open Water Course that I decided to extend my trip and complete the Advanced. I was also went on a number of fun dives and some boat trips while I stayed in Dahab. I can’t wait to dive again with Liquid Adventures when I return to Egypt!

reviews.title: Quiet Oasis in centre
reviews.text:
Bassem and Nadia are the perfect hosts. They will help you organise any adventures and activities whether it’s diving, camel treks, boat trips, hiking. Everything is well organised, super easy and a great price. The rooms at the bridge are beautiful. The best and nicest of all that I have stayed in my 20+ visits. 
Recommend for all

description: Lagona Divers has been offering diving activity's in Egypt since 1994. Our main goal is to deliver high quality scuba diving services. In all our scuba diving courses we aim to create reliable and competent scuba divers. Our dive center Lagona Divers South is located at the Hotel Happy Life Village, situated in a nice bay where you can enjoy scuba diving all year round protected by wind an weather. We offer all scuba diving courses from the Open Water Diver course until Divemaster. Certified Divers can enjoy guided or unguided dives at our beautiful house reef or join full or half day excursions to all dive sites around Dahab accompanied by an experience dive guide. With the safety aspect in mind, we offer Nitrox FOR-FREE to all our customers (if EANx certified). All Activities can be booked on-site or you can contact our service center in Germany where our staff is available for all your questions, bookings and suggestions concerning our dive centers.

reviews.title: Definitely enjoyed the dive side of life
reviews.text:
I've recently returned for two glorious weeks of diving with Lagona and can't recommend them highly enough. They are friendly, professional, well-equipped and extremely knowledgeable about all aspects of diving in Dahab. The Happy Life Resort that the dive centre is attached to has a gorgeous house reef which is perfect for training and fun dives. 

Whether you want to do your open water or anything right up to CCR training and technical diving, these are the people to talk to.

Some tips:
1. Book and pay for your dives in advance on their website for a discount
2. Contact them about arranging your holiday as well 
3. Make sure they take you to the Islands dive site

reviews.title: Diving with friends
reviews.text: I had a great couple of days diving with Lagona Divers. The guides were very professional and the management team were always friendly and helpful. We had some great dives at the Blue Hole and Canyon, as well as at their beautiful house reef! I will definitely be back to dive at Lagona divers!

reviews.title: Amazing experience
reviews.text: I did my very first introduction dive at Lagona Divers and was so impressed by their professionalism. My instructor Matt made me feel very comfortable in the water and made my first dive so enjoyable! I will definitely come back to Lagona Divers - next time for my Open Water course! Thanks a lot!

reviews.title: One of the best dive centers in Dahab
reviews.text:
I spent 2 weeks with TDI instructor Andreas Süess diving every day. He is one of the best instructors in Dahab. 
I  finish my drysuit speciality course and my TDI Extended Range course with Andy, then I dove 5 technical dives with him. I felt save and comfortable with Andy. Everything went great and smooth.
The center is very clean, comfortable and everything you need is available.
I recommend Lagona Divers to everyone from beginners to professionals
Thanks Andy, Kerstin, Mahmoud, Jamal and everyone in the center for help and kindness.

reviews.title: Diving with friends
reviews.text: A totally nice team that offers a great service. Great dive sites around the divergentere and a top house reef that leaves nothing to be desired, from beginners to advanced. Check in and dive with friends.

reviews.title: learned a lot!
reviews.text:
Had training dives with Kerstin to improve my technique and prepare for TEC diving.
She is a patient and highly professional instructor, the best you can find!
Then three more dives with Adam:
Canyon, drift and night dive - all three unique, I was especially fascinated by the night dive!

reviews.title: Highly recommend Lagona Divers South!!
reviews.text:
Lagona divers is one of the most professional dive center I dove with thus far. Upon our arrival, we worked with Andy and Shukri, the organization of the different daily dives, along with welcome briefing and paperwork was superb. We were a bit nervous at first due to not diving during covid years however, the staff along with the dive instructors/guides were very friendly, reassuring and fun to dive with that it created a comfortable feeling after a long break with diving. I want to thank the amazing dive guides Mohamed, Amr and Abdallah, they gave us an awesome dive experience during our visit. We are planning our next holiday dive with Lagona Divers and will definitely continue to book our diving holiday with them. 
Thank you Lagona Divers- South for providing such an amazing dive experience. ~Damaris B.

reviews.title: Great guides!
reviews.text:
This trip was organized by Travel Divers Schwarzenfeld. 

Excellent diving spot with great guides, which are always trying to give you a nice and safe diving experience.

The location itself is a little distance from Dahab city, but still reachable by taxi for around about 100 EGP.

reviews.title: Best Technical Diving Center in Dahab
reviews.text:
Lagona Divers Technical is the best technical diving facility in Dahab.The dive centre is located in Happy Life Hotel next to the shore with a beautiful house reef behind the centre.

I have stayed for 10 days and did a TDI advance nitrox and decompression procedures course with Andy in a beatuiful atmosphere and I was lucky enough to have a two fun technical dives With Kerstin to the canyons.all dives were planned and organized very well and safe, the briefing and debriefing was informative and explained in details,the equipment conditions and gas quality were perfect,the organization and logistics were excellent.Andy and Kerstin are great instructors, extremely knowledgeable with excellent diving experience. they are very friendly, helpful and passionate of what they do and helped me with my diving skills and learning.they will gladly help you with anything you need for your the trip like airport transfer and accommodation, etc...

I have no hesitation in recommending them to anyone interested in a technical or diving education or just a fun tec dives. 

Thank you Andy and Kerstin and all the amazing staff for such 10 days of diving! and can't wait see you again soon for the next adventure.

reviews.title: Technical diving in Dahab
reviews.text: I spent 2 weeks technical diving here. The facilities were well organised and modern. There are lots of different dive sites available. The dive shop team were friendly and have years of experience in the area. Happy Life Resort where they are based just outside Dahab has great food and 3 large swimming pools. Thoroughly recommended ✅

reviews.title: Great experience
reviews.text:
Great experience from start to finish.
We had a superb experience with Circle Divers in Dahab- doing padi OW and AOW certifications. The office is well set out with all equipment and a relaxed atmosphere. Whabi and Sabrina on the front desk are friendly, organised and professional. The instructors Kareem and Anwar were fantastic: patient and kind, professional and fun. The equipment was good quality and it felt very safe and enjoyable diving with them. We had a great time. Most of all the canyon and blue hole are exceptional dive sites, so enjoy!

reviews.title: Great time diving
reviews.text: Great! I did multiple dives, including Nitrox certification. Everything was perfect. I think Sabrina provides the best customer service and organization I've ever met. Karim, the dive master, is very experienced and professional. Best regards!

reviews.title: The almost amazing experience you can ever have!
reviews.text: Simply, one of the best experiences I have ever had! At first, I was terrified and didn’t know if I’d make it past two meters but with my amazing instructor, Anwar, and the amazing, cheerful and supportive team at the Circle Divers Dahab, I have conquered my fears, received my Open Water Diver’s certificate and fell in love with the sea. Amazing people, beautiful beach and an unforgettable experience!

reviews.title: An amazing place for both beginners and advanced divers.
reviews.text:
I enjoyed my very first time diving with Circle Divers.  I spend 5 days with the super talented 
instructor Natia, who made it the most wonderfull experience ever. She made every dive super fun and I felt very safe and comfortable with her as my guide. The house reef and the other local diving sites are absolutely beautiful, and I feel like I could go diving there again and again, and not get tired of exploring the amazing reefs. 

I was there with my boyfriend, who is an experienced diver, and the instructors was excellent at planning the days, so we both could be diving, even though we were at different skill levels. Everyone a Circle Divers was so nice and helpful. I can definitely recommend going in the low season, where everything feels quite chill and intimate. 

This whole experience has really sparked a new passion for diving in me, and I would definitely seek out Natia as a diving instructor again. 🧜🏼‍♀️🧜🏽‍♀️

reviews.title: A full circle of safe, fun and relax diving
reviews.text: Circle Divers are the best. They will do anything to set you in the good mood and feel safe to enjoy the beautiful sites. My buddy/instructor Natia noticed all the details for my safety and wellbeing. She is kind, fun and a true pro. The third day I dived with Mahmut who was just as attentive and reliable to get into this zone of relax and good fun. Thanks guys you are the best. The diving club is located at the end of the bay on the resort of JazDahabay: a full starr hotel on a beautifull spot. The combination is magic.

reviews.title: Safe, fun relax diving making the full circle
reviews.text: Circle Divers are just great! My instructor/ buddy Natia was so focused on my well being and kindly noticed all the detailes to help me dive safe and relaxed. Second instructor Mahmut was just as kind and professional. This in combination with the lux hotel resort, my stay was a100% succes. Would definitely go back! Thanks Natia you are the best.

reviews.title: You won't be disappointed!
reviews.text:
Circle Divers Dahab was awesome! A bunch of experienced and passionate divers who you can tell they do what they love. I dealt with many diving centers in and outside Egypt, Circle Divers Dahab is one of the best hands down…
Their location was amazing to get the open water certification for my 10-year-old son. Wahby was fun to deal with. Mahmoud and Sherin were excellent dive masters for our first dives in Dahab.
Anwar (the diving instructor) went above and beyond my expectations. On top of his great teaching skills for PADI/SSI material and techniques, his overall demeanor was an huge plus.
As an instructor, he knows exactly when to stop, reiterate or come back later for a particular skill or a piece of information to ensure the message is delivered. His meticulous attention to my son's attention span and his ability to break down complex concepts in a way that was easy to understand was priceless. He was also great at answering all of our questions and ensuring that we are comfortable, safe, and confident in the water.
I highly recommend Circle Divers Dahab as a diving center. They are absolute pros at what they do and I feel grateful to have had the opportunity to deal with them. If you're considering diving in Dahab or taking a diving course, I would give them a chance - you won't be disappointed!

reviews.title: Best way to dive in Dahab
reviews.text: We had an amazing time thanks to circle divers and Amr. From the start being picked up from the hotel to having some amazing dives with our professional and fun dive master Amr. We can only recommend this dive center for anyone interested in diving in Dahab. Thanks again to the whole team!

reviews.title: Where divers feel at home
reviews.text:
Very good atmosphere, a group of buddies. Well organised, very good service and helpful, super friendly. Very flexible for organising the dives and they listen to your desires. Big thanks to Wahbi for the organisation, thanks to Mo for assisting my ReActivate, and a big big hug for Natia for taking care of me during my deep and Nitrox dives. Thank you, thank you, thank you. See you VERY soon 😉

Nelson

reviews.title: Diving curse
reviews.text: Me and my father did a diving curse for a week with amr he was an amazing guide recommend it for all

ranking: #9 of 98 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Dahab
description: As part of the Sinai Diver family we are able to offer you our well known quality and service for economical prices. If you are looking for a well balanced combination of safety and fun in a comfortable and relaxed atmosphere with multilingual staff, you will find all this at Sinai Divers Backpackers. Next to the famous dive sites like Blue Hole, The Canyon, The Islands etc. we also like to show you the most amazing dive sites around the National Park of Gabr el Bint with our own boat Ghazala 6. As a real Dahab experience you can join us on a Camel-Dive Safari to Ras Abu Gallum, where we can dive uncrowded sites in the north of Dahab. We offer free Nitrox tanks for certified divers and we arrange free pick-ups from the hotel for you. If you feel for an early morning or (fluorescent) night dive and if you are interested in marine biology, this is the place to be. Pass by! You find us in the heart of Dahab in the middle of Masbat bay.

reviews.title: Amazing experience
reviews.text: It was my first time visiting Dahab and I wanted to try scuba diving. Sinai Divers was recommended to me by a friend and they were outstanding! I did a DSD with them and they were beyond helpful and super patient and supportive. When I return and have more time I would love to complete a course with them.

reviews.title: Perfect experience.
reviews.text: Favourite dive center of all times! They are giving their best, so you'll have an awesome experience. Safe, relaxed, fun and educational. You have Thorsten, trying to acommodate your every wish (boat dive, dive sites...), Eid making you laugh between the dives, but when it comes to diving, giving the most detailed briefings and under water spotting the tiniest creatures. Shaker giving his best, explaining the course material, leaving no question open. Big thanks to the great team, I didn't want to leave.

reviews.title: 100% recommend dive center
reviews.text: The service at Sinai divers is outstanding- I love the friendly and chilled vibes in the dive center! I came back the second time and I will definetly come back year after year again. 100% recommend!

reviews.title: A wonderful experience
reviews.text: I have visited Sinai Divers backpackers several times in the past - in all of them the team was extremely nice, and professional. We did several courses with them during this visit. All of the dive instructors - Walid, Omar, Kasia and Thorsten - were extremely sensitive and responsive to the needs of each of the participants. In one case, the course plan was modified significantly to accommodate my teenage daughter, who felt anxious about some of the drills. She ended up getting certified as a scuba diver instead of open water (which was the original plan), but the time that was saved by shortening the course was used to do three fun dives that made her much more comfortable in the water. This plan modification was initiated by the team because they were concerned that continuing the open water course would cause her to give up on scuba diving. I was very impressed by the dedication, friendliness, and professionalism of the team - much more so than I have experienced in other dive clubs. We all had a fabulous time diving with Sinai divers.

reviews.title: J'ai passé de très bonne plongées
reviews.text: I had such a great time with the team of the backpackers, I really recommend this dive club to anyone who wants to have very nice dives in a good friendly and funny atmosphere at very good price. If I had to resume my time with them in one word, it would be : wunderbar

reviews.title: Friendly, fun dive centre!
reviews.text: I had an awesome experience diving some of the best sites in Dahab with Eid. He’s a great guide with a ton of knowledge and a great eye for spotting nudibranchs! He is safety focused and his briefings are thorough. I especially liked the flexibility in the schedule and the fact Eid catered to the sites I preferred to dive!! Thanks to Samir for helping with the gear and being a friendly face!

reviews.title: Great dive center for our beginner family dive.
reviews.text:
Wow!! This place is all 5 ⭐️ for a reason! They are so kind and caring and make you feel so calm and confident your entire dive. From the pre dive brief to the entire dive journey, you’ll love every minute of it. Omar took so good care of us, we immediately booked another dive for the very next day. We’re so happy our daughter dives here all the time and we were able to join her here. Definitely a great spot for beginners and experienced diverse alike.
We were on vacation from USA and we loved the great service from Sinai Divers.

reviews.title: Wonderful team and experience!
reviews.text: Really great dive base! They are not just trying to make you happy, but do it with all their heart. They always took time for a briefing and afterwards to sit together and identify the fish. Even the smallest or very common ones. Loved it!

reviews.title: Friendly, professional, great
reviews.text:
It was a great experience to dive with Sinai Divers. Very professional and knowledgeable as they have been operating for a long time.  And you'll meet the friendliest staff ever. 

The whole experience was awesome. I can't wait to go back there again.

reviews.title: Beautifull underwaterworld and so nice people!!
reviews.text:
Always the warm welcome in Sanai backpackers. We had beautifull dives with the crew of the Backpackers.....take us to some amazing places and we saw many things. From shore dive (turtles, morey-eels, schrimps etc.) to boat dives......the guides (mr. Eid , mr. Thornsten and ms. Lisa) made our stay perfectly perfect!!!
With the Gazalla VI to the south with the beautifull gorgoninains and to Ras Mohammed , where we spotted too much. Like Manta-ray and big schools of jacks.
This was last august (2021) we are returning in the month of may....WANT TO SEE MORE!!!! 
Very nice people at Sinai-backpackers and very good equipment and so on...
If you go to Dahab for Diving...This is the place to be.....

All our instructors are fully qualified and safety standards are in place to ensure the highest levels of service for all our guests.

reviews.title: Excellent Dive School
reviews.text: Excellent diving course, very reasonable price and lovely couple of days diving with Mahmoud Fahiem. Made my trip to dahab even better and feel confident going forward and diving even more after my experience here. Chose excellent dive sites and accommodated all the requests we had.

reviews.title: Best scuba school in Dahab!
reviews.text: We initially started with just the PADI open water course, but we had so much fun and were so inspired by the amazing instruction from Ahmed Gamal that we just had to continue with our advanced open water certification :) Everyone at scuba zone is super friendly, and welcoming. Our instructor Ahmed made us feel safe, comfortable, and capable. He was so patient, and really took the time to make sure that we understood all the concepts. I am blown away by how much we learned and how much we got to see in the Red Sea. It was a perfect experience. Strongly recommend diving with the folks at Scuba Zone.

reviews.title: Top1 diving center, amazing people and service
reviews.text:
I stayed at dahab for a week and dived here every day, successfully completing my AOW certificate and meeting the very lovely owner and friends here. 
The instructor is very responsible and relaxes you, I hadn't dived for 4 months so I was a bit nervous at first, but with the instructor I soon got used to the feeling of being back in the water, it was amazing！
I would recommend this place to anyone, it is the best dive centre I have ever been to. I was very sad to leave and I hope to come back soon and reunite with them on the next holiday.
cant wait to see you again！

我在达哈布呆了一个星期，每天都在这里潜水，成功拿到AOW证书，还认识了非常可爱的老板和朋友们。
教练非常负责，我已经4个月没有潜水了，所以一开始有点紧张，但有了教练，我很快就习惯了回到水里的感觉，爽飞了。
我去过的最好的潜水中心。真的很舍不得他们，希望学校尽放假，好在下一个假期再和他们重逢
迫不及待地想再见到你们！

reviews.title: Amazing experience
reviews.text: Came here for OW and AOW classes and had a really great experience! The instructor, Abdo, is very responsible and super nice! Everyone is very nice, love it! Hope I can come back here for diving again!!!💙💙💙

reviews.title: The place for scuba
reviews.text:
Had great experience while getting open water & advanced openwater here! The lecturere 동희(Abdelrahman) is very proffessional and passionate to take care of all the students :) We definitely will visit scuba zone to have more fun dives. Highly recommended.

한국인들도 오셔서 도움받아가시길 바랍니다. 한국인 강사분들도 있어서 부담없이 배우실수 있으며 자격증따기 최적의 장소입니다.

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.text: First time i afraid of water, but after first course with Donghee, I really enjoyed water! Now i want to learn more. I will visit again to get advanced ! Thank you

reviews.title: Highly recommended
reviews.text: I and my 2 sons (12 and 14 years old) finished OW+AOW courses with Salah and Joseph during October half term. They are very professional, friendly, patient and flexible, adjust course plan based on your circumstances. We had a really great time together. Highly recommended. And will definitely come back again.

reviews.title: 3 day Open Water Diver Course (PADI)
reviews.text: PADI Open water course over 3 days was a great experience. The staff and instructor were very welcoming, friendly and knowledgeable - and the location at the light house is excellent for learning, and eventually lots of coral and fish at greater depths. Definitely recommended.

reviews.title: Awesome dives with Scuba Zone Dahab!
reviews.text:
First time diving here, I spit my dives up this year as I had friends diving with Scuba Zone so joined for the first part of my trip. I was totally impressed by Salah and his team. Everyone was highly professional and super fun. The centre offers top of the range equipment, all of which is still brand new, new regs, BCDs with integrated weights, fins with springs, everything was perfect.

From the pre dive briefings to the dives themselves, everything was perfect. 

The team really made my trip memorable, everyone from Salah who runs the centre to his team of professionals. 😊

This is one of the best best places to dive with in Dahab, I highly recommend them to anyone looking to either start, continue there training or for fun dives.

reviews.title: Amazing experience with scuba zone
reviews.text: Planning to do ow+aow in the beginning but end up with ow+aow+nitrox+deep diving specialty in the end with 13 dives. Our instructors, Mr. Fadel and Mr. Salah, are not only experienced, responsible and knowledgeable, but also warm and caring. During divings, they offered a great sense of security and helped us become independent and professional divers at the same time. We explored 8 diving points at dahab during 6 days. Thanks scuba zone for bringing me this awesome experience. I'll definitely come back to scubazone next holiday.  Now it's really hard for me to detach myself from the joyful atmosphere at the diving center.

location.address: Mashraba Street, El Jawhara Hotel Dahab, Dahab 46617 Egypt
