reviews.title: Fantastic :)
reviews.text: Great team, friendly people, great dives, felt very well taken care of and had so much fun! Thank you!!!

reviews.title: Highly recommend
reviews.text: Loved diving here.  Favourite dive centre to date. Convenient  location in central Dahab , opposite dive site. Has lockers & showers. Very well organised, with numbered boxes and hangers for personal diving gear.  Great equipment.  Excellent instruction.  Friendly and fun instructors and dive guides. Great with teens.  Friendly and helpful staff.  Highly recommend.

reviews.title: Introductory Dive
reviews.text: Our large family with teenagers did the introductory diving class with Octopus World.  Each one of us loved it .  It was safe, informative, and exciting.  I would highly recommend them.

reviews.title: First Class Dive Centre
reviews.text:
Just back from Dahab and chose Octopus Dive Centre for 2 days diving (4 Dives)
I walked in off the street to enquire about prices and the set up, and met Emad who ran me through all the information. He was very friendly and helpful, so I decided to go with this dive centre.
All the guys at the centre were so kind, friendly and welcoming. I did 4 dives in all and was very impressed with the professionalism and knowedge shown by the whole team at the dive centre, although there was still a relaxed vibe. They had a good range of equipment for hire, all in good condition. I enjoyed my whole experience diving, and being around the dive centre.
When passing the dive centre when it was close one evening, Mohammed (an employee at Octopus) spotted me passing. I told him I was on my way to buy a snorkle and dive mask. He insisted on coming to the dive shop with me to recommend a good mask. His help and Knowledge was greatly appreciated, and I was so touched by this kind act.
I will return to Dahab some time next year and will go through Octopus for any future diving I do in Dahab.
Many thanks to all at Octopus for a fabulous experience.
The dive masters and staff are very pro, nice and fun to hang out with! Learned new skills while discovering the dive spots around Dahab: beautiful, colorful and full of life. I’ll come back!

reviews.title: amazing people
reviews.text:
Me and my partner chose this Diving centre in order to do a few dives in Dahab and go to Ras Mohammed afterwards. Thanks to The advice we had from Emad  we managed to take our Advanced open Water Padi Certification and to dive in Ras Mohammed and Thistlegorm.
because of Cop 27 it was a problem to dive in Ras Mohammed from Sharm but Emad helped us making it happen organizing that for us, and also gave us a contact that had been ideal for a trip to the desert.
he practically made our trip soo much better.
It was by far the best experience with a diving centre I had and also the other three were very good.
everyone was so helpful, the receptionist so sweet and friendly.
they made us feel special, I hope to come back soon and meet the same people working for Octopusworld

reviews.title: Great diving in Dahab with Octopus!!
reviews.text: We had a great time with Emad and his team at Octopus World! Camila did her AOW course and enjoyed very much! We did a few dives with them at the Lighthouse reef, the Canyon and the Blue Hole! Incredible diving, colorful sights and many octopuses 😃!! Good equipment, clean place and good vibes! Really awesome!

reviews.title: Best Scuba Diving Centre in Dahab by FAR
reviews.text:
I was there with my GF  for our Open water + Advance and the experience was just perfect. Mead the owner and all the instructors and the staff were very welcoming, very friendly and professional. They went above and beyond to accommodate our needs and very complicated schedule. We felt very safe, comfortable with them and they made sure that we had an outstanding experience.

I highly reccomend them for sure, they are very experienced at what they're doing and they know exactly how to tailor the course based on every person's preference and needs. 

I did my open water and the advance in 5 days as we were very short in time. Yet, I did all the necessary skills and felt very comfortable and confident at the end to go on 30 meters deep dives all thanks to the team.

I will definitely come back to go diving with them and explore Dahab more and the neighbouring islands

reviews.title: The best school, the best experience
reviews.text: I'm still smiling thinking of Dahab and Octopus Dive center. I felt like I was part of the family and not a client. It was my first diving experience. I took Open water and Advanced diver courses. My instructor Blabel went above and beyond to give me the best experience. Everyone there was so friendly and kind. I feel that I started with the best people and in the best place and it's gonna be hard to beat that experience. Need to plan another vacayo there.

reviews.title: Top-notch dive center in Dahab - 100% recommended
reviews.text:
Octopus world Dahab is a TOP-NOTCH dive center. Professional, reliable friendly and always having customer experience in mind. 

I can only recommend Octopus world. We were 2 and we completed Open water and Advanced certifications on a 5-days course with very competitive prices. 

It was a great exeperience with very detailed and clear briefings. A special thanks to (captain) KAMAL and TAREK for both their professionalism and warm welcome.

description: At Sea Dancer Dive Center we offer the perfect balance of safety, fun and environmental awareness. Whether you want to learn to dive, advance your training or just enjoy the beautiful sea life around Sinai, our multi-lingual, professional staff can ensure you get the most from your diving experience. Highlights include the 'Blue Hole', 'Canyon', 'Islands', SS Thistlegorm and Ras Mohammed.

reviews.title: Highly recommend this diving center - I will come back
reviews.text:
Completed the advanced open water diver together with my diving buddy at sea dancer. Our instructor Emad was just amazing and it was a pleasure to learn from his experience and explore together the underwater world of Dahab.
The rest of the crew at the Dive center are also really nice and funny and will welcome you with open arms from the very first second. 
I highly recommend this diving school (as well as their super chilled roof top terrace for an after dive tanning session 😎)

reviews.title: Ask for Ali or Scooter
reviews.text: My partner and I had a great time diving with Sea Dancer. She got her open-water and I was able to fun dive over 4 days. The corals of the red sea are outstanding. The shop makes sure you get a diverse set of dives. Ali and Scooter are both capable dive instructors. They are patient, informative, and friendly. Both told us a little bit about their life's in egypt and took safety very seriously. My partner was incredibly satisfied with Ali's instruction for her open water course. It's really cool to finally be able to dive with her! 10/10 would dive here again.

reviews.title: Amazing Dive Center
reviews.text:
Amazing dive center! I made an account on TripAdviser just to leave this review, so I hope that says something! I had an incredible time diving with them, and can't recommend more highly! I can't wait to be back! 

The whole team is experienced, professional, and so very friendly - the center was always full of laughter and smiles. 

Attention to safety was also top-notch (this should really come first in any review). No corners were cut, I had full confidence in the staff and the equipment at all times. 

Great facilities, with a lovely rooftop terrace for relaxing after dives.

Scheduling was also easy and fairly flexible. I greatly appreciated how the dive center helped me do the dives I wanted to, and worked within my schedule. Balancing the goals of so many divers can't be an easy juggling act, but somehow I still felt individually looked after. Thank you for that!

I'll be back to do my Rescue Diver course, (and won't with anyone else). I can't wait!

reviews.title: A great place to start or continue your diving
reviews.text:
Another 6 days of lovely diving with the Sea Dancer team in Dahab.  Great to see old faces and to share the water with new folk too.

A friendly welcome, willingness to come up with ideas to address challenges and the expected high standards of service is what keeps people coming back.

Lots of good moments in the dives including seeing turtles, rays, lots of fish life and healthy coral to remember till my next Dahab trip.

Thanks to all the team for making my week a fun one.

reviews.title: Very professional guides
reviews.text: A trip that wasn't planed but a great time. Even though I hadn't dived for 20 yrs after a check out dive it was good to be back in the water with great guides. I would recommend

reviews.title: place was disappointment, guider did the minimum to arrive to interesting place
reviews.text:
We did introduction dive for 4 people.
the guidance was very friendly, their content was very clear.
but the place was disappointment - it's done on Dahab's Promenade - which is not a rich place with interesting fish and Corals.
under the water - at least for 1/4 from us, the guider did the minimum to arrive to interesting place, and at the finish of dive sit 5 min at same place under the water and waited for end time .
we felt cheated.

reviews.title: Fantastic, safe and friendly
reviews.text:
This dive center became our second home in Dahab. I would recommend it to anyone from the  experienced or the first time diver.
The top floor is a fantastic place to relax after your dives.
The top qualities I would describe the instructors and staff are patient, safety oriented, kind people with a constant sense of humor. The people here love what they do and have been happily doing it for many years. They plan your dives with care in respect to each person's skill level and air consumption. The instructors are kind a pacient. The pricing is transparent and let's you rent gear but only be charged for the days you dive. Gear is generally just included in the price.
Everything is very well organized. Oxygen is taken on every dive. The gear is in great shape and is constantly checked and maintained. We will never choose another shop in Dahab.

reviews.title: Professional well located among nice restaurants and  tourist shops
reviews.text: A nice professional diving club,  ac class for courses,  sea only steps away,  located in the dahab bay, amidst restaurants and tourist shops,   pick up for free at hotel,  for beginners and intermediate level divers, a bit pricy.

reviews.title: 5 Star Dive Team / 5 Star Treatment / 5 Star Experience
reviews.text: I always look for recommendations when I am travelling to dive globally and this was a simply fabulous referral by a friend.  I cannot praise the approach and professionalism of this team highly enough.  Supporting their clients with all levels of ability with great empathy.  Always willing to help and provide guidance, advise, opinion and experience to divers of all levels. Very approachable, helpful, supportive, knowledgeable of the local diving sites (and various others around the Red Sea), all extremely patient, courteous and great listeners and observers.  Paramount for me also was Diver Safety and the standards of equipment which were also extremely high here.  I dived with Elodie, Gerard, Ihmad, Hamada and Tariq and enjoyed all of their company, camaraderie and professional direction.  At the end of my 12 dives, I was well entrenched into their super friendly dive family.  Every single one were always concerned to ensure that I had enjoyed my experiences and dives with them.  I cannot fault this team.  And I only wish I could transport them to other areas around the world where the approach has distance and 'just another day and another load of divers'.   I also completed my Enriched Air certification and could not fault the instruction provided by Ihmad.  Guys you should be very proud, you are an absolutely awesome team and I cannot wait to come back to dive with you all again.  Thank you for the fabulous experience.

reviews.title: Easy diving from a bunch of great people
reviews.text:
Not our first visit to centre and as usual not disappointed 

Great set up ! Great staff and some great diving once again 👍

Always ready to accommodate any requests 

Will be back 😎

Red Sea Tribe Provides: - Diving Courses from beginners to pro. level. - Guided Fun Dives to the best dive sites in Dahab and Sharm El Sheikh. - Boat trips in Dahab and Sharm El Sheikh. - Freediving Courses and training.

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.text: 3 of us visited this place who never dive before. Instructor was very easy going (helps when youre nervous). We received an instructor each. We were was guided and taken care off all the way. All of us were taken quite deep to almost 10m i think. View was amazing. The whole process took up to 2h. Cost us 55 each. Got some underwater pictures on our phones.  I would recomend it 100%

reviews.title: Fun Reactivation Dive
reviews.text: Had a great dive this afternoon with Mo. It had been a few years, so I had to do the PADI reactivation and he was patient as I relearned some skills that had been rusty. We had a pleasant trip and he was very attentive and pointed out lots of things I would have otherwise missed hiding in the reef.

reviews.title: Happy with my experience
reviews.text: Prices are very reasonable. My guide Mohsen was very professional and knowledgeable. He took me on an intro dive which was 3 meters deep right along part of the lighthouse reef. Visibility is great and the reef was beautiful. I was very comfortable with Mohsen— he was fun to dive with and an excellent instructor. If you are curious about trying scuba diving I recommend this spot

reviews.title: Amazing team, awesome guide, exceeded expectations
reviews.text:
This tribe has become the second home to me and my sister in Dahab:) Came to the center just to try diving out, with zero experience and loads of doubts. Left after ~20 dives, including a night dive, gorgeous canyon, awesome blue hole and others.

We completed our Open water and Advanced courses with Halim and can’t imagine a better teacher and guide - very thorough, caring, detailed, relaxed, serious when needed, fun to be around with and you always feel you’re in good and safe hands - this exceeded all our expectations.

Thanks a lot to absolutely everyone we met at the Tribe - we hope to be back soon!

reviews.title: Do not hesitate. Go dive with Red Sea and Ortega!
reviews.text:
Second time diving with Red Sea Tribe!

Is a great club. No doubt. On my top 3 worldwide.

Very diferent to other divings clubs: no hurries, friendly personal, almost new Aqualung gear, good prices, great dive sites...

Our instructor, AKA "Ortega", granted our survive, despite all our effords to die 😜. Great person...best bodyward against dangerous and blood-thirsty baby cats!

Hope see all of you soon. Inshala!

reviews.title: Great crew and experience!
reviews.text: We were recommended to Baraccuda, one of the owners here, and red sea tribe  from a friend and we couldn’t be happier. Mo was our dove master and we had a such a great time exploring the beautiful Red Sea and it’s prestige corals. The crew was professional and  gear (we only rented wetsuits) were well maintained. Overall great experience, I would recommend and hope to come back and dove with them again!

reviews.title: Best diving experience!
reviews.text: I did 6 dives with the Red Sea Tribe and my time was unforgettable!! Everyone was very catering to fit the dives into my schedule and ensure I got the best experience of diving in Dahab. Mo was my dive master and he was so knowledgeable and well trained. I felt safe and had the time of my life. I will definitely be back. Thank you so much!!

reviews.title: A great dive center in Dahab - Red Sea Tribe
reviews.text:
My son and I dived in the Dahab area with the Red Sea Tribe dive center for 8 dives in 3 days and had a great experience. 

The owners are extremely nice and helpful and all the instructors we dived with were pleasant and very professional. 

If you are looking for a professional dive center with a great atmosphere, Red Sea Tribe is a great choice and, as you can see, we highly recommend it. 

Enjoy Dahab :)

reviews.title: Amazing amazing amazing
reviews.text:
Amazing company. Did my first ever scuba dive here and it was incredible. All the staff are beautiful people and my instructor especially was an absolute legend. His name was Muhammad. 
Great vibe. Would definitely fly back here from australia to do it again.

reviews.title: Great first experience diving
reviews.text: Awesome first time experience diving. Well organized and professional, which made me feel very safe. Highly recommend.

description: H2O Divers Dahab is a 5* PADI Instructor Development Resort, 5* TDI Professional Development Centre and AIDA Freediving Base. We are centrally located with 3 dive sites on our door step. We have 2 air conditioned classrooms, beautiful rooftop cafe and a large kitting up area separated for recreational, technical and freedivers. We have a new addition with our arisha relaxation spot with deck chairs, bean bags and hammocks We have fresh water throughout our premises for rinse your dive gear and have a shower after the dive. We look forward to welcoming you to the #H2ODAHAB family

reviews.title: My demons tried to drown me .. but they didn’t know I was trained by Frank 😀
reviews.text:
I have discovered scuba diving with these people and since ever then H2O is my one and only go to place for diving in Dahab . 
People there are so fun to be with yet very professional that they always make you feel safe. Dahab is full of dive shops but if you want a reliable place that never compromise when it comes to safety and regulations , I highly recommend H2O . I usually go alone but I cannot count the number of friends I made in this place . It gives this homey feeling even if you walk on not knowing fins from mask 😀😀😀 
Frank is diving guru and Alex has a magic stick that can solve literally anything … needless to say they don’t have amateurs in their team . Not a single Dive master , instructor , helper or driver I met in H2O over 8 years can be rated less than perfect. 
If you are in Dahab and want to experience diving , pay them a visit and you won’t regret it

reviews.title: First rate diving and people
reviews.text: If you are wanting to dive (scuba, tech, free) in Dahab, H2O is the place to be. Everyone is knowledgable, friendly and helpful and you are made to feel right at home. I did my Advanced Open Water diving course and because of the attention I was given both in water and in the centre, I increased my confidence and really enjoyed the experience. I also did my AIDA free diving course through the centre and this was a brilliant experience. H2O is highly recommended - just do it - but be warned you will love it so much, you will not want to leave!

reviews.title: highly recommend
reviews.text:
Our 13 year old daughter took an Open Water Diver course at H2O Divers this summer. Since we as parents did not participate, I was a bit skeptical whether her English knowledge would be sufficient to really understand all the instructions and looked for a German-speaking instructor.
Frank from H2O Divers could convince us and especially our daughter all around. An absolutely trustworthy, careful and humorous instructor, to whom our daughter owes a great experience. H2O Divers conducts the courses according to SDI, (a little less known than PADI). The equipment is 1a and learning is from the beginning with dive computer.
I can highly recommend H2O Divers.

reviews.title: The best!
reviews.text:
I only had 1 introduction scuba in my life, but when in Dahab i had to do it again.
My friend told me that i should use h2o because they are the best, and i agree!
I started the Open water course, but opted out half way...not because they were not good, simply because my vacation was short so it took up some time.
The people there are really nice and even if you can find cheaper, go for h2o simply because they are good and scuba diving you want a good experience.... and they give exactly that!
So going scuba in Dahab, go H2O Divers :)

reviews.title: First Diving Experience not the last 😊
reviews.text:
First Diving Experience i arrived in Egypt not even being able to snorkel the coral reef is literally in front of the dive centre it's incredible i was hooked!
I couldn't believe the amount of marine life and beautiful coral so close to the shore it was like being in a giant fish tank I just didn't want to get out of the water.
 I enjoyed snorkelling so much Alex arranged  a taster session with Frank he put me completely at ease very knowledgeable and Professional i would definitely recommend H20 diving school,it's very well run and nothing is to much trouble,also Alex arranged a boat trip to Ras Mohammed which was amazing i can't wait to go back.

reviews.title: Dahab Thank you h20 first dive
reviews.text: Excellent location, fantastic,  well run dive school, great teachers, safe and fun, emphasis on safety, thank you for my first time diving

reviews.title: A place to gain more worthy diving skills
reviews.text:
It wasn’t my first time diving from H2O, but every time I do; I know that it wouldn’t be the last.

This time I was having my Advance Nitrox and Decompression Procedures courses, it was my first time doing a technical course from H2O, the team there is very professional, they don’t tolerate with any of the courses skills, also all needed equipments are available there and well maintained.

Thank you H2O crew

reviews.title: Safe and Fun!
reviews.text:
I had an amazing time at H2O! 
I did my Divemaster with them and I couldn't choose a better place to do it.
Professional and fun was for me the perfect mix.
loved it and will be back!

reviews.title: Fantastic experience
reviews.text: I had an excellent experience with H20 divers in Dahab, even before my arrival when manager Alex very kindly did a reservation for accommodation for me. I came for a EFR and the Rescue diver certificate. The diving center is very professionally equipped and has a spacious area for preparing the gear. On the top of the building, there is a cozy eat/in to relax. The trainers, Shrif and Amr, were highly professional, super friendly, very patient and explained each and every step of my courses, from the beginning to the ending of the course. Also the fun dives that I did with different trainers, were extremely well planned, the groups were small and composed according to the divers' experiences. We always had lots of fun in the beautiful Dahab diving region. I can only very warmly recommend H20, and will for sure come back. Shukran kteer to Frank, Alex, Shrif,  Amr, the other Frank, and Balu, and the entire team.

reviews.title: The team that makes everything possible
reviews.text:
We spent a bit more than a week of diving with H20 Divers Dahab and definitely come again. The team is very professional and tries to make everything possible, including special demands for tech gear. You might pay a bit more than average in Dahab but you get top service and safety - it's definitely worth. 
Thank you for the great dives, your kindness and patience.

description: Adventure spot Dahab is a PADI 5 Star IDC Dive Resort and a whole lot more! Our dive center is located just meters from the Red Sea. From your first breaths underwater, to the most advanced TEC diving and even helping to create tomorrows professional divers we do it all. So no matter what level of diver you are or even if you are just dreaming of getting your diving certification, adventure spot dahab.

reviews.title: Just amazing
reviews.text:
We have no words to thank the whole staff for these last three days. We had six dives with them and they were just AMAZING. They are always trying to help, and they have very good vibes, we were welcomed as if we were old friends since the very beginning. They arranged all the dives in Dahab, and also three more dives in Sharm el Sheik. Also the equipments are in perfect condition!
We are coming back soon with them for sure!

reviews.title: Great experience with captain Atta
reviews.text: Great experience! I dived with captain Atta and it was my first dive. He was very calm and professional,I enjoyed the time I spent close to the coral reefs 😊 definitely will repeat this again

reviews.title: Great experience
reviews.text:
Great experience, captain Abd El Rahman was very helpful, supportive and professional 
I will dive more and more with them Isa

reviews.title: It worth
reviews.text:
It's was awesome experience and adventure center was the best choice to make it..
I'm really thankful to choose adventure center and really merciful fo meet all ppl who working there.. They were brothers
For sure I will make it again and over again at the same place
TNX

reviews.title: Great experience

reviews.title: Great spot, friendly people.
reviews.text: We really enjoyed our time with Fantasea Divers. Every member of staff had time for us and made us feel welcome, having worked in the dive industry, we really appreciated this. The equipment was good, the guiding was adjusted to suit our slow style, and we felt everything was really well organized at every dive location. We weren't sure how much diving we would do when we first arrived, but we ended up doing every dive we could in our time there. Mostafa was a great guide, and we enjoyed the surface intervals which were a nice chance to learn more about local life. We are already planning our next trip and will definitely return to Fantasea Divers.

reviews.title: Fantasea divers recommended
reviews.text: Fantasea divers have good equipment and take safety seriously.  They made me, family and friends feel in good hands.  We enjoyed diving with Fantasea Divers.

reviews.title: Excellent 5* dive center
reviews.text: It was not the first time with this dive center and for sure it won’t be the last! The team above and under surface is simply amazing, professional and friendly. They are very attentive and make it their mission for you to feel safe and comfortable under the water and to make the most of your dives.

reviews.title: A 5* dive center.
reviews.text:
Definitely a 5* dive center. 
I did my advanced diver course and nitrox certificate as well. 
Both Mustafa Abdel and Ahmed Hafez where  extremely professional helpful and patient with they're students and gave endless advice how to improve diving skills.
Same at the dive center office Hannah and Tarek and the drivers and helping hands.
Friendly and nice people who will do anything to help..

reviews.title: Brilliant dive centre with a fantastic team!!
reviews.text: An exceptional team with so much knowledge (both local and experience!), patience and warmth! They are 100% customer oriented and make sure everything feels good and safe before, during, and after the dives. Owner Tarik has very successfully put together his team and you can’t help but being swept away in the camaraderie and so it feels more like family after these days spent together. Without a doubt I’d come back to dive with Fastasea. They really made our stay in Dahab!!

reviews.title: Fantastic dive center!
reviews.text:
Just spent six wonderful days doing a refresher dive, my Advanced Open Water certification, and six fun dives with Fantasea Divers. 
From Tarik, who owns the center to Hanaan who runs their office to instructors Mustafa and Ahmed as well as their drivers and support staff, everyone was really warm and friendly. 
Can highly recommend Fantasea for both courses and fun dives and if we’re back in Dahab in the future we’ll definitely be diving with them once again.

reviews.title: Top quality safety is their priority
reviews.text: Great team - Hanan in the office, Amr and Mohamed our instructors. Safety first equipment well maintained and very helpful

reviews.title: Fanatasea Divers Dahab
reviews.text:
Honestly i was sceptical about Shore Diving, but i was proven wrong immediately at hour first dive by all the colourful Corals and various species of fish around 

Everyone at Fantaseas Divers is very welcoming and ready to assist you with whatever you need for your dive or courses you might want to accomplish.

Dahab has its own laid back mentality and atmosphere,not over the top compared to Sharm el Sheikh, which is quiet unique for a tourist destination.

We will be back for sure

reviews.title: Fantastic week of diving with fun, professional, helpful, and safe dive company. Already planning our return trip!
reviews.text:
The whole Fantasea Team was wonderful — from reassuring emails pre-trip to wonderful dive guidance and coaching, to simple kindness helping us find our way around Dahab. 

We are a family of four with two newly certified, but very different, young teens. Ahmed dove with us all week; his enthusiasm and focus on fun ensured the kids improved their skills immensely without even noticing he had individualized learning plans in play with both of them (mom and dad, too😉).

The rest of the team was also top-notch, from Hanan infectious smile to to the drivers’  good humor. The other dive instructors we interacted with also inspired confidence — would entrust my kids’ safety to any of them underwater. 

It was a great week of diving and we are all looking forward to returning to Dahab and diving with Fantasea again.

reviews.title: Great family diving experience in Dahab
reviews.text:
Tariq took our family of 4 diving at Eel Garden.  The diving was great and Tariq was amazing.  This was our kids’ first dive since they’d been certified and Tariq was a wise, patient guide to help them remember everything they’d learned.  He gave a thorough pre dive briefing and then ensured that the kids were in good shape under water. 

We did 2 shore dives and loved hanging out at the cabana on the beach between dives. From start to finish, it was an excellent day.

reviews.title: Fun courses and good dives
reviews.text:
Great Dive Center all around, some details:

I spent 4 days getting an EFR and a Rescue Diver certificate, and squeezing in a few fun dives as well. My instructor and everyone else in the crew were great, precise, and helpful. Always on time, looking after me and my friend the entire time.

reviews.title: Super!
reviews.text:
Super !!!!
We had a fabulous time!!
Absolutely lovely team  friendly, very qualified and so helpful .... from driving instructors to drivers and staff that works in the base. Diving equipment is fantastic and diving sides were great.
If there were 6 stars to give they would deserve them all.

reviews.title: Exceptional
reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic dive centre -  exceptional professionalism, care and real passion and love for diving and the sea. The centre runs as a clock-work- you leave on time, get kitted out, briefed and jump off into the sea on time. Safety is a priority, always, with depth monitoring, safety stops observed to the last second, these guys don't mess around, but also make it feel so easy. If you plan to learn to dive, do it with Sea Dancer in Dahab, you will have the best and the safest experience, and will fall in love with diving.  We dived for over a week, did shore dives, boat dives at Gabr-el-Bint, and night dive at the Lighthouse reef in Dahab, and of course - the Blue Hole and the Canyon. The marine life is incredible, healthy reefs, the underwater photographer's paradise. Red Sea is the top world's dive destination, and you can see why in Dahab. It's also very quiet at the reefs (with the exception of the Blue Hole and the Canyon), just like good old times.  Special thanks to Emad and Nasseem, we look forward to coming back in December.

reviews.title: Caring about your wishes and safety
reviews.text: Thanks a lot to my instructor Emad, Ashraf and many team members for arranging my Open Water Course! I felt very welcome and safe, and trained my skills in various beautiful sites! I am wishing all the best to Sea Dancer and hope to visit again!

reviews.title: Excellent diving center

I had a great 3rd visit to Black Rock and completed my Rescue Diver and Deep Specialty courses with them this time. It was great to see Renate and the team there and their new diving center setup is excellent. 
I'm looking forward to my next visit which will hopefully be very soon.

reviews.title: I can’t wait to come back !
reviews.text:
Meeting Renate and her team it’s one of the best thing it could happen to us in our trip! 

The individual attention they offer is priceless, you will have an instructor based on your skills and previous dives, prioritizing safety and adapting the content and learning to each person.

The diving center is just lovely, perfect space to prepare your equipment, have your theory lesson if you are doing any of the course, plan your diving’s and talk and search about the sea life you watch underwater. The equipment is quality and proper checked, and is very nice to find your name on the hangers to hang your wetsuit or your personalized box to store the rest of the equipment :) 

I dive before in another countries, but for sure not same quality as we found in this magic place! 

100 % recommend!! 

Thank you so much for this experience and see you soon Black Rock Center team ❤️

reviews.title: Best dive center ever!
reviews.text:
Most proffesional team ever, thanks so much Renate, Wael, Hadi and Harmada for this unforgettable experience. I love the attention and teaching skills. Made my Padi open water certificate in solid four days. Highly recommend this dive Centre for any courses or diveing.
Thanks one more time to open the SeaWorld to us. 💚

reviews.title: Perfect place to do the Openwater licence
reviews.text:
I have done my Openwater licence with the Black Rock dive center and I couldn't have hoped for better ! 
My instructor, Mamdouh, combine practice and theory perfectly, was open to any questions and explain well. I followed the official PADI book at my own pace and he managed to adapt the dives accordingly.
All the dives were incredible, thanks again Mamdouh and Renate for the amazing moments spent with you.

reviews.title: Fantastic experience (OWD course)
reviews.text:
Let me say one thing upfront: Renate is the absolute best teacher you want to have when getting started with scuba diving!

My girlfriend and I wanted to take advantage of a long vacation and do both the OWD and the Advanced OWD course. After talking to Renate on the first day (we only pre-booked the OWD course upfront), she talked us out of it and encouraged us to do the OWD and then get some experience after. 

We totally underestimated the extensiveness of the OWD course (I started it some years ago in LATAM and did the theory + confined in two days), and it took us 4.5 days to get done with everything. Renate took great care of us and mixed theory and the confined dives in a very thoughtful matter. After all, there is a multitude of skills to master to be able to dive safely and to handle confidently and crises that might happen while under the surface. We now feel really well prepared and ready to move on.

Renate is also a wonderful person; we really enjoyed spending the days with her (if you are nice, she might even go out with you 😉). 100% recommendation! We will certainly be back!

reviews.title: Exceptional and amazing experience
reviews.text:
Finally after sveral dives with Blackrock, I decided to do my open water license with the center. Having dived in various spots with various centers I can undoubtedly say blackrock is the best center I have dived with in Egypt due to, not only quality and reliability, but also precision and commitment to educate, entertain and maintain the safety of their guests.
As for my open water course, i have learned, understood and practically applied all the skills, concepts and requirements in the official PADI book. They were so informative and sufficiently explanatory that I could easily apply and discuss all of them having known them by heart. Mamdouh our instructor deserves a great thank you for literally being the most attentive, knowledgeable and fun instructor someone can look for.
He made sure to explain, discuss, repeat, display and evaluate all the the required skills in addition to being open for all our questions.
Last but not least, Renate, the general manager, YOU ARE AWESOME....Thank you for being a great friend, a great diver and for keeping this place as professional as it is. Seriously, diving with you guys makes it more tempting to come to Dahab again and again.

reviews.title: Professional diving courses
reviews.text:
I joined black rock dive center for my open water diving course.
It was super professional and much better than others in Dahab  in terms of teaching me everything into details. Taking the time needed to communicate to me full information and to make sure i understand everything.
My instructor Renate was awesome, nice and super professional, giving me the course in the professional way.
Knowing that i received offers from multiple diving centers before the course, some of them was cheaper btw. But this course is worth every penny and the reason i choosed it with black rock that is not limited time like many others(3days for example),
 but they only finish the course when i received all the information and made sure i can apply it perfectly.
Also made a fun dive after the course with the best partner & Instructor Renate, which was exceptionally beautiful in an awesome dive site.
Thank you sooooo much for everything.
Can't wait for my advanced open water course in my next trip

reviews.title: More than I thought possible...
reviews.text:
This Dive Centre on the beach in Dahab was a real find. I took my wife and children (aged 16 & 14) to the Sinai to recuperate after a family bereavement. We couldn't have been in better hands. 

The kids and I took the Open Water Diving course and we are now PADI qualified to dive to a depth of 18 metres. Under the expert tuition of PADI-registered instructor Mamdou, all three of us spent four busy days getting to grips with the stuff of Scuba Diving. I had not considered it deeply but, on reflection, I should have realised this would be a physical holiday. If you want to relax on the beach all day, or lay-in of a morning in your hotel bed, this course won't be for you. However, if discovering an undersea kingdom in one of the World's prime diving locations appeals to you, Black Rock will sort you out.
 
As a parent, safety was my first priority. Mamdou was meticulos in his care of us and Black Rock Director Renate's set up involves high-quality kit and well-organised systems. Base-camp, the Dive Centre, is comfortable and spacious. The well-ventilated classroom works and access to the sea is very close.
 
There are other Dive Centres in Dahab. Happily we found Black Rock on our first family Sinai trip. There are also other diving spots in the World. I'm pleased. It's a wonderful sport. However, we won't be going anywhere else in a hurry. My kids and I will be going back to Dahab and we'll be diving with Black Rock. Why wouldn't we? I think it was as good as it gets.

reviews.title: Amazing diving experience at Black Rock Diving Center
reviews.text:
During my stay in Dahab, Sinai I joined Black Rock Dive Centre's diving course.
Overall an amazing experience.
As a newly licensed diver, I felt the need to find an experienced partner for my diving activities. Through the Black Rock Dive Centre, I found just that and more.
Renati the owner of the centre was the ultimate partner and instructor. She guided me through the most outstanding destinations, was incredibly professional, and gave a sense of safety and enjoyment simultaneously which is rare to find.
I highly recommend taking a part of the Black Rock Dive Centre's program during your next visit to Sinai! Looking forward to coming back again!

reviews.title: Wonderful experience with Orca!
reviews.text:
I had an absolutely wonderful experience with Orca completing my PADI open water intro as well as the advanced certification. All their staff are warm, supportive, and helpful...it was quite easy being welcomed into the diving community.

My instructor, Mahmoud Fahim, gave me a truly unforgettable experience and diving skills for life. He'll show you the discipline and commitment required for you to be a responsible and skilled diver, and at the same time all the magic the Red Sea has to offer. Learning with him was a pure joy. 

The center's equipment is clean and in good condition and their safety standards are well in place. Overall very fair prices. If you're looking to get your PADI certification in Dahab I highly recommend Orca center - you'll be in good hands!

reviews.title: The best experience
reviews.text: I had the best experience doing fun dives and advanced diving licences with Nomad divers. Diving in Dahab is fantastic! Excellent visibility, beautiful and plentiful fish, anchors, playful sea creatures and the various dive sites are just BEAUTIFUL. Pretty underwater scenes. reviews.title: Dahab Dive - Bana's your guy!
reviews.text:
I would like to take a moment to thank my Diving instructor, Bana from Nomad Divers for introducing me to this wonderful world of scuba diving. Bana is not just the most awesome and professional instructor but also the coolest dude around Dahab!

Bana truly made my whole Dahab visit and I spent most of my time hanging with him and his friends instead of my hostel mates! He went out of his way to made sure we met up the day before lessons to give me a proper introduction and helped to plan out the rest of the days at Dahab. Eventually, he convinced me to extend my stay at Dahab as i truly learned so much and enjoyed my stay under his tutelage.

Lessons were super clear and professional and there was a great deal of trust between us. Diving with Bana was such a joy and I’m considering coming back to Dahab for more lessons. He is very professional - no cutting of corners and firm with his lessons. I definitely appreciated that. His surface and under-water explanations with hand signs were so clear, it felt like I could hear him speaking. He is also very patient and his calming demeanour really gave me the confidence and the space to get myself back into control. All lessons are followed up with a review session which was very helpful and added to my progress. I wouldn’t even bother with anyone else. If you’re in Dahab, Bana is your guy!

Diving aside, I have to mention that Bana is a super genuine dude and true friend. He took such good care of me from treating me to lunch, inviting me to watch and play soccer with his friends, arranging a driver, coordinating with my hostel (Rafiki) and even helping me with payment options. None of which were expected and I am truly grateful to have made such a friend.

I really wish Bana and Nomad Divers all the best. Hope he gets all the support he needs for his Dive school. 5 STAR DIVE INSTRUCTOR AND FRIEND!!

reviews.title: Best first diving experience
reviews.text:
Took my first two dives ever here and i wholeheartedly recommend it to everyone. Now i finally understand why divers always chat about diving—cause how could you not!!!

I dived with Banna and Ibrahim, both great experts with so much passion. They will find your inner diver and polish the rugh edges. Their english is great and both are easygoing and chill blokes. 10/10 recommended! Ill be coming back!

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.text:
The diving was great. Bahna and his partner are great instructors. It was my first time diving and they both make it a great experience.
Super recommend.

reviews.title: Best diving school, instructor I have ever had! No joke...
reviews.text:
I have had Nomad Divers and Banna in particular for the second time. It was again definitely not the last time. Banna is such a good teacher and person, that I would go diving wherever he is. Diving with him makes the whole diving experience more valuable and fun. I have been to various other dive schools and instructors, but the enthusiasm, clarity of teaching and good heartedness that Banna incorporates is not  to be found somewhere else. If you are looking for a diving teacher that really sees you as the person you are and your specific goals and needs, there could hardly be anyone better. 
I am so grateful for the beautiful diving experiences Nomad divers enabled me to have. If you want to combine learning with fun and create a great diving adventure out of it at the same time, go and dive with Nomad divers!!

reviews.title: Best diving experience!!!
reviews.text:
I have had a magnificent experience diving with Nomad Divers, I have achieved open water and advanced open water courses back to back with Ahmed El Banna. He is by far one of the best divers ever. He is an excellent instructor, very patient and informative, passionate about diving and marine life and a very friendly person. 
I highly recommend Nomad divers if you want to enjoy your diving trip to the maximum.

reviews.title: The Best diving team in Dahab
reviews.text: Friendly team , professional instructors especially (Banna) and the diving gear was brand new ......

reviews.title: Magical Dahab
reviews.text: One of the best diving experiences I have ever had in my life. I went to Dahab to proceed my Advanced Open Water Diver Course. My experience would never be that amazing without Nomadivers and Ahmed Elbanna. He taught me how to master my diving skills more underwater despite with my physical disability.  I would also like to mention the amazing Ibrahim the assistant instructor who joined us  and helped me during the course. I  dove in many amazing diving sights such as the Lighthouse and the Canyon and the Blue hole..it was just magical

reviews.title: The best
reviews.text:
Professional and friendly 
Everything goes easy and with passion
They make you feel safe and enjoy it

reviews.title: Diving in Dahab
reviews.text: Diving is a special experience and there is no better than Nomad divers and Ahmad banna to make this an unforgettable memory as well as an addictive lifestyle.

reviews.title: First ever diving experience in Dahab
reviews.text: I had my first ever diving experience in Dahab with Red Sea Relax Dive Center. I had such a great time! The center and my instructor Mustafa made diving very accessible, not frightening at all and very fun. I had the chance to take the Open Water Dive Course 1:1 with the instructor. He didn't hesitate to spend the time needed to explain everything well, answer my questions, and adapt to my schedule / travel plans. I will be back for sure :) Overall strongly recommend it!

reviews.title: Best Family Diving Trip
reviews.text:
One week ago we went in Dahab : Me and my husbund wanted to do a Deep Dive course. We had a great experience 2 years ago with Advance Course in the same diving centar, so we returned again in the same place but this time with our 2 kids 8 and 11 years. At first we thought it would be impossible..but it turn out to be the BEST FAMILY TRIP. My elder child did Junior Open Water  and junger one diving up to 2meters. So we were free to do our course ,even going on different diving spots. The kids were impressed and so happy with diving and learning new stuffs. The instructors were amasing, totaly proffesional all of them without exeptions. Jordan as a Dive Director and Ana- instructor helped us in anyway whenever we needed advice for Dahab . 
Thanx to all of them now we have to think about returning back as soon as possible.

reviews.title: My favorite dive Center in Egypt :)
reviews.text:
All of the staff is really nice and helpful. It doesn't matter which kind of question or problems we had. 
The guides are amazing. Mostafa showed us so many beautiful little Things like slugs, dancing shrimps, eels, moray...
The entry for the house reef is just 20 Meter away from the Center.
I know we will come back as soon as possible.

reviews.title: Great time with Ali Samir
reviews.text: I recently took my son Younis to Dahab to dive with Ali Samir at the Red sea relax Dive Center. We had a great experience! Ali was very knowledgeable and patient with my son, who was a first time diver. The Dive Center was well-equipped and the staff were friendly and helpful. The equipment was in good condition and the safety measures were taken seriously. We had a great time diving in Dahab and would definitely recommend it to others!

reviews.title: DIVE NOWHERE ELSE!!! BRILLIANT!
reviews.text: I have just completed my open water course here with Ali. I cannot recommed this place highly enough. He was an exceptional teacher and human being too. The whole vibe at the place is superb. So welcoming, so friendly and very very professional. The price for the courses and dives are very good indeed. They have got the balance right here. I shopped around and you could pay 50% more for a lot less. Thank all the team for an absolutely wonderful experience. I love you !!

reviews.title: Amazing experience
reviews.text: In the new year I completed my Advanced open water with Red Sea Relax dive centre and can only recommend them! They are professional and thorough and at the same time fun, friendly and laid back which is a great combination. The team create a great welcoming atmosphere and were always responsive and warm to any requests. Great knowledge of the dive sites and the underwater world, we will definitely be returning!

reviews.title: Great diving club
reviews.text: We took an padi open water diving course. The team and mainly Walid, our instructor were proffisional and friendl, and fair. The best diving club ln Dahab.

reviews.title: Highly recommend
reviews.text:
Great experience, amazing guides
Marc and jack
Enjoyed every moment of scuba diving.
A proper professional diving center.
European team run the place

reviews.title: Professional dive center which make you feel at home
reviews.text: I was looking for a friendly and professional dive center in Dahab, and Red Sea Relax Dive center exceeded all expectations. They did not only provide decent courses (my brother did OW and AOW, I did deep dive specialty), the dive center was also our home-away-from-home for about 10 days. The staff is very friendly and went out of their way to assist us. It felt like a family we were lucky to be part of for a little while. It's not surprising that many of the students/staff stayed here longer than initially planned. The chill, low-key vibe in Dahab adds to that. The dive center is located central on the strip with chill bars and restaurants along the waterfront (e.g., Yalla), and has two dive sites just in front with plenty of corals and marine life to discover. There's also the opportunity to arrange multiple dive trips (e.g., blue hole, abu galum) through the center. We stayed at the hotel which was related to the dive center (red sea relax resort), which was very convenient. The hotel also has a beautiful garden and pool, great to take a nap after a day of diving.

reviews.title: Best diving center in Dahab
reviews.text:
The best diving center in Dahab. I came twice to this center, on Sep 2020 and May 2021, and had great experience. The team is kind and professional, the manager, Jordan, always smile to you, and the prices are great!! 

I recommend!

The service and diving equipment was excellent. Our guides, Lala and Jalal were so professional and so calm. Many thanks to you all at Poseidon Diver!

reviews.title: Great dive experience with Poseidon- highly recommend
reviews.text:
I passed my Padi certificate 15 years ago and had only done one dive since. So I was a bit nervous and just wanted to have a refresher dive. The guys at Poseidon hooked me up with an instructor and all the gear. I was given a recap of all the equipment I got kitted out in a short wetsuit, shoes, flippers, mask, oxygen etc
I was given some instruction about the gear, including inflating and deflating the jacket to make you sink and rise. I tested my oxygen via the mouthpiece a few times and did the same for my emergency one. Finally, everything seemed to be in order, and a large trolly on wheels arrived, pulled by the staff. We loaded all the dive gear on, and off we went.
We quickly reached the shore of the Red Sea at a safe dive entry point, waded out in the calm water, and got to just over waist height. A few words from the instructor guided me to try all the gear underwater but at a very shallow depth, and then down we go. We started to swim while dropping in depth considerably. Before I knew it, I must be 6 meters down, which seemed pretty deep. I had the instructor in my field of vision the whole time, and on the way down, he kept checking if I was Ok using the international diving sign of joining the tip of your index finger with your thumb. A-OK
Whilst I was nervous as I hadn’t been at that depth since the barrier reef, I was reassured by my instructor, who made me feel safe; we got to around 12 meters in total which felt deep.
I saw sea anemone with their clown fish residents, lionfish with their poisonous fins, there were large parrot fish and corals of every colour; it was mind-blowing. I loved it so much that I booked another dive with Poseidon.
The second day was probably the best dive experience I have ever had. I was very relaxed with my instructor and enjoyed every minute of it. The reef was beautiful and I can’t wait to do it again!

reviews.title: The best diving center in Dahab
reviews.text: I had some of the best divings ever. Shady the guide is so professional & skilled but on the same time calm & pleasant. I enjoyed the company of Hadar who soon becomes a great dive master. Both of them helped my wife with her first intro diving with so much calm & paitiance. Thank you both for such a great experience.

reviews.title: iNTRODIVE  DONE! what an amazing experience!
reviews.text: This dive center looked very busy so I thought that was a good sign. And my instincts were right! I was hooked up with Rose, a Dahab instructor with many years of experience and she made me feel so comfortable. I absolutely loved it and cant wait to come back1 Thank you so much, Nada! I will be back for my OW course soon!

reviews.title: Beautiful trip
reviews.text: Divers are very professional, trip was awesome first time to dive they made it very easy for me, thanks for them.

reviews.title: Management are dishonest
reviews.text: This has become a shameful dive centre.  With Max Fischer running things Poseidon have become so desperate for money they refuse to repay money they agree they owe me, or make it available to a local Egyptian Diving Instructor to collect. Theft and exploitation by Max Fischer.......you shameful snake.  With such dishonest management practices, think carefully about anything Mr Fischer says especially if your putting your health and safety is at risk.

reviews.title: Awesome dive experience
reviews.text:
There are many Dive Centers in Dahab and it can be quite overwhelming to make the right choice.
After I was diving with a few different Dive Centers in Dahab, I decided to stay at Poseidon.
Why? First of all, I am sure we can agree that the first impression counts, and at Poseidon that was the case. When I arrived at Poseidon, Shahad the Manager was very friendly and welcoming. I noticed at once how well organized, neat, and tidy the dive base is. Furthermore, the communication about the dive schedule was impeccable. We exchanged what's app numbers and Shahad responded always immediately, easy and uncomplicated.
Secondly, in my point of view,  customer service is extremely important. I told Shahad what I am interested in and what I would like to do (slow dives and taking pictures at Lighthouse) and he did organize a very experienced dive guide for me. Mamdo is the best!!! He has such good knowledge and knows every dive side by heart. He is serious about the diving rules but also entertaining. Diving with him is so much fun! I specifically was looking for seahorses and he would find two for me in an area where no other divers would be. Just awesome. I also had a wonderful night dive with him.
So to sum up my review, if you're looking for a good dive experience with a reliable dive center then choose Poseidon.
Big thanks again to Shahad and Mamdo🤗🙏🙏 can't wait to be back...

reviews.title: wonderful !
reviews.text: great team, great instructor, great environnement... great friends. there's one and only place you want to learn scuba diving in Egypt, that's here ! thx again you all !!

reviews.title: They were great 🐢 🐠
reviews.text: I stayed at blue beach hotel and partook in two days of diving with Posideon Divers which were some of the best dives I’ve done. All the staff were wonderful and the equipment  was in good shape. They were flexible with what I wanted and I dived one on one with Eid who was great to dive with - very calm in and out of the water and made me feel very comfortable- highly recommend

reviews.title: Excellent and super fun
reviews.text:
Poseidon are simply awesome. Rarely do you meet such a great group of people that are just fun to be around and also be super professional. Big call out to Ahmed Naguib who is a superb instructor and still so passionate after nearly 15 years of diving. 

Poseidon are slightly more expensive than other other dive schools in Dahab but equipment and facilities are tip top and the vibe of the team make this a special place. Went for 1 dive and ended up doing more than 20, mainly because of the team :)

reviews.title: Great diving in Dhab
reviews.text:
I did 6 days of diving, 12 dives altogether, after a long break from diving due to covid. The dive masters were really nice and professional. I felt safe and confident whilst in the water. Everything was well organized and everyone at Desert divers is friendly and go out of their way to make you feel at home. 
Already planning my return next year !

reviews.title: Super time with Derest Divers!
reviews.text:
Recently back from a wonderful 5 days solo trip in the Dahab with the Tanis and the rest of the Desert Divers team.

Booking and logistics was made painless and I felt like I belong to the family in no time. Received my advanced open water diving certification while there.  Super practical location at the lighthouse with easy access in and out of the waater. The whole area felt like they belong to one large family

 Had the privilege of going on a 2 day safari which was a mini adventure with Ahmed and the guys and got to do some brilliant dives.

 All went according to plan and felt I was in safe hands
Hope to be back again!
Micheal

reviews.title: Great place to learn to dive
reviews.text: I had a great time completing my PADI open water with Desert Divers Dahab.  I was new to diving, was travelling solo and was had never been to Egypt before, the team at Desert Divers Dahab were welcoming and friendly and made me feel very at home. The course was excellent, my instructor Saleh (Jackie) was absolutely brilliant and made the content of the course easily understandable and accessible. Would Highley recommend.

reviews.title: Great diving!
reviews.text:
We did 12 dived, including 2 by boat to Gabr El Bint and 4 in Ras Abu Galum during the 2 days camel trip.
Our dive masters were super nice and all dives amazing! Each trip was well organised but still flexible to account for the odd Egyptian delay - all part of the experience. We loved it!
We also had some change of plans regarding accommodation and it was very easy to adjust, overall a great service.

reviews.title: Go here!
reviews.text: An amazing team here. This was my first stop in Egypt and what a great way to be introduced to the country! I took my PADI Open Water cert with them and gave no regrets. The Lighthouse reef is an incredible place to learn!

reviews.title: Plonger à 100%
reviews.text:
Diving with Desert divers isn't only diving, It's more than that! It's meeting amazing people really interested in you and who want to make your days joyfull and unique. I'm happy i did my openwater diving with them! I already talked about them to lot of people coming in Dahab soon ☺️ i will come back! Hopefully in one year
 Thank you so much for these good vibes!

reviews.title: Don’t dive anywhere else in dahab!!
reviews.text: Tanis and Said have built something truly amazing here. I urge you to not look any further and come to Desert Divers for your dive vacation (or climbing) in Dahab. The team is amazing, everyone is extremely kind, helpful, funny and it truly is a great place to be. It definitely feels more like a family than a business. Please go to the Bedouin dinner in the desert if you have the chance! I came with my brother and we had the best time here, having stayed for almost two weeks.Tanis was extremely helpful already before arrival, answering my questions before both on whatsapp and email. 10/10⭐️

reviews.title: The most wonderful diving experience, both in and out of the water.
reviews.text:
So… I sit writing this review after crying all afternoon at the thoughts of leaving this wonderful place full of these wonderful people. 
We arrived in Dahab knowing that we wanted to dive. I have my AOW but it’s been three years since my last dive. I brought my friend who wanted to give the whole diving thing a go (after years of nagging on my part!) 
Walked past a few dive centres who were not particularly welcoming. When we stumbled upon Desert Divers we were greeted by Osama who instantly started to make us feel like family. 
We started our dives with Mohsen. I need to write a novel to explain all the ways in which he is the best diving instructor to grace the ocean. 
He took my best mate from a nervous try dive through to her open water and finishing with a dive in the Blue Hole. 
And me, he took from a nervous diver and reshaped me into a confident diver who trusts herself and her skills and can now confidently be in the ocean. I regularly felt like I was a fish. 
Honestly, words are not enough to explain the ways in which all of you have made the both of us feel over the past week. We have loved everything you have done for us, from scuba diving, to making us tea to making us feel like a part of your lovely diving family. 
And it’s safe to say we will be back. Stella will come for her AOW and me for my Rescue. And if Mohsen will put up with me long enough I’ll let him make me a dive master. 
If you want him to he can make anybody a diver and will do so whilst making you laugh. But don’t mess him about 😂

Seriously: anybody contemplating where to dive in Dahab- do yourselves a massive favour and look no further. You’ll have the most beautiful family to guide you into some beautiful ocean.

reviews.title: Best Dive Center EVER
reviews.text: If you are looking for the most incredible Diver club, then you HAVE TO GO to Desert Divers ! Everything there is perfect : the manager is so lovely, the staff is really nice and the dive experience is the best we ever had for a really good price ! No hesitation : just go and dive !

reviews.title: Excellent, I will be back!
reviews.text: I completed the Advanced PADI Open Water under the instruction of Mohsen El-Saka, an exceptionally skilled, knowledgeable, and experienced diver and instructor. He quickly understood my strengths and weaknesses as a diver and went above and beyond to ensure I had a super fun experience while still preparing me well to make the most of the underwater world in a safe and smart way. He's got great attention to detail. The staff at Desert Divers Dahab are all super friendly and efficient. Their equipment is great; good quality and very well maintained. They certainly stand out as a great center in Dahab.

description: The Reef 2000 Dive Club is attached to the Safir Dahab Resort & offers the kind of relaxed, safe & high quality diving that is all too rare. As a CDWS certified PADI 5 Star Gold Palm Resort, our emphasis is on high-quality training courses ranging from PADI Scuba Diver / PADI Open Water till PADI Divemaster. And as an IANTD Technical Instructor Training Facility we offer technical diver courses till the IANTD full Trimix Diver& IANTD Instructor courses till Technical & Normoxic Trimix Instructor. Though safety is paramount &the principles of conservation are strictly adhered to, the main emphasis is on giving you the best underwater experience of your life. Even above the water, our staff take great pleasure in making you feel welcome. We run recreational and technical guided dives, jeep&camel safaris, boat-diving excursions for example to Gabr El Bint, yoga diving courses, re-breather support, Nitrox and Trimix, aswell as FREEDIVING. Photography and Video services are also available.

reviews.title: Dahab, scuba diving
reviews.text: I just spent a week in Dahab, Egypt; staying at Safir Resort and dived with the onsite dive center, Reef2000 Dive Club. I would like to thank Akram and Wael for making sure that I had unforgettable diving experience there. Leaving me with thoughts of coming back for more!

reviews.title: Superb Dive Centre.  Brilliant Service.  We will be back soon.
reviews.text:
Brilliant Dive Centre.  Akram and Nemo looked after us so well, tailoring a specific package that catered for our needs precisely.  I am an experienced diver and my wife is new to diving.  As a result of her previous diving experience she had lost confidence.   Now, after being guided so expertly well by Nemo, she can’t wait to get back into the water again.  

Dives are mostly shore based and very relaxed.  Dahab is definitely worth a visit for those divers that are tired of the stress and numbers of divers in Sharm. 

Would highly recommend.

reviews.title: The best diving club
reviews.text: I recomend Reef 2000 diving club to all divers, specially to the beginers. Their instructors are the best. They have really great feeling for leading first timers to experience wonders of the sea. I felt really safe in their hands. Off course they are also good for profesionals and everybody else who just want to experience wonderful underwater world in beautiful Dahab.

reviews.title: Best company to dive with
reviews.text:
This dive centre is located in a beautiful area of Dahab in Safir hotel. The owners are so welcoming, professional, patient and are happy to help with whatever questions or issues you may have. After 3 years of not diving Nemo was so patient and calming with the check dive and all 5 current dives since.

I highly recommend this centre for all areas of diving

reviews.title: Great staff who made for a fantastic experience
reviews.text: Great team to dive with. Incredibly patient, fun and knowledgeable. Would definitely choose to dive with them again

reviews.title: Made me fall in love with scuba diving
reviews.text:
Our family had never tried scuba diving before, and the Reef 2000 team did a fantastic job to get us all, including our 8-year-old, comfortable and experience the magic of scuba diving. I even did my PADI open water and some adventure dives, and I might be spoiled for life, seeing some of the most amazing dive sites in the area. 
We can highly recommend the Reef 200 dive center, run very professionally with super friendly and experienced staff. We will definitely return!

reviews.title: They are so good I keep returning to Reef 2000
reviews.text: I have dived in many places, and used many dive centres, but I keep returning to Reef 2000 and Dahab.  The shore staff are great - the dive instructors/guides are great - the dive sites are superb.  It's well for the inconvenience of no direct flights to go there and experience Reef 2000.  I'm going back again in September.

reviews.title: Great staff, Unforgettable dives, a truly unique experience
reviews.text: Diving with Reef 2000 has been an amazing experience. the Dives where superbly organized, the staff made sure we where able to make the most of each dive as well as being incredibly friendly and ensuring that we enjoyed not only the diving but the overall experience in Dahab. I could not recommended more. Cant wait to come back again. its been unforgettable.

reviews.title: Great diving
reviews.text: Great dive centre, dive instructors were great and the diving in Dahab was unreal. Diving was and the staff were very helpful with any queries. Would definitely recommend doing the open water and advanced open water courses.

reviews.title: Good staff, nice dives
reviews.text:
We did 9 dives, 6 from shot and 3 from boat. All trips were good planned at with 
Good staff/instructors Mo and Ibi and the owner Dave the man - see you again

reviews.title: It’s not just a place to learn freediving, it’s a community!
reviews.text:
The Freedive Dahab team is a group of wonderful people dedicated to making sure that you have the best experience possible. From the team in the office, to the instructors and even the other freedivers at the centre, they all make the place come alive - what a great vibe - you truly feel immersed in the ‘freediving journey’! 

Added bonus is that the center is walking distance from the Lighthouse reef with plenty of depth and warm water. 

I completed the SSI level two freediving course with instructor Mike - he is excellent! He has a calming presence and is very knowledgeable. He is also very reassuring and guides you through the process, acknowledging any challenges you may have whilst making you feel safe to push and improve each time. I learnt a lot on this course including safety, technique, theory and exercises. I feel I walked away well equipped to take my freediving a level further.

Honestly, I can’t wait to be back and train there again, it’s just a great place with lovely people - it’s a community! 

My partner and I stayed at the centre for three weeks in the large on-suite room - it’s great value for money, clean and comfortable. 

Thanks to Selma, Hagar and Rasha for making us feel at home!

reviews.title: Perfect place to learn freediving and have an ice bath
reviews.text: Freedive Dahab is a great place to start your freediving journey. I did the level 1 course with them at the end of my stay in Dahab, and ended up wishing that my stay was longer so I could have done more. The pace of the course was good, and the instructors were excellent at adapting their approach to individual students' needs - both patient and encouraging with those who struggled, and helping those who were more advanced to discover their limits. I had problems equalising on the open water session, and was given some very good exercises and the tip to watch Aharon Solomons' video on Frenzel equalisation, which helped me to pass the course. The other thing which must be mentioned is ice bath Thursdays! They have an ice bath on the rooftop, which was a perfect end to a day of freediving - lots of people took part, and you feel cool for the rest of the day even in 35C heat.

reviews.title: If you want to learn freediving, this is the place to go to!
reviews.text:
In the beginning of the summer I was spending nine days at Freedive Dahab in Egypt with the intention to do the Level 1 and Level 2 training and certification.

All the instructors where very good at what they were doing and a majority of the instructors were female. The later part is of significance when you are new to freediving, it is scary in the beginning and a comforting attitude from the instructor makes a big difference!

The staff is very friendly and helpful and help and resolve all issues that you encounter.

I had the opportunity stay in one of the accommodation rooms provided in the dive center, something I strongly recommend as there are a lot of social activities going on at the center.

The atmosphere at the center is including and social, from day one you have friends to socialize with. Considering I was traveling on my own, this was very important.

reviews.title: What a nice experience
reviews.text: I had an amazing time in Freedive Dahab learning my level 1 and 2 free diving courses. It is a sweet place with so many friendly people! We got two T-shirts with Freediving logo printed on them, love it! Our instructor Mike is super professional and helpful throughout the whole learning journey and I’m very grateful to have him as my instructor. Theory classes are always so fun and interesting, we all love the little experiments. Wish to be back again to this place for more training courses

reviews.title: Awesome experience. to my instructor Mike thank u for being so cheerful and encouraging. Would love to be back again!
reviews.text:
Amazing freediving learning journey in Dahab, Egypt and I want to thank everyone there for being very kind and supportive! Especially the cats and other animals too, they made my day…always.

Also the greatest credit to our instructor Mike who made this learning journey so meaningful and fun for us… Mike is very professional and he has a great way of teaching student…
At first we went to the classroom for theory classes but it’s too boring so after that we decide to go to the second floor to do some breathing exercise plus some small experiments that help us to understand the theory better. He always comes up with brilliant teaching methods and so patient to everyone. If you have question and you ask him, he can give you more than what you want. Didn’t have time to communicate more to other instructors but thank you Morgan for being so friendly and sweet. 

Would love to come back in the future.

reviews.title: Wonderful 1 week training
reviews.text:
Wonderful 1 week journey from all my fears, pains and tensions into comfy 20m dives with finally pleasure and calm underwater.
Thanks Mike, Morgen and Ania for making this happen - for every advice and all Your patiance to me.
Selma, thanks for all Your care and making me feel like home
See You next time😊
Tomasz

reviews.title: Very helpful instructor
reviews.text:
First time ever trying freedive and had equalization problem in my first session where I struggled to dive deeper than 3 meters after multiple repeated attempts.

Thankfully my instructor Michael was very reliable and helpful in this upsetting situation as I was also tight on time. To my surprise I ended up comfortably at 15 meters after just two more open water sessions with him and got my SSI level 1 certificate.

Michael is very knowledgeable and he is great at explaining and demonstrating everything step by step. He pointed out my issues every time in a very precise manner and gave very nuanced adjustments of exactly what I should focus on for the next attempt to which improved a bit by bit after every dive. I would come back to him and do my level 2 and would recommend to anyone wanting to try and also those who are at a plateau.

reviews.title: SSI2 Course
reviews.text: A very nice Place with some great people teaching and working there! Learnt a lot and had a wonderful time

reviews.title: Excellent experience
reviews.text:
Thank you I had an amazing trip. Dahab was a real break from COVID.
I had Ania as an instructor for Level 2 and she was an excellent instructor for me. She gave us clear instruction with an aura of confidence and calmness that made the seemingly impossible totally achievable.
The atmosphere in Free Dive Dahab was social and supportive and is excellent for the lone traveller.
Thanks again for a great trip.

reviews.title: If you’re going to dive, this is the place to be.
reviews.text:
Bubbles Dive Center Dahab Egypt
February 2, 2023

Bubbles Dive Center is all of a five minute drive off the main strip so can easily be missed.  Don’t miss it!!!  Bakher is in charge.   English speaking, quick responses to planning questions by whatsapp.  So helpful with everything I needed to know.  We crossed border from Israel to Taba.  He arranged for a driver to be waiting for us and we had an uneventful 1.5 hour ride through some striking desert scenery.  He recommended the Swiss Inn and I strongly recommend it as well.  Comfortable, clean, big pool, well maintained grounds and right on beach.   (If you like leaving porch door open, ask for a room on second floor!)  Most importantly, all of a 2 minute walk to dive shop from your room.  From the dive shop to water is maybe 25 meters.  The other dive shops are on the main strip area, so not as convenient and you can't really go in from shore.
Bubbles team is just as outstanding.  Helpful in every way.  Our divemaster, Ameen, was incredible (but I’m told they all are).  Meticulously safety conscious and very knowledgeable.  They are a full service PADI dive site offering just about every level of classes.  For me, I just wanted to dive.  Almost every site is a shore dive but there are boat trips as well.  I started with a test, some review and jumped in for a refresher dive.  (so long since my last dive-damn covid!!!)  I didn’t have an agenda so just went with the flow and every place we went was amazing.  My max depth was 30 meters, but along the reefs, I didn’t feel a need to go deeper.  Don’t miss the blue hole.  If you take pictures, you’ll want your camera.  If you have a partner who doesn’t dive, there is snorkeling. 
We went in February which is off season.  Days were sunny and 60(F) with a strong wind, so bring a warm up.  Definitely need a wet suit.  But, such a joy to have virtually no crowds.  
Even with tip, everything was totally affordable.  
Bubbles (and Swiss Inn) are a winning combination that you will totally love!!!
