reviews.title: Do some freediving!
reviews.text:
Had the most amazing time here! Was the first time I'd ever done freediving (even the first time using fins) and I absolutely loved it. I did my AIDA 2 with Laura and it was a great experience, always felt relaxed and she helped me improve massively (and she has really cute dog!). All the staff were super friendly and I would highly recommend giving this a go if you're considering it. I did my AIDA 2 in 2 days and then some practise sessions after that, and would've loved to have done even more. 

The coral reefs at the Blue Hole in particular are incredible, so I would highly recommend booking some sessions there, was such a fun time diving and then just snorkeling around there after.

reviews.title: I love this place
reviews.text: Quite a lot of years ago, I started here freediving with a 2 and a 3 star course. Friendliness, relaxed mood, personal care, safety and the passion for freediving are at the extraordinary high level as they used be all the years, probably even increased. I can´t imagine instructors with higher quality, unless maybe you´re a champion yourself and want to go to Andrea Zuccari for equalization techniques. Prices are very low compared to the value you get.

reviews.title: Freediving at the highest level
reviews.text: The crew has great energy and the level of instruction is phenomenal. Every instructor I dealt with was very passionate about freediving and one felt they did care and tried their best to help with one's progression. They truly feel like a family and in a good way :-)

reviews.title: Dahab Freedivers
reviews.text: The experience was really nice, i had good time with my level two there. The team was friendly and they try their best to make the person feel comfortable.

reviews.title: Freedive in Dahab
reviews.text:
Very nice experience with my instructor Marie.
First day diving four steps ahead of the store in 30m of cristal clear waters and second day in the amazing bluehole.
Nancy, Charlie and Rana also very kind in the office giving support with the logistics.

reviews.title: The best freediving and instructors, 1000% recommend
reviews.text: Absolutely loved freediving here, everyone was super lovely and friendly, all of the instructors I dived with were really attentive and I always felt really safe in the water with them. Special shout out to Stefano, Dave, Laura and Sol! I left feeling super inspired to keep freediving, you can really tell how passionate everyone is about the sport, and it’s infectious. Will definitely be back again one day!

reviews.title: Freediving with Dahab Freedivers
reviews.text: I was in Dahab in June 2022, it was my third time that I went freediving with Dahab Freedivers. What can I say? It is like going home! The instructors are very good, the blue hole is magic and Carlos, the manager, is super nice,  a very capable instructor and the Brazilian freediving record holder! I cannot wait to going back to training with them again!

reviews.title: Want to go freediving? Pretty hard to keep up with Dahab Freedivers! Dive here!
reviews.text:
I`ve wrote a review in March 2022 focusing on my visit (I conducted the AIDA 2 course). This review focuses now on my 2nd visit (I conducted the AIDA 3 course).

Booking:
-Very friendly and efficient
-Few mails and course, accommodation and transfer was booked
-Very quick response time
-I especially liked the „looking forward to have you“ mail a few days before my trip started

Arrival:
-Pick-up was organized and all went well 

Dive center & infrastructure:
-Open from 9am-530pm and a good place to hang-out
-Always somebody around for a nice chat (in any given language)
-The center is attached to the hotel in which I stayed
-The ocean is like a 10 step walk and with a short swim you can dive to >40m
-The blue hole is a short ride with the cab (I did not go this time)
-We went also for a 2 hour session to a 30m pool facility to practice „dynamic“ -> This was probably one of the two highlights of my course. Having the pool just for us (Trainer and myself) I could focus on improving my skills and felt like a pro sportsman 

Aida 3 course -:
-I requested to take the course with the same instructor (Stephano) as I liked him and his way of teaching already in Aida 2
-They could not promise (obviously due to work schedules etc.) however they made it happened and I took the course also with Stephano
-I appreciate that the diver center made the effort to realize my wish
-If you want to learn freediving or need coaching I can only recommend Stephano
-There is nothing I could recommend him to improve in his teaching. He is a very calm Swiss which is able to explain the „complex topics from the textbook and slides“ in simple terms. He is a great coach supporting you to become (more) self aware. He is dedicated to safety and a great communicator. -> He was my second highlight of the course 
-If I do Aida 4 I would explicitly request Stephano again 

Accommodation:
-This time I stayed directly at the dive center in their partner hotel „red sea relax“
-Hotel has a close proximity to the center (attached to it)
-Staff was very friendly, breakfast was good, daily room cleaning (they forgot on first day but was not an issue at all -> Maybe they thought I sleep in due to late arrival)
-Improvement area 1: The internet is a difficult topic, it is rather slow and you are busy logging into different repeaters all the time
-> However, quite good internet at the dive center
-Improvement area 2: The room is functional but don’t expect something fancy. Some minor maintenance would make it even better (e.g., shower brush was falling almost out of the wall)

reviews.title: The place to (learn) freediving - Awesome trainers and very relxed and humble people
reviews.text:
Just top notch in every aspect. 
First to last contact was just great. 
 
Booking: 
-Good amount of information, transparency on prices and schedule 
-They advised me on having a relax day after flight (even so I did not ended up doing) but they watch out for you
-I booked my own transfer to / from airport but the double checked that everything is in place
-They wrote a “tomorrow” its start mail to get me in the mood
 I felt like they are really interested in myself
 
Course: 
-I had no freediving experience and did Aida2 
-Instructor Stephano was very very good
-He did not have super long instructor experience but a lot of freediving experience 
-He taught the course with a lot of patience, focusing on the essential topics, especially emphasizing on safety 
-He taught the course in 2 ½ days, my initial hope was to get it done in 2 days but while I was into the course I appreciated the 2 ½ days as I had even more time to learn 
 Don’t think about cutting a course short, you can learn so much from the instructors
 
Training: 
-I did two trainings session after the course (lighthouse and blue hole) 
-Both with different instructors and it was again superb 
-Very experienced free divers who just help you to get better 
-Everybody just wants to help you on your development
 
People: 
-Everybody is very calm, friendly and relaxed 
-High level to satisfy customers, nothing like „selling a session“ 
-Payment was so super easy and super trustful
-Crew with quite some remarkable achievements (personal bests) but nobody at all talks about it … very humble people

description: Vetratoria is already a well known brand that has been successfully operating for more than 9 years so far. The centre is located at the territory of Swiss Inn Resort. Vetratoria & SUP centre offers rental, lessons and storage. Surf shop with everything needed for windsurfing is available. Working hours: from 9 A.M. till 5 P.M. all year round.

reviews.title: Still the best windsurf station in Dahab
reviews.text:
I use the service of this station (near swiss inn hotel)  every year and the last time I was here last week. There is the best team I have ever seen: Boris is a very kind and helpful manager, Vika is a very friendly helpmate. All beachboys are responsive and responsible. New RRD equipment: sails from 9.2 to 4.0, boats from 80 and above, you can rent foil too. Each evening the station organizes various free after-party with the very talent animator - Igor (you can learn Salsa dance if you want, or climb to the nearest mountain, go to the city, play board games and so on). 
I strongly recommend this friendly station for the rest: sport and pleasant social community

reviews.title: Excellent place for windsurfing
reviews.text:
Very friendly staff and good rrd stuff 😉 Wide range of slalom equipment. Ready to some discounts. 

We (my wife, daughter, son and me) trained with Mahmoud - one of the best instructors that I’ve met. 
In addition, Boris is always ready to play foosball after riding 🤪 

We were glad to visit this spot and We’re ready to recommend it

reviews.title: Best place to rent and learn windsurfing
reviews.text:
I was last time in Dahab in 2012, since then nothing has changed - friendly atmosphere, nice and outgoing staff and instructors.
The school has all the needed equipment for all wind conditions.
Thanks to Sergey Iolkin (instructor) I was able to remember all the moves, that I know in windsurfing and learned planning in harness and foot straps.
Boris is an outgoing and friendly manager runs the station can answer any question about windsurfing and Dahab.

Will definitely come back some time soon.

reviews.title: VETRATORIA - windsurfing equipment rental
reviews.text:
Strong recommendation for this place from my site. Big plus :-)
Windsurfing equipment - very good and in good condition. 
Tidiness and well organisation of the place, team well skilled and very helpful.

reviews.title: Still the best place for windsurfing in Dahab
reviews.text:
The station at Swiss Inn is well equipped with stuff and instructors. You can choose a board and a sail for any condition and level of your proficiency.
A motor-boat can take advanced riders straight to the Speedy-Zone and bring them back.
There are SUP's for fun during the absence of wind.
The crew organizes different after-hours activities. Though most of the quests are Russians - you shouldn't hesitate to join the fun if you are not. The crew speaks English, and most of the quests usually also do.

Thanks to Boris and his stuff for excellent 9 days of wind, sea and windsurfing!

reviews.title: Horrible experience with the team
reviews.text:
The most rudest boss as they call and her name is “Victoria” who wouldn’t listen to her upset customer, I tried to explain my self about how upset I felt with one of her employees and his deal with me and all she could say I’m not interested to know !!! 
She was so rude I will never ever come back not even recommend them to anybody. 
The staff who I dealt with, who tried to fool me with the surfing  deal was “SAEED”.

reviews.title: Wind & fun center
reviews.text: Nice place for windsurfing.Good prices for equipment rental.Nice weather,every day windy.Delicious and cheap food.Very cheap apartment rental.Good communication with lithuania.

reviews.title: New Year in Dahab
reviews.text:
Thanks a lot to Vetrotoniya guys for the help in training me and all my family. 
Separate gratitude to the great instructor - Vadim!

reviews.title: Boris is the best manager and trainer
reviews.text: Very professional team. Rescue boat serfs the area each 30 min even outside the lagoon. Boris is the best manager and trainer. Highly recommended

reviews.title: Great place for windsurf&fun!
reviews.text:
I've been visiting Vetratoria stations for about 10 years and each time it's great experience of windsurfing and meeting friends. New equipment, experienced instructors and friendly staff. There is also a system of discounts for constant visitors.
The station is based on the beach of Swiss Inn Hotel, but it's pretty close to other hotels (Ganet Sinai, Iber, Hilton). Windsurfing conditions suites for every level: beginners usually have lessons in lagoon, professionals may go to speedy zone or waves. So come and enjoy!

reviews.title: Egypt Tour Package
reviews.text: Had fantastic time during my 1st ever trip to Egypt. I was only able to visit some of the of the more well known sights considering I had such a short stay for this trip, but the guide was knowledgable on the history and handled everything accordingly. I would recommend everyone to visit.

reviews.title: Egypt holiday package
reviews.text: We visited Egypt, Sharm el Sheikh together with friends. We made different activities - city tour, dolphin show, trip to Cairo, transfers, etc. Thanks to our guide Amr Ezz for the excellent organization.

Beautiful and adventurous dives in the colorful red sea with very spontanious and helpful staff!
Loved it there!! (may/june 2019)

reviews.title: Amazing time in nabq
reviews.text: The trip to Nabq was mindblowing! It rose above our expectations: snorkeling the wreck and seeing the beautiful untouched corals was amazing. Chatting at night in the Bedouin tent and looking at all the stars was beautiful. You guys are such lovely people! Thank you!

reviews.title: Genuine Fun
reviews.text: Thanks guys for taking us to Nabq!!! The place was definitely above expectations! I loved freediving on the wreck and the sunset The stars at night were incredible. You are lovely hosts, kind and interesting and funny! We laughed a lot! صباح الفل

reviews.title: Life is good!
reviews.text: Every time I get more impressed and amazed than before! Tried simple hiking, snorkeling in Ras Muhammad and it was awesome! then went hiking, climbing and trekking in St. Catherine and it was mind-blowing! then went diving with "Bob" and it was exceptional! thank you guys for making life good! for creating unforgettable lovely memories <3 Can't wait to see you again!

reviews.title: Thanks Sinai Gate
reviews.text: Great experience with Sinai Gate. I spent 3 days in Dahab where I was able to do snorkelling, hiking and diving. The team is very professional, the atmosphere is family friendly and the service impeccable. 100% experience validated! Thanks again Bob and Medhat for a great stay!

reviews.title: Dahab
reviews.text: I had an awesome time with the awesome dedicated team of Sinai Gate!!! Thanks for the great time!!! 😊❤️

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.text: Beautiful place with good vibes and the best people on Sharm, both locals and tourists makes this place absolutely magical. Do yourselves a favour and visit!

reviews.title: Best place for travelers
reviews.text:
Fantastic. 
The owner Bob is the nicest down to earth person, supper funny and a professional diver. The hostel is a must visit place with stunning sunset views. Rooms are great too and there are options for everyone. 
I booked a scuba trip to the Thislegorm shipwreck and everything was fine. Enjoyed.
I would definitely visit again when I'm in Egypt. 
Recommend

reviews.title: First Time Diving
reviews.text:
Professional and friendly. 
I was afraid to even swim in deep water, but Medhat helped forget my fears and I did my first dive of 8.5 meters. It was such an awesome experience!

reviews.title: Life is good at Sinai Gate
reviews.text:
As it turned but soon, with choosing Sinai Gate I didnt get a hostel, but a home and a family! No matter if diving, snorkeling, hiking, jamming or simply hanging out - its always a nice vibe around with the Professional but fun guides as well as other guests.
So, this is for sure a place to come back to! Also I heard they opened another house in Sharm el Sheikh - will for sure check it out on my next Sinai trip!

description: Lagona Divers has been offering diving activity's in Egypt since 1994. Our main goal is to deliver high quality scuba diving services. In all our scuba diving courses we aim to create reliable and competent scuba divers. Our dive center Lagona Divers North is located at the Hotel Tropitel in very close distance to the famous dive site Blue Hole. We offer all scuba diving courses from the Open Water Diver course until Divemaster. Certified Divers can enjoy guided or unguided dives at our beautiful house reef or join full or half day excursions to all dive sites around Dahab accompanied by an experience dive guide. With the safety aspect in mind, we offer Nitrox FOR-FREE to all our customers (if EANx certified). All Activities can be booked on-site or you can contact our service center in Germany where our staff is available for all your questions, bookings and suggestions concerning our dive centers. Our friendly team will be happy to answer your questions by email or phone.

reviews.title: Perfect dive school
reviews.text: We booked our advanced adventurer course in advance because we stayed at Tropitel. We met Samy and he was very helpful, friendly and fun to dive with. After the course we decided to do also our Nitrox course. We have seen the most beautiful corals and colorful fish. We really liked it her.

reviews.title: Professional divecenter with a beautiful house reef
reviews.text: Great divecenter, professional setup, nice people and a really beautiful housereef which is only a few steps away from the divecenter … what more do you need?

reviews.title: Professional and friendly club
reviews.text:
Straight A club, proffesional, and friendly , realy pleasent to come and dive with.
Hamid and abdu are super
And conducted with the permanent smile of die mächtige dame lucy its a winning team.
Highly recomended.

reviews.title: Great Little Dive Centre and Site
reviews.text:
We were staying at the hotel, where the school is situated. My eldest son dis his SSI Open Water qualification with the team at Lagona Divers.  I am an instructor already, and I was very happy with their attention to detail, safety and the overall approach to having fun, whilst diving safely.
My youngest son, who is 11, also did 2 try dives with them.
I couldn't be more happy with our time diving with them.

reviews.title: Great center!
reviews.text:
In short: we loved diving with the team of Lagona Divers! 
It was the most caring diving crew I have been with and the best experience I had with the sea! My friend and I dove with the crew for 5 days on different spots - it was lovely! They cared for us and made the trips most amazing. The house reef is beautiful and the spots they took us to were perfect for more than one dive per day with a lunch break with good food between the dives. We had lots of fun! I had similar diving sessions in tourist places before around the globe but none of the centre makes me feel as confident or comfortable to explore the sea like they did before. Highly recommend!

reviews.title: Loved diving with lagona divers
reviews.text: We stayed at the tropitel hotel for about 10 days and went diving on half of them. We really enjoyed diving in dahab, specially with the super friendly dive staff from lagona divers. Samy helped us with everything and we felt super welcomed. Diving with Hamid and Mohammad was super nice and we felt safe all the time. The house reef itself is very beautiful and I guess one of the spots where you can dive unguided. The prices are fair, especially if you go diving for a couple times. Equipment is also fine. We can definitely recommend lagona divers ☺️

reviews.title: Great dive center
reviews.text: Great diving center! Relaxed atmosphere, nice team, good equipment. Asking experiences and preferences- Before the dive explaining the dive route, repeating hand signals, body check etc. For me as an in experienced diver perfectly done! Handled also my upraising anxiety under water very well! Would definitely dive here again;-)

reviews.title: Best dive center in the whole south sinai
reviews.text: I did one week of diving with Lagona Divers in the Hotel Tropitel. I have to say the service was more then excellent! The guides where very experienced and did a very good job showing me the underwater life of the gulf of Aqaba! The dive center manager Samy did also an excellent service by suggesting my the best schedule for my stay! I will definitely come back!

reviews.title: Thank you guys!!!!
reviews.text: ‪Lagona Divers – Dahab North‬ is definitely one of the best diving centres that i had visit, with amazing, professional and lovely team, Lucy and Amr was so kind and i had so much fun with them. Thanks to Amr I felt confident, learned a lot of new things and just enjoyed every moment. Thanks again and I'll definitely come back again!

reviews.title: amazing test dive
reviews.text: We had a test dive for 30 minutes with the maximal depth of 12 meters and it was amazing!! they are all so kind and careful! really a great experience!

reviews.title: Freediving course Aida 2
reviews.text:
I have finished my AIDA 2 course In dahab . With instructor Omar,firstly he was friendly person When I meet him ,  He explains everything and answer my questions about free-diving then we started my training session 
I felt confident and he have much information, and I trust him we star some training before trying dive at the end of my training level I could get down to 18m and 2 min static. And I try dividing in blue hall for my first with him.

Very professional freediving instructor, wish you all the best and looking soon to continue next level .

reviews.title: Best Freediving Center and Coach!
reviews.text:
Did AIDA 2, and 3 there. Omar is a very knowledgeable and smart coach. The learning expirence was always good, smooth, and Omar always made it less stressful and more fun. 

I have witnessed a lot of students with different problems in equalization, depth, technique, .. etc, and Omar always managed to solve the issues for them by the end of the course, especially equalization problems.

The equipments in the center are new and always clean and sanitized. Also the center is located in a very good place near to everything in Dahab. 

I definitely recommend FNE and Omar to everyone who wants to learn (or even improve) freediving! :)

reviews.title: Freediving is the best
reviews.text:
It was such great experience to learn how to do freediving.. to everyone who is looking to feel more alive , you must freedive .. -=Freediving N Egypt =- is a really good center to star your new passion ... You will make friends .. Training well .... Also take your self to a new limits.... You will meet Dr. Omar the owner and your trainer ... Polite .. educated .. professional ...funny.. great trainer and a better friend.

-= Freediving N Egypt =- 💚💛🧡💙❤️💜
Dahab ❤️💛💙

reviews.title: AIDA 2 and AIDA 3 course
reviews.text:
Freedive N Egypt quickly becomes your home away from home while you stay in Dahab! Omar is always available to help you with anything and is one of the most friendly souls I have ever met! I did my AIDA 2 with Sol, and I couldn’t have asked for a better match for me! She quickly understood my strengths and weaknesses and brought the best out of me as an athlete. If you are looking for a female instructor, you couldn’t find one better than her. I already miss her dearly. 

So where do I begin. I initially headed to Dahab in 2017 to freedive and have a look-around. I made it there and completed my AIDA 2 with Omar. Omar was calm collected and helped identify my equalization problems early on. What a top lad. Loved the lighthouse for diving, Omar and the Dahab experience and desperate to go back.  

Made it back to Dahab a few times since 2017 but never long enough to complete my AIDA 3. Fast forward to Covid 19 and stuck in Dahab. Happy days. I complete my AIDA 3 with Rafa and Omar and it was just a superb. Hit a new personal depth best and made fantastic friends along the way. 

Omar was patience, knowledgeable, professional and focused during training. If your looking to try freediving contact Omar. If you want to improve contact Omar. You will not regret it.   

Go check out his fancy new shop.

reviews.title: Incredibly knowledgeable freediving instructor
reviews.text: My experience with FNE was incredible. I came in to freediving without any previous experience and to only do one course. I enjoyed it so much, I decided to do AIDA 2, 3, and 4. I feel very lucky to have learned freediving from Omar. He is experienced, kind, and very reliable. He is a true master of freediving.

reviews.title: Great quality lessons
reviews.text: Had a really pleasant experience with Omar refining my equalization techniques. Very professional and helpful atmosphere! Highly recommended

reviews.title: Very professional and friendly
reviews.text:
I finished AIDA2 with Freedive N Egypt and I'm preparing to finalize AIDA3 this year with their amazing instructor (Omar) also he helped me to solve my equalization problem.
I did many sessions (more than 10) during 2019 and 2020 and I felt very comfortable with this place.

reviews.title: Highly recommended
reviews.text: Omar is a fantastic teacher. He is just the right combination of fun and serious, making his classes enjoyable as well as educational. He takes safety extremely seriously and throughout my time diving with him I always felt well taken care of. I recommend Freedive N Egypt to anyone looking to improve their freediving skills. Whether you are a complete beginner or an experienced diver you will always learn something new, challenge yourself and have a lot of good laughs.

reviews.title: Free diving Course ( AIDA *** )
reviews.text:
AIDA ***
Its great to be trained and learned from this gentelman , the person whose first and main priority is safety then safety , then technics and skills , and never concerned about how long we held our breath ( Static Apnea ) or even how deep we reached. His main target is “ Safety comes first “ Thanks Prof and I appreciate your effort .

reviews.title: Good experience
reviews.text:
It was awesome experience and so good instractors:)
And lesson was really good!
I really recommend this dive center!

description: Dahab Safari Day Tours is a local company with a reputation for excellence and top-notch service and delivery. We can arrange custom tours and safaris to all the top safari destinations in Egypt. In Cairo can visit Giza Pyramids, Sphinx & Egyptian Museum. In Luxor visit Karnak & Luxor Temples, the Valley of the Kings, and the Temple of Hatshepsut In Aswan visit Abu Simbel Temple, Philae Temple, and High Dam. In Sharm el-sheik to do Diving and Snorkeling, Quad Biking, and Aqua Park. In Dahab visit Mount Sinai and St. Catherine’s Monastery, Blue Hole, The Colored Canyon, and Sinai interior. We also offer tours to Jerusalem and Jordan to visit Petra. With Dahab Safari Day Tours you will find the right trip for your time, budget, and interests.

reviews.title: Unpleasant tour guide for quad bike trip
reviews.text:
We booked 3 activities through this company. I wanted to mention the quad biking trip as this would be worth booking with another company. All the tyres were bald & my bike had no headlights which is downright dangerous coming back over rough ground at night. The tour guide introduced himself as Nemo & clearly thought himself hilarious. He kept pestering me for small amounts of extra money which I don’t mind giving as the amounts were so small but when I queried it he called me a ‘difficult woman’. He claimed he told me about the extras which is not true. It would be easier to just include everything in the tour price to avoid this unpleasantness 

We also booked our airport taxi for $25 & the driver was lovely 

Also booked the Bedouin fire show evening which was entertaining I would suggest you don’t bother with the food though

reviews.title: Amazing start to finish
reviews.text:
I booked. Couple of tours with Dahab for my trip to Egypt in January 2023.
Firstly, communication with Dahab was flawless. They responded very quick to initial emails, after which all communicated via WhatsApp. Very swift and helpful responses. The team were on the ball.all the time, from initial enquiries to booking and even after booking.

Secondly, they were very helpful in planning pir trips. Even when I wasn't sure what I wanted, they were very helpful in making suggestions and making sure that my days were utilised to the maximum.

In Cairo, we had an entire day to ourselves as we waited for our midnight plane back to Sharm. They could have just left us to our own devices after our tour but they ensured that both the driver and guide spent the entire day with us until airport drop off,  making sure that, as 2 lone women, we weren't left alone.

As far as customer service, I give top marks and woild recommend to all.

The tours, we booked the Combined Sunset and Sunrise hike in Sinai Mountains and the Pyramids of Giza....both tours were amazing. We were well looked after, the driver came on time and all of our tour guides were brilliant. The itinerary of both tours and activities that Dahab booked for us were brilliant.

Top marks and could not speak higher of them

reviews.title: Great fun, but be aware if infirm and/or elderly
reviews.text: We went on three trips: White Canyon, Blue Hole and Mount Sinai Sun-Rise. They were all good experiences (a) White Canyon was absolutely great, although we didn't realise that you had to descend into the canyon by rope - good fun (for us), but not if infirm and/or elderly - please be aware (b) Blue Hole was fun and relaxing (c) Mount Sinai Sun-Rise was spectacular, although, again not if infirm and/or elderly, as it involves 3 hour walk up 2,500 feet during the night - we're in our late 50s, and we were exhausted (& ached for a few days afterwards), but the view is fantastic and amazing. Raheem is an affable guy, who understood our needs and arranged the trips - good, reliable guy.

reviews.title: Short - Powerful - Grateful
reviews.text:
Was for a short stay in Dahab. Booked an amazing hike on the Moses Mountain.

From Pick up to get us back, was a great service experience.

After I booked them for my drive to the airport, great, clean service.

Will be back soon. thank you.

reviews.title: Worth every penny, and every moment.
reviews.text: We had an amazing trip, the guides were really nice and friendly, their english was much more than understandable, very informative and helpful with translation with the local bedouins. Getting up the mountain in middle of the night in December, is bitter cold, until the sun comes up, reccomended to take an extra jacket if donig the sunrise trip.

reviews.title: Great experience
reviews.text: We spent 3 day in the desert and felt so taken care of. The landscape ist awesome, we slept under the stars and had so much food prepared for us. Bedouin Tee and fresh baked bread 3 times a day. We couldn't eat so much. We felt very safe. Kids can manage the tour easily. My son is 10 and he had a lot of fun with the camels and the camping. We can highly recommend dahab Safari tours

reviews.title: Tour to Petra
reviews.text: Very interesting tour with professional guides and perfectly organized. Petra is amazing and impressive.

reviews.title: Two days of fun
reviews.text: We had two different days with these guys, and had great fun both days. Diving in the Blue Hole, 3 Canyons and Moray Gardens, and quad bike driving both days too. So much fun, really accommodating

reviews.title: Great experience! Highly recommend
reviews.text: My experience with Dahab Safari was excellent. My partner and I booked the Mount Sinai Sunrise Hike Tour with them and it was awesome. Everything ran so smoothly that we decided to book the Petra 1 Day tour with them. Again, the tour was organized extremely well, and our guide was amazing. They were quick to respond, flexible, and offered the best value. I would highly recommend Dahab Safari.

reviews.title: Nice experience 2day Luxor
reviews.text:
Did a 2day Luxor tour from Cairo by airplane. Driver was on time to and from Cairo Airport. In Luxor, the representative was already waiting when we landed. We then met our guide Hgreta.  On ocassion, she was a bit fast but on time, knowledgeable and gave us everything to make it an enjoyable and a satisfying trip. 
The overnight hotel Lotus (Luxor) had a pool,  nice staff, with a lovely view of the Nile river. They didn't accept credit cards, only cash (lobby ATM) and the food was disappointing. 

We had a few hours on the 2nd day to relax a bit and enjoy the pool, continue touring, then to the airport back to Cairo late evening.
Overall, we enjoyed the trip.

reviews.title: Best diving holiday ever.
reviews.text: Can I please go back? After 10 days of diving, I was definitely not ready to say goodbye to the people at iDive Dahab. I booked the holiday with Hans, and he arranged everything for us; hotel, transfer, dives, you name it. It was perfect, we only had to worry about whether we enjoyed to the ultimate maximum. Our Dive Master Jan was also great at every dive, always enthusiastic, always just as excited about the fish as we (as total noobs) were. Furthermore, Ahmed, the driver and another Dive Master, was so nice every day. Helping with getting our gear ready, and even taking us to a Bedouin dinner in the desert. At the goodbye hugs with everyone, I almost wanted to cancel my flight. This was the best.

reviews.title: Dive Wow! Work Later!
reviews.text:
Wow! That was amazing.

Thanks Hans. Thanks Clemi! Thanks Ahmed! I had a pleasure time at your dive shop and at all the dive spots you have shown us. I can strongly recommend this dive shop - lead by a SSI Platinum Pro Diver. For sure it´s the best chance to see the best dive spots and learn more about the art of diving.

This dive trip changed my life - in  a 100% possitve way. 
Keep it up.
Jean-Paul

reviews.title: Excellent dive centre
reviews.text: We arranged our accommodation, transfers and diving by email with Hans, and everything went like clockwork. It was great to be staying at the same hotel where the dive centre was based. We did all 6 dives with Hana, who was wonderful and looked after us beautifully.  The dive sites were great, especially Gabr-El-Bint, and spotting the turtle made my holiday!

reviews.title: Brilliant diving!
reviews.text: I spent 4 days with Idive dahab and loved it. Nice friendly guides, fantastic diving and very good cheap accommodation. Hans (the manager) was the best at fixing things! And I'm very happy to say that safety always came first, which I think is really important. Thank you Jan, Ashmed, Mike and Hans for great days!

reviews.title: Dahab diving
reviews.text: Have dived with Pharaoh dive centre at El Quiseir so booked with I-Dive through this association.  Was thrilled with service provided by Jan and Simi, a great selection of sites visited and excellent house reefs.

reviews.title: Experiencing egypt, diving the red sea, and making amazing memories!
reviews.text:
This winter I visited Dahab, and Egypt in general for the first time, and ended up in the I-Dive center to test out diving in the red sea.
The relaxed and warm atmosphere directly made me feel welcomed and comfortable around Hans and his team. They never make you rush, and organize every day after the chilled and easygoing lifestyle of the small City. There was no sign anywhere of the danger of sinai they show in the media. 
A great place to escape from the stress of real life, and to experience Egypt far from the big masses of tourism. 
The diving itself is truly recommendable! The abundance of wide spread corals and marine life amazed me from the first dive onwards. The guides are always friendly and also take care of you in between the dives. There are good restaurants at every dive site, where you can spend the time in between relaxing in the sun, or having a fresh juice.

Hans and his team surely give their best to provide you a pleasant holiday, and also organize activities outside of the water to see attractions around the area. 
I truly enjoyed my time with I-Dive, and cannot want to go back for the next time!

reviews.title: Brilliant!
reviews.text:
I have only good things to say about iDive in Dahab.
I was there for 3 month and it was the best decision. The people there are really friendly, cooperative and you get part of them in the first seconds. Furthermore the divetraining is on the highest level. I really want to go back as soon as possible!
If you want, they organize safaris for you to Ras Mohammed, Thistlegorm and many more points. And also the hotel can be booked with Hans from iDive.
To say something about the political situation. I never felt unsave or uncomfortable! All the people there are so nice and none of them wants to scare you! I really can recommend you to go there and have a really nice time. You won`t regret it.

Also the Open Ocean Sience Centre, a marine biology center is associatet to the iDive Divingcenter. You can do Courses there, where you get really good informed about the Sea and the ecosystem of the coralreef. Especially this I really can recommend.

In gernerell, iDive operates in a sustainable manner. They have a collecting station for plastics and cans, which they give to beduins to recycle it.
You also notice this manner, to protect the reef and the enviroment, in their diving. The quality of this is very important for the whole team. They all use easy entrances, you are not allowed to touch anything or destroy anything and also they made a bouyancy park, to train you in your bouyancy and make yourself feel better, because you can improve your diving skills.

At least I just want to thank the whole team for the really nice and unforgettable time in iDive Dahab. I will never forget these positiv experience! THANKS to Hans, Sheikh Salem and the rest of the brilliant team!!!

reviews.title: More than just a Holiday
reviews.text:
I have a great time here in Dahab. iDive and his owner Hans Lange are to me the first port of contact in Dahab. The diving center arranged for me my whole holidays. Everything from the 
Transfer to the choice of hotel and the dives are perfect organized. I have a great time here, with a lot of interesting dives an fun! Thanx to the whole iDive Staff! I will be back.

reviews.title: Perfect dive in Dahab
reviews.text:
We spent a wonderful journey in Dahad. It was the perfect place to pass the certification open water and advanced, weather and water conditions are just easy. And of course the iDive team is great, Hans is a passioned instructor, we enjoyed the high quality of the courses! 
Plus, the team is really friendly, we shared nice moments with all of them, underwater but also after dives sessions! 
I totally recommend iDive center for the quality of the team and the organization! 
Thanks a lot Hans. 
Hope you're doing well. 
Nelly

reviews.title: Amazing Diving Experience and Marine Research Facilities!
reviews.text:
iDive Dahab is a brilliant dive centre in a perfect location close to stunning coral reefs in excellent condition. The quality of the staff, training, equipment, research facilities and dive sites were all exceedingly high.
It's location in the scenic grounds of the Jowhara hotel meant it was very large with seating and washing areas and plenty of storage for equipment. The rental equipment was all very well maintained and provided comfortable diving. The quality of dive training was professional yet fun and made me feel very confident.
 A huge bonus of the dive centre was the on-site Open Ocean Science Centre where there were superb scientific lab facilities and numerous marine biologists carrying out various projects, all who are willing to answer any questions about the reef! Also the dive centre was very environmentally aware, with mandatory try dives to protect corals and recycling bins on site which is particularly important in Dahab.
I highly recommend this dive centre to anyone looking for a well organised, relaxed and very good value for money diving experience in a beautiful location. Or for any scientists looking for a well equipped base for any coral reef research.
Run with true German efficiency and with friendly, welcoming staff with a wealth of knowledge and experience. I consider this dive centre a home away from home and will definitely return here for future diving trips and scientific research, 10/10!

description: Dahab Divers Lodge is a PADI Five Star Dive Resort with a home atmosphere combined with quality, experience and passion for diving. Existing since 1997. We stationed approximately 100 meters from the sea, near the well known Lighthouse area in Dahab. Even if you are an experienced diver already or you want to upgrade your knowledge we are the right choice to make your holiday unforgettable. We organize recreational diving and quality training courses ranging from PADI Scuba Diver - till PADI Divemaster. Not only can you come to dive with us, we also provide accommodation with air conditioning and breakfast. Allow us to invite you to the peaceful underwater world, because we believe this will be an unique experience for your life. Useful Information: Activities for young children.

reviews.title: Don’t hesitate to book with them your next Dive

reviews.title: Loved

reviews.title: Great first experience with diving!
reviews.text: This was my first experience diving and I loves it. The people were really nice and the diving instructors are good, they are strict and clear, but they are able to have fun when appropriate. They are honest and are willing to help.

reviews.title: Lovely experience
reviews.text:
It was a lovely experience with a very professional trustworthy caring team. I felt in good hands throughout the entire open water course. 
Totally recommend for anyone who wants to enjoy the activity and feel safe.

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.text: We dived with Bahr and Ibrahim and everything was perfect. They made us feel safe the whole trip. 100% recommand.

reviews.title: Highly recommend
reviews.text: Really recommend for diving! Very well maintained equipment, excellent diving instructors and very professional handling all around:) I was lucky enough to be the only diver for that dive site and we got to enjoy the canyon by ourselves and saw so much beautiful marine life!! I am looking forward to coming back ♡

reviews.title: Great diving, excellent guide and company
reviews.text: These guys are top notch. We had Bakr as our guide, and he was excellent. Saw a lot of great sea life, and had an excellent time at the Blue Hole. Id highly recommend checking them out if you want a great diving trip. They were professional, safe, and allowed us to have an awesome time diving in Dahab.

reviews.title: Professional, fun and great value for money
reviews.text:
Great staff and team, very professional and quite friendly. The management is quite selective with their instructors and I dove with several of them and non failed to impress. Also the feedback I got from other students who dove with different instructors at the center was that they had quite a similar experience as mine. Although they might not be the cheapest, they are definately not the most expensive, but if you consider their quality to price you would quickly realize that they offer great value for money.

I did my PADI Open water with Hady and Advanced with Mamdouh. Both had different styles of teaching but all in all they were quite knowledgable, professional and really show you the fun in diving. Other fun dives I did with Amr, also quite knowledgable and quite comfortable around marine life, just ask him to tell you his stories with his memorable situations and show you the videos. Spoiler alert it involves being stranded alone in the middle of the sea with a curious shark ;)

The place itself is like a small family, highly recommend for solo travellers (as I was) they are quite accomodating and hospitable. So long as you respect their time and not abuse their friendliness.

reviews.title: just a visit
reviews.text: this hotel/dive centre is 5* a fantastic dive organisation near dahab centre but also quite. very helpful hotel if you are going to dahab solo, or with company or family look no further than booking here.

reviews.title: Best diving center
reviews.text: One of the best diving centers ,extremely experienced well trained, professional polite educated certified staff , they make u feel like u known them since forever..

reviews.title: Thank you Sylvie, George and Rene - we will be back
reviews.text: We dived with Extra Divers in Dahab in late Feb to early March this year. The diving was superbly organised. Every member of the team - Sylvie, Rene, George, Muhammad and Omar were all amazing. Friendly, professional and brilliantly organised. The diving was quiet and our morning dives were just us! Even the Blue hole. The viz wasn't the best but because we could spend plenty of time without other divers, we loved it. We will go again next year.

reviews.title: Definitely recommended!
reviews.text: Great Divecenter, I reeeally recommend! You are in very good and professional hands. I had a great time, all of them are very nice, helpful and funny! And the Divesides are stunnig!

reviews.title: Best diving ein Dahab
reviews.text: If you want to dive, then these are your guys !! I did my owd with my teen son. Georg is the most competent, patient and reassuring instructor I have met ( had bad experiences in the past ). The entire team are super friendly and very accommodating, making every dive experience fantastic and fun !! I can’t recommend this diving school enough !! Kudos and thanks !

reviews.title: Great diving with a professional guide
reviews.text: Spent four days full of unforgettable impressions. Instructors Sylvia and Rene are people who for real love the sea. Attentive and experienced instructors. They truly know marine life and are generous in sharing their knowledge. All divings are very interesting and fascinating! Highly recommended for all!

reviews.title: Great dive company!
reviews.text: I spent a week diving with Extra Divers - good quality equipment, friendly and professional staff who were very attentive and always made sure I was comfortable and happy, which was a huge confidence boost. Can’t recommend them enough and will most definitely be returning to them again in the future!

reviews.title: Thanks!
reviews.text: We were on a short family holiday and with kids, things always need adjusting and Sylvia was very accommodating. Sadly, I only got to do three dives but felt very comfortable with Rene as I needed some literal and figurative hand-holding. Thanks so much and hope to see you guys next time!

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.text:
I completed my SSI open water diver in Dahab at Extra Divers Dahab.

It was a wonderful experience; Sylvie 1, Sylvie 2 and Mohamad all are professional and friendly.

I was planning for this course for over a year and I have seen almost every course on the YouTube.
Extra Divers Dahab and Sylvie 2 helped me to achieve it in unique way.
1st you are on vacation and you are here to enjoy diving.
They don’t start from swimming pool as there special location on a nice lagoon allows them to start immediately in the sea.
You learn while you dive, 
other courses stuff your mind with all the skills that you need to learn during the course in the swimming pool then you go to the sea to practice it and you are stressed.

If I’ll repeat my OWD course I’ll never think about other please and I’ll not hesitate to go Extra Divers Dahab. 

thank you Extra Divers Dahab.

reviews.title: Great diving with Extra Divers in Dahab!
reviews.text:
I enjoyed many great dives with Extra Divers in Dahab at the end of October. All the instructors are very professional in preparing and planning for the diving with high focus on safety. All the equipment provided is in tip top condition. I felt very safe in the company of these guys!
All the instructors are very experienced and very friendly - making each dive an enjoyable and beautiful experience as well as an opportunity to learn something new.
There are many dive sites and almost all are accessible from the shore. They are convenient to get to by jeep and the instructors know when to go where to avoid the crowd.
Dahab is great for both diving and other water sports (good wind). It has an overall good atmosphere, and it is a spot it is easy to wish to come back to!

reviews.title: Back for more diving...Better every time...Will come back for more diving for SURE!!
reviews.text: Back again to Dahab...Back again to dive with Extra Divers...Last year was fantastic...But again this year even better...Can't stop diving with these friends with extra divers you find great guides...technical knowledge in any way and helping with everything to make your diving a great experience and going forward every dive...Its very hard to leave that's for me very hard because I love diving and with Extra Divers is a growing experience every time...Yes will come back next year for sure...This year was special because also reach my 100th dive...a fantastic funny dive to remember!! Great people to dive and to have some chill out time sometime...But remember always Diving with respect of PEOPLE.. the SEA and RESPONSABILITY TO ALL...Extra divers work very hard to make guests safe in any way...Be responsable to yourself by allow to rest and always be on time!!! Keep going Extra Divers...Come back for sure!!! Danke!! Thank you....Grazie....Merci...and of course Shokoran...

reviews.title: Couldn't stop diving
reviews.text: I and my hubby just spent 1 week in Dahab. Didn't really come because of diving but after visiting the diving center we have changed our minds. Together they create one amazing team we really enjoyed. I wanted to have one day off just lying on the beach but couldn't do that and went for one dive with Sylvie 2, our great luxembourgish instructor. Hope to see you guys soon to finish the open water scuba dive ;-)

reviews.title: Perfect day: canyons + sandboarding + picnic in the desert. All pleasures at once!
reviews.text:
We started at 4 am to get away from the hot and headed to canions. Ashraf knows the best canions around Dahab, not where everyone goes. They are more tricky to pass, more narrow, and some of them end with viewpoints!
If you are a bit scared, Ashraf has a rope to help you. We went without the rope :-D 
I was the only one guest and I wanted to have it all, and we did it! Amazing!
Climbed some rocks to see the view, passed through some canions, had a coffee on the campfire, did sandboarding also, and finished with the lunch with shisha.
Next day I got cool photos and videos!

What I want to say here:

1. Ashraf is not like a typical guide making standard trips for a crowd. No. He will ask what you want and will do exactly what you want. It worth the money 200%.  
He lives in Dahab for more than 20 years, knows very special places including geological formations 3 days far away from Dahab (lucky you if you are a geologist), knows some religious places, can make a real tour to White and Black deserts as well (a real tour, no 20 meters from the main road). He is a professional.

2. He is reliable, always on time, if he says 4:00 am in the morning, it will be 4 am exactly. No "Inshalla", no "arabic time", nothing like that. He says - he does. Very rare quality I should say.

3. He does more than it was planned to make people happy. In my case I expected it to be like 2 canions, but we had time for 3 canions (even I was too tired to climb on top of the last one), sandboarding, 1 viewpoint and coffee and lunch. It's like everything in one day!

My best recommendations to Ashraf, and I will come back for the next trip. Now I know with whom to go to the Black and White deserts.

reviews.title: Desert bedouin dinner
reviews.text: I spent an evening at the desert with Ashraf... He prepared a great bedouin dinner. It was dark, the sky showed just the moon and some stars... It was great!!! The silence together with a great meal and good company, what else does one need !!!

reviews.title: Sinai At It’s best day tours
reviews.text:
The trip was amazing,i felt free,happy and safe. 
I was visited definitely different hidden place in dahab with beautiful sky view, incredible shooting stars and totally clearly Milky Way .
The views in the morning with sunshine into far ends of seeview I had seen only in my dream. 
Also I was hiking twice with a different experience by sandy mountain .
I decided to changed my booking list to spent more time with this place .
it real experience and adventure in Sinai not the fake trips u get nowadays.
Thank you dear Mr Ashraf (Abo Seif) ,he really loves dahab and he make you enjoying and love it.

reviews.title: Definitely must-do trip
reviews.text:
The trip was amazing! Ashraf (guide) knows a lot of interesting facts about the area, shows you beautiful hidden places, and encourages you to explore the places around. 
The guide and the trip both were above our expectations and definitely one of the best parts of our trip to Dahab!

reviews.title: A dream experience in real life
reviews.text:
Ashraf was an amazing host through the desert. I felt free and safe and got to see such beautiful  places. We drove through landscapes that i had only seen in photographs before. I experiences a silence i could only imagine. The views into far ends of a vast dry land, mountains, big open sky above us. 

Before sunset het laid out everything needed for a dinner prepared by campfire, under a starlit sky. As we cut and pealed the vegetables i would see the scenery change from sunshine to moonlight. So many stars. So incredibly beautiful. 

Thank you dear Ashraf, i will never forget this experience.

reviews.title: Laura Ghanem
reviews.text:
Thank you Ashraf for everything! You are the best guide out there! He is passionate about Dahab and know everything and every place by heart. He is always making sure that we are safe and happy!
Its my second time with him and not the last.
Thank you one more time Abou Seif!

reviews.title: Highly recommend
reviews.text: 1A Guide. Highly recommended! The *best* around this Area. He knows all the great and hidden places, is very kind and just a ‚perfect guide‘. Thanks for the wonderful Trip

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.text: Great trips, very friendly and loads of fun. You also learn a lot about the desert during the trip. Strongly recommend.

reviews.title: GO FOR IT
reviews.text: The best in Dahab, Ashraf is friendly, professional, and knows what he's doing. He is also flexible with planning trips according to your needs & level of experience, you can easily tell he loves and respects nature. Highly recommended.

description: Discover a fascinating world of beauty and silence, guided by genuine, experienced and ecological Bedouin guides. The Sinai desert is simply spectacular with its unique flora and fauna and its varied landscapes. It is also blessed with truly welcoming hosts: the Bedouin. Their knowledge of their environment is second to none and is shared with our guests as they are guided away from the touristic hot spots.Relaxing with a delicious Bedouin tea in the shade of a rock formation, trekking through intricate canyons off the beaten track, walking in the moonlight or simply gazing at shooting stars are just a few of the many amazing moments that the desert and its people have to offer you.Respect for nature, preserving traditional Bedouin lifestyle and exceeding our guests' expectations are our objectives. For a unique and memorable desert experience garanteed, please contact us.

reviews.title: Amasing trip in the desert
reviews.text: The most genuine and auphthentic expirienses offer in Sinai. Maruan is very profetional and has a lot of knowlage of the bedwin culture. Can also help you with taxis and generally with your travels on the area. Highly recomended.

reviews.title: Highly recommended safari with an amazing guide.
reviews.text:
I can highly recommend a safari with Sinai Safari. They are very responsive and helpful with pre trip arrangements and can be really flexible to be able to give you the experience you want. My Guide, Salah  was amazing- very knowledgeable about all aspects of the desert - best places to go, flora and fauna. He speaks very good English and he and Mohamed looked after me really well- food was plentiful fresh and tasty, ( especially fresh Bedouin bread made for every meal and amazing babaganoush cooked each lunchtime) and there was always tea- of course! They found some great places to sleep out- great views but sheltered and made sure I was warm
And comfortable enough. I was on my own and felt very safe and comfortable. I wanted to walk on my own and Salah was able to plan a route on a daily basis that enabled me to do this while still being safe and not getting lost! 
All in all a truly authentic and awe inspiring experience with very kind and knowledgeable guide.

reviews.title: Exploring the wadis
reviews.text: Beautiful 3 day-trip in the desert with a great crew. We were a group of 8 people and logistics was perfect. Good and accurate information about the environment, the Bedouin culture and more has been provided. Well recommended tour operator for Sinai.

reviews.title: Amazing weekend in the desert
reviews.text: Maruan's desert safari was an absolute joy. Our family had such a wonderful experience. Maruan is a professional; our trip was very organized and all of our needs were anticipated. However, he is also super relaxed and is a great storyteller! His passion for the desert and for the Bedouin people is apparent in the outstanding experience he provides. And the food...AMAZING! Highly recommended.

reviews.title: Wadi Gunai desert trip to see annual Camel Race
reviews.text: I decided to go to Camel Race trip with guys first of all course I ve heard a lot good things about them , I needed a reliable team regarding purpose of my visit which was photography. I am professional photographer and I wanted to shoot reportage about the this race. I needed not only a good tour operator but also somebody who can give me an insight of real beduin life. So I expected much and I got even more. I menage to get plenty of good shoots , I ve meat Wonderfull people on the way , greate food, good company , well heated tent and plenty of kindness and attention. I highly recommend this Wonderfull tour company. On Sinai desert they really knows their ways.

reviews.title: Thousand Stars Sinai...
reviews.text:
Maruan is the man you need to meet if you want to have a great time in the desert: he is funny, arranging, professionnal, super helpfull and works with the nicest team ever: Salah and Awouad.  It was one of the best trecks in the desert I ever did, with the two nicest bedouin guides in the sinai I have met.
So good this is the second time I did this treck!  The scenery is so amazing you can do this 2 day discovery treck many times without ever getting tired of it. 
We spent a night in a thousand star hotel at the Grand Concorde to celebrate new years with some family and friends, and it is a thing you can only dream of, which becomes true for one magic night.
Incredible fresh food cooked by chef Awouad, suitable for vegeterian also!  The bread baked in the sand is the taste I will miss the most... 
A wonderful team who is all ears to our every need and want to make this the best experience you can have. Walking through astonishing canyons and cliffs to watch dazzeling sunsets until you head back to camp to the warm fire and the stars waiting to make the show for the night. 

I went back with them 3 days and 2 nights to watch the famous camel race in wadi Zalaga, and it was another amazing experience all super well organized again, despite the freezing cold of the place, fires were built all day long to keep you warm, and we slept in tents in really good sleeping bags.  All I want is to go back again and again to rediscover these magic secret canyons and wadis... 

Thank you so much all of you who made these moments possible, and see you soon!

reviews.title: Fantastic 2-day Desert Outing
reviews.text:
This was an amazing desert ride! The drivers/guides were the best, super helpful and incredibly welcoming. Amazing desert cooks on top of it, incredible sights, very agreeable ride (was expecting bumpy but was absolutely fine).
It was genuinely great, and amazing value for 2 days in the desert. The support staff and the organizer were a pleasure to deal with. I really could not emphasize enough what a fantastic trip it was!
I highly recommend this outing!
Many thanks guys. We will be back!

reviews.title: Infinitely grateful for this experience
reviews.text:
Spent two days and one night in the desert with Salah and Ahwad (hope I'm not butchering any names!). It was absolutely fantastic. Thank you Maruan for planning this so perfectly.
First of all our Bedouin guides were kind, resourceful, wise and caring. They catered to our every need. They'd prepare tea, coffee, breakfast, lunch, dinner, all of it so tasty and delicious. They even made the bread in front of us in the burning ashes and it was oh-so-good!
Salah guided us through the canyons for 1-2 hours walks and brought us to the most beautiful sunset for the last day of 2019.
At night the fire kept us warm and cozy and the spectacle of the night sky left us flabbergasted. Yes, "flabbergasted". We saw tons of shooting stars and the sky was so bright with stars that we could barely identify the easiest constellations. Orion, Sirius and the Pleiades watched over us all night.
I'm quite a jumpy person and the outdoors tend to be a challenge for me. This was one of the best experiences I've ever had in my life. I am so grateful to have been able to enjoy the desert that way and with great company.
Thank you x1000, Alf Shukran!!

reviews.title: Unique desert experience with amazing local flavor
reviews.text: My brother and I spent two days and one night in the desert with two amazing guides that taught us everything from Bedouin culture to desert plants. They cooked delicious meals and took care of absolutely everything from A to Z. The logistics from the very beginning were fully handled by the team and required little effort on our end. We can not recommend this experience enough! Looking forward to our next trek in the desert!

reviews.title: Real Physical!
reviews.text:
We were couple to take tour and in our group there was another 10 people from different nationality. We were picked up from hotel at 11'o click night and reach to Mount Sinai base on 12:25'o clock night. There journey started to trek the Sinai and we reached to top 3:45am. Unfortunately there was cloud hence could not see the sunrise there however view was excellent. Also you can see a church and an operational Mosque at the top where Moses used to pray to meet almighty. We started from top at 6:10am and reach to bottom at 8:45am. 

One can take camel help from the base which can be very useful if you think can't make it on foot! Also there are frequent stoppage centers where you can sit, take rest, food and water. While you start, must take enough water, light food, warm-clothes, torchlight and must have good shoes. You will get very few toilet options and certainly not hygienic without water.

Become a part of our team and learn everything about Backmount, Sidemount, Ocean Reef Full Face Mask or Rebreather diving or combine everything in an internship!

reviews.title: Best technical diving in Dahab
reviews.text: I had the pleasure of diving at Dahab Divers Technical over the last few weeks. Probably the best place for Technical Diving in Dahab. Andy and Kerstin are both excellent divers that will make sure to make you an excellent diver. They are very passionate about what they do and will gladly help with anything you might need on your trip. If you are interested in any form of technical diving I would definitely come here. The friendliness of the dive shop makes you look forward to coming back.

reviews.title: Full face mask and DPV courses
reviews.text: Had a great few days here. The team were attentive and the instructions very comprehensive would totally go back for more training and diving

reviews.title: Awesome Technical Diving
reviews.text:
If you have a good diving mentality and want to improve your technical diving skills, this is the best place.
Mr. Andy ( A professional diver and the owner of the place [IANTD and TDI instructor]) is a super professional man with a good diving experience , he knows what he is doing and will help a lot in your diving path.
For me, it will be my best technical dive centre in Dahab since i am feeling i am between my family.

Thanks Mr.Andy and Mr.Mansour ... you made me happy :)

reviews.title: Best experience ever
reviews.text: One of the best places to Excell your diving skills, very professional and passionate team, things are done with very high standards from tank labels to emergency drills. U will brag about every part of if when it's done

reviews.title: Premium Tech Diving Facility!
reviews.text:
I had the pleasure of coming into TBI (after seeing check-ins of several of my friends and instructors and feeling like I'm missing out!) and I have to say I understand why they've all ended up here. 

I was here for a week of fun tech diving and was lucky enough to have dived with both Kerstin and Andy. Both extremely knowledgeable at what they do, fun, safe, and especially kind; I came in looking for guides and came out with two brilliant mentors who took the time to help me with my diving and my learning, every day that I was there - they didn't need to!

The dive operation left me needing nothing. Airport transfers, accommodation, precision gas blending (thanks Salah!), and dive logistics and support (thanks Mansour!) were organised and carried out flawlessly. The dive op is situated right by the promenade with restaurants, shops, and Lighthouse Reef a few seconds' walk away. The only thing I was left wanting was to stay there for several more weeks!

Thanks again for everything guys, I can't wait to come back and will not hesitate to recommend anyone to come your way.

reviews.title: Technical Dive Shop
reviews.text: Well-equipped and organised tech diving shop. Run by a Swiss guy Andy, and Austrian lady Kirstin. Its mostly shore-diving here a few minutes away in a pick-up truck, and they have their house reef behind the shop for training. IANTD /TDI courses offered and re-breather training.

reviews.title: Great training and the best facilities for Technical Training!
reviews.text: We spent a month with Andy and Kirsten and couldn't have asked for a better experience. Great dive shop with top of the range equipment and filling station and we were treated like family! See you next year guys!

reviews.title: Epic
reviews.text:
When I saw the shop for the first time, I was really surprised. Competent staff, everything organized and in good condition, so much space! In a dive shop. What?

I can not imagine a better learning environment and as I progressed I realized more and more how well Kerstin and Andy prepared their shop for all your needs. There's straps, weights and tools, big classrooms, coffee, comfortable seats and they even have a golf ball for if you're diving a PRISM! Ask for any gas mix and Salah can blend it for you with unreal precision.

The atmosphere invites you to just sit outside and see what other people are doing and what gear they're using, especially with world record divers being around sometimes and teaching.

This place is just epic!

reviews.title: Best Technical Diving in Dahab
reviews.text: Just got back from spending 2 weeks with these guys in Dahab. Not only are they a very professional technical school, but they also make you feel like family! The team there are awesome and they cannot do enough to help you out! We were diving pretty much daily and tanks were always ready to go and equipment was top spec! Thank you to Andy, Kersten, Salah and Erik! For such an awesome 2 weeks of diving! I will be back again next year showing off my trim :) (with practise)

reviews.title: the best in dahab!
reviews.text:
i came to dahab with a rib and leg injury i picked up before i got here and that didn't allow me to dive at all the one month i was here.

but i used the time to do by iantd nitrox and trimix gas blender courses and i have to admit, it was one of the most useful courses that i have done so far.

andy, kerstin and salah make an excellent team. very patient and extremely knowledgeable. they made gas blending so much fun!

i also got the opportunity to see the dive centre in action from the inside out. i have to admit, it is run with swiss precision. all the gear is in excellent condition, serviced, organised. the dive planning is top class, just listening in to the plan gives you so much insights on how to plan your dive better.

team blue immersion is, without doubt, the best technical dive centre here in dahab [ there are quite a few dodgy ones around, beware! ], if not one of the best in the world.

i have no hesitation in coming back and i have no hesitation in recommending them to anybody interested in serious technical diving.

missed out on the blue hole and the canyons this time around. but i will be back to team blue immersion soon.

I was diving today with a wonderfull instructor , his name is Mostafa, really nice guy and really good in teching how to dive!! Thanks mostafa i will see you again brother.

Para los españoles como yo, solo deciros que hablan muy bien ingles y no vais a tener ningun problema para comunicaros, son profesiones e increiblemente agradables, os lo recomiendo 100%.

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.text: The best diving center in Dahab! It’s close to several diving points and the courses are good value for money. Mezo is my open water diving instructor, who’s super nice and patient. Highly recommended!

reviews.title: The best diving center in Dahab today!
reviews.text: A very good dive center and one of the most experienced and professional instructors in Dahab. Meso, thank you for the wonderful diving in October 2022, we will be back very soon) (especially diving with you in the Canyon!)

reviews.title: Best Place to Dive in Dahab
reviews.text:
7-Heaven Divers is my go-to place whenever I reach Dahab, I tried alot of diving centers in Egypt, and found that 7-Heaven is the best no doubt.

Mezo has what it takes to take you to a next-level diving experience with his skills, knowledge, and passion about scuba diving.

reviews.title: We love diving with the 7 heaven team !!!
reviews.text:
I’ve always been passionated about diving. But here’s where I have learned the big deal. The communication is great. Everyone’s lovely and makes you feel like family. The brothers and the rest of the team have a genuine interest in making everybody enjoy their time. Last summer, we’ve had a dozen dives with them, and all of them were unforgettable. 

I highly recommend them. Never seen more passionnated people. Passionnated about their job, the ocean, marine life and making people happy. Looking forward for my next dive trips with the seven heaven team.

reviews.title: The One and Only
reviews.text:
Diving with Mizo at Seven Heaven is a must when you visit Dahab. 
The most responsible and knowledgeable diving instructor. 
I’ve been there 2 times with my friend, based on a recommendation from a diving centre in Dubai… it was a golden recommendation!!
Mizo is Super helpful and generous with anything you need while you’re there in Dahab.
All of this just because he is that much passionate about his carreer, Dahab itself, and definitely marine life.
Do not think twice before you book with Mizo.

reviews.title: Diving with Mezo
reviews.text:
I began my diving journey with Mezo 4 years ago starting with open water course until i became a dive master, he made love diving which i was not interested in at all helping me through every step my diving courses and it’s always fun when i go back to Dahab and dive with Mezo.
He is one of the best instructors that i dealt with in scuba diving not just as an instructor but also as a friend

reviews.title: Ask for Mezo
reviews.text:
Mezo took me from non professional diver and he made me Scuba dive instructor and still working as scuba dive instructor. 
He made love diving and Dahab. I wouldn’t have achieved what I have now without him. 
Thank you Mezo for everything.

reviews.title: Kuies ,Mia Mia
reviews.text:
The club is very professional One of my best experiences from sini the stuff is very nice and kind .
The room is good there is a room with air conditioner. 
The diving guides are the best 
The place is feet to people that looking for place how give him professionals dive club and fair prices..

reviews.title: Brilliant
reviews.text: Few years ago I did my scuba diving AOW license there and it was such an amazing experience, we won’t again 7 years after and my wife had her first dive and it was the same staff and same amazing feeling :) will definitely go again

reviews.title: Great Kite experience
reviews.text: Thanks to Gunar for a great kiting experience in Dahab this week.  Really professional and friendly service with loads of really helpful tips and advice and some great equipment to boot!

reviews.title: GP kite very pro
reviews.text:
Thank you Gunar, was very nice trip at Dahab, and amazing kite session in lagoon and outside lagoon with you.... Thank a lot a see you soon. 

Stephane

reviews.title: Intermediate Course
reviews.text: I had four great sessions with Gunnar. I improved a lot and was able to ride the board for a good distance for the first time in both directions. He is pretty serious in his work but this is what made me progress. But he does joke a lot as well. His equipment is very nice as well. Will visit him again soon.

reviews.title: Kitesurfing at blue lagoon
reviews.text: Gunnar took us kitesurfing at the blue lagoon near dahab. Good winds, good equipment and a great teacher. The lagoon is a paradise. After five days we felt reborn. I was renting equipment, and made fantastic progress due to good tips and trics. My girlfriend did her first kitecourse, and is already standing up after a couple of days. Its not cheap, but it was worth every cent. We will be coming back soon.

reviews.title: Excellent !
reviews.text:
Gunnar is a nice guy, full of many years experience that he is happy to share! He have a really flexible schedule, which helps you a lot to take courses in your own pace! 

super nice experience!

reviews.title: Very efficient teaching and great experience in a beautiful surounding
reviews.text: Gunnar is a very experienced kite-surf trainer with whom I did 4 well structured sessions. He supported my progresses in a very competent way. He has very strong hard skills. On the soft skills' level, he is very straightforward and he sometimes takes things he explained for granted. Beginning kite-surf implies receiving a lot of new information both on a mental and physical level. It takes time and a lot of practice to integrate all this information. When something doesn't go the way it should, Gunnar sometimes show sings of impatience. But at the end of the day, it is always meant with goodwill. If you can take it, I strongly recommend his 3 days introduction course for beginners. The lagoon where the training takes place is ideal for beginning and is beautiful.

reviews.title: Great sessions with GP KITE!
reviews.text:
Kiting is great and if you have a chance to visit Dahab then go kiting with GP KITE! Excellent kiting center and great service.

They know when to go and the wind conditions and give lots of tips. It is best to rent a kite so you always have the right size. Prompt pickup from hotel and easy access to lagoon area.

reviews.title: 3 days of kitesurfing in Dahab
reviews.text:
After reading these reviews and a little kite experience I decided to undertake 3 days beginners lessons in Dahab with ''GP Kite school Dahab'' and it did prove to be a correct decision.

I got picked up in hotel everyday on time and after the lesson they took me home. We went to a beautiful lagoon in Dahab and started. I got instructor named Gert.

During  each of the steps of training I got from him always good example and personally specified explanation what I have to do to perform to progress with my skills. 

I was very satisfied with my progress hour by hour (to my surprise as I am not a big sportsmen). 

This will help me indeed to practice and progress more in my home in Austria without instructor and not to destroy or injure myself. 

Definitely when I wish to improve my skills in the future this is the kite school to go for my advanced lessons.

reviews.title: Great Kitsurfing Session
reviews.text:
Recommended by another local and kitesurfer, I found Gunnar. He has been living there since almost 10 years by now and therefore knows the spot like the back of his hand with all tides and wind predictions. He also honestly said if it was worth doing a course that day or not. 

His daily pickup made it easy to get to the spot and his well maintained equipment made  it possible to react on different wind forces. So we could switch the size of the kites accordingly. 

His style of teaching is very direct but friendly and extremely helpful. I made huge progress within just 2 sessions. Cheers!

reviews.title: Best kitesurfing session and equipment I had in Dahab
reviews.text: I was planning this trip to Dahab a year ago but finally managed to get to Dahab.everything was planned ahead with Gunnar before I reach Dahab,timing was perfect and equipments r very good, was always afraid to ride in a 22 knots but with Gunnar was really easy after I had some instructions, Iam proudly happy that I managed to switch sides without stopping in the water😉, thank you Gunnar for everything n hopefully will meet soon n keep the blowing plz

description: Fish and Friends diving centre was one of the first diving centers to open in Dahab. With our international and professional team we will have you discover the beauty of the Red Sea and create unforgettable memories. Dahab's dive sites are famous all around the world for their richness in corals and colors. They are easily accessible and their diversity suits beginners as well as experienced divers. Whether you wish to jump in for the first time or continue your training we offer all the PADI courses.
