reviews.title: A week to remember
reviews.text: I’m thinking back to my September holiday in Dahab while the snowflakes start to fall. It was by far one my favourite diving holidays. I was able to complet my rescue diver and make some of the most beautiful dives I’ve done around the world. The instructors were, friendly, fun and patient. The dive staff was helpful and friendly not to mention the great beach access. New equipment and a clean comfortable facility. I would definitely recommend!!

reviews.title: Thank you for showing us the beauty of the underwater world!
reviews.text: My boyfriend and I went diving for the first time, so we wanted to find a diving center where we would feel safe & comfortable. We definitely found this at Fish and Friends! Leo & Laura always made us feel at ease under and above the water, giving us all the time and information we needed to successfully complete the dives! All equipment was in excellent condition and the private beach was very convenient for the first dives. We had a wonderful time and e would definitely recommend this diving center to both experienced and inexperienced divers.

reviews.title: Going back for sure!
reviews.text: Amazing dive centre! The staff, rental gear, location, private beach, lounging area are all incredible. This dive centre contributed to me having the best month ever in Dahab! I did my open water course with Leo and Laura and had a great experience. It was my first time diving and they both made me feel safe and taught me so much. They were patient and very knowledgable about the aquatic life in Dahab (which is truly breathtaking). Can't wait to go back to do my advanced course!

reviews.title: Amazing!!
reviews.text:
I have the French level 3, and I have around 80 dive. 
I came to this place just for having some information about the club, how they work, the equipment, the security… 
And I really enjoyed it! 
They are really professional, they care about your safety and try their best to please you. 
Very friendly and professional. 
Do not hesitate.  I went to many different clubs, this is the one ! 

J’ai un niveau français 3 et approximativement 80 plongée. 
Je suis arrivé dans ce club au hazard, demandant des renseignements. 
J’ai adoré. 
Ils sont très professionnels, sont pointilleux sur la sécurité, très amical et font tout pour vous satisfaire. 
N’hésitez pas. Je suis déjà allé dans pleins de clubs, celui là ne vous décevra pas.

reviews.title: An unforgettable experience in a dream setting
reviews.text: I validated my Open Water at fish & friends diving center and it was a wonderful experience! The diving spots are incredible, we didn't want the session to end! Léonard and Laura are super friendly, we will have stars in our eyes and great memories all our life!

reviews.title: A diving center that feels like home!!
reviews.text: I did both my open water and advanced courses there on two separate trips, every time I leave I plan on my way back when I'll visit again! The centre is amazing (as a place and location); people there are super friendly and welcoming; best equipment I've tried (compared to other diving centers) and I learned everything from them. Best experience by far.

reviews.title: BEST DIVING SCHOOL IN DAHAB!!!
reviews.text:
My friends and I did our advanced course with them and could not be HAPPIER!! The instructor Leo and dive master Laura were so patient, caring, attentive..made us feel super safe and also tought us a lot. We really are better divers than 5 days ago! 
The gear was great and even they looked for a thicker wetsuit for me since I get uncommonly cold.

Zein the other member of the staff also made our experience! He took the best care of us in every single detail. 

I will definitely go back to fish & friends to dive with them and extremely recommend anyone to choose them. Best diving school by far!

THANK YOU SO MUCH GUYS!!!! See you soon!

reviews.title: Smooth Open Water
reviews.text: Friendly staff, great location, experienced multilingual instructors, and even a great puppy!  This is a great dive center for anyone who values good instruction. While there are cheaper options I will only dive with a Fish & Friends on future trips to Dahab! 👌🏽

reviews.title: Place Of Goooood Vibes!!!
reviews.text:
It was so nice for me to do the advanced with them, they are so kind and we feel so good in the diving centre.
I advise any one who goes to Dahab, to do his courses in this place. And i am sure i will do the next dives with them.
Thank you Amr, Leo and Nora for the beatiful moments, for the companies and the good vibes :)

reviews.title: The diving centre where you really discover yourself!!!
reviews.text: This year is 10 years I come to Dahab...I know the owners few years...and see them more after they open the pizzeria growing in quality....So this year I had the idea to dive with them....From the first day i released this is not just a diving centre  Amr is a very honest instructor on anything about diving your diving and guide you to evolve more and more....The facilities are first class with showers very helpful in a very hot day...The personn make your dive is very attentive and look after you and your equipment before and after the dive....personally i can't imagine a better service...Amr the instructor is just devoted to you to make you a better diver....i will dive with these friends next year for sure!!! Thank you very much Amr for this year great experience diving for me...

reviews.title: Incredible diving in the Red Sea!
reviews.text: Koldo is a friendly, experienced dive guide, has a good eye for the small stuff and you can really feel the love and excitement for what he does during every dive! Looking forward to diving with him again in the future 😊🐙🐠

reviews.title: Unforgettable diving!!!
reviews.text: It was a great experience. We were able to make the dives in Spanish and also Koldo is very friendly and very professional. If I return to Dahab I will return to dive with them.

reviews.title: Dahab Diving! Makaraplanet!!
reviews.text: Amazing place to dive! Brand new equipment,great location and Koldo was an awesome instructor. I'd love to go back to do it all again!!!

reviews.title: Increíble experiencia de buceo
reviews.text: Experiencia 100% recomendable con el centro de buceo Makaraplanet. Su guía Koldo ha organizado las 12 inmersiones que hice por el Mar Rojo de forma excepcional y gran profesionalidad. Gran acierto haber descubierto ese increíble lugar subacuático de la mano de Makaraplanet. Gracias!

reviews.title: Fun Dive en Dahab
reviews.text:
Increíble experiencia en Dahab, increíble el buceo, makaraplanet y Koldo. 
La experiencia bajo el agua, inexplicable, nos daba respeto entrar desde la costa pero el acceso es super sencillo y lo que encuentras es maravilloso. Era nuestro primer fun dive y no podemos estar más agradecidas. 
Koldo es un gran profesional, que se nota que disfruta con lo que hace, no solo nos llevo a lugares espectaculares, si no que también nos ayudo a mejorar nuestro buceo. Los ratos fuera del agua siempre eran amenos, con risas, tomar algo y comer en restaurantes estupendos. 
No puedo estar más agradecida, íbamos para dos días y nos quedamos una semana y más lo habríamos alargado si las vacaciones hubiesen dado de si. 
Super recomendable, volveremos en cuanto podamos  con muchisimas ganas de conocer todo lo que nos ofrece el mar rojo, pero sobretodo para poder volver a bucear con Koldo.

reviews.title: Increíble!!
reviews.text: ¡El buceo en Dahab es una pasada! Una visibilidad increíble, fácil acceso al mar, una vida marina de infarto, precios muy buenos, y, lo más importante, de la mano de un grande. De seguro, la persona que conozco que más disfruta bajo el mar. Es increíble la fascinación que tiene por todo lo que hace, y así lo transmite. Hace que los buceos sean seguros, interesantes y súper divertidos, dentro y fuera del mar. ¡Gracias por unos días tan maravillosos! Buceamos juntos en Filipinas, Dahab... ¿Cuál será el siguiente? Contando los días!!! 100% recomendado!

reviews.title: Sensaciones, conocimientos y diversión.
reviews.text:
Una excelente elección recurrir a este grupo para descubrir las maravillas del mar rojo, percibiendo tanto su gusto, respeto, conocimientos y disfrute de esta actividad, sumergirse en un entorno incomparable.
Mi agradecimiento ante el resultado de lo que fue una gran experiencia humana y deportiva junto a Koldo y su saber hacer. 
Espero poder volver a repetir sin ningún género de duda. Un fuerte abrazo y hasta pronto.

reviews.title: Increíble !
reviews.text: Han sido unos días increíbles !!! Me voy muy contento ! Muy buena Onda , mucho aprendizaje , mucho buceo y lindo momentos Definitivamente volveré por mas !!

reviews.title: Buceo Recreativo
reviews.text: Fui buscando una escuela de instructores en español y acerté porque a parte de encontrar unos auténticos profesionales encontré una familia dispuesta a hacerte sentir como si te conocieran de toda la vida y eso es de agradecer. Un lugar recomendable cien por cien.

reviews.title: Gran experiencia!! 😊
reviews.text: Grandes profesionales, organización, muy buena, es muy cómodo el sistema de inmersiones, unos sitios de inmersiones muy bonitos, coral muy sano, recomiendo 100% la experiencia! Muchas gracias por todo Koldo! Repetiremos!

reviews.title: Heaven on earth
reviews.text:
A heavenly site that needs a long trip tobreach but is worth the hassle.

I adore the site with its sandy beach and the contrast between the water land and mountains

reviews.title: Overcrowded, blaring music all day
reviews.text:
This once secluded haven of turquoise blue water is a natural lagoon. It has become overcrowded with local tourists who litter, polute the air, the water and the stillness. I had gone to meditate with my wife and daughter. Not an hour later the hoards started arriving in boats. What a disappointment.

And to clear it up, there is no good snorkeling here. This is swimming, kite surfing only. Coral reefs are on the outside of the lagoon where the wind is strong and the tide too powerful. It could easily throw you up against the corals. Not too safe.

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.text: If you want to have a relaxing day or do some kitesurfing this is the perfect spot. Be careful on what you order, there is a café in front of the kitesurfers that the tours take you to, a mango juice for 70 egiptian pounds!!!! Better don't

reviews.title: Paradise on Earth <3
reviews.text: A serene haven of beauty & comfort. A place to unwind, chill & relax. Very safe for kids as well. extremely romantic for couples. A hub for kite surfers, divers, and snorkeling activities. Food & beverage retail is available complemented with toilets facility. A must destination if you are visiting Dahab.

reviews.title: Wooooooooooooow it's soooo amazing
reviews.text:
Such a beautiful place surly if you are in dahab you have to visit it 
My words can't describe what my eyes sow finally i will visit it again and will try to write more details 💗

reviews.title: Woooooow, must do, but poor service, no signal
reviews.text: It is very beautiful beach (closed lagoon) with crystal color water, and no rocks, and no corals. It is perfect for professional kite surf. There are very limited poor services there (only shadow, Bedouin tea, or soft drink) and no Egyptian signal at all, and no fresh water shower. To go there, you have to ride a car to blue hole, then a boat to Abu Galoom, then a vehicle to blue lagoon.

reviews.title: Great place to relax and do kite surfing
reviews.text:
This is probably the best looking beach I've ever been too. Like most beaches in Dahab, this one is rocky but once the water reaches knee length, there's nice silky sands. Kite surfing takes a 4 day training course. You can stay at an of the bungalows at the lagoon for as many days. Average bungalow costs around 10$ a night.
Very friendly hosts and simple lifestyle.

reviews.title: My home away from home...
reviews.text: This place is simply a small haven, where one can disconnect from the real world and absorbe the nature's energy. I go to the Blue lagoon for weeks at a time. There are huts you can rent for cheap and Bedouins that cook simple, healthy food. Do not expect anything fancy; you are in the desert... the amenities are simple. At night, you can take the mattress provided to you, place it by the water, and stargaze until you fall asleep. The sky is mesmerizing at night, with sightings of shooting stars every night. The water is a beautiful turquoise color... you can simply sit and stare at it for days! And one more thing, the spot is very famous amongst local and tourist kitesurfers; expect to see many of them flying in the air or simply learning the sport. The blue lagoon is a must if you visit Dahab.

reviews.title: So beautiful
reviews.text: We had a snorkeling day trip that ended at the Blue Lagoon. This place is simply breathtaking. It is not a great place for snorkeling as there are not a lot of fish, but the water is beautiful if you just want to swim. There was also a lot of kite surfing and wind surfing, but I didn't personally try it.

reviews.title: Amazing. Just amazing.
reviews.text: Crystal blue water with a warm touch. Kite surfing is the best here. Also there are many teachers if you like to learn the kite surfing. Very nice people with a nice and cheap hand made accessories. A nice and relaxing place with it is natural touch without any modern interfering. You will love it indeed

ranking: #4 of 12 things to do in Dahab

Sharm El Sheikh, Dahab and St. Catherine Monastery Package

reviews.title: Used to be a great site not so much now
reviews.text:
This was one of my favorite dive sites  in Dahab in the past. This year we found that it had turned into a very busy tourist spot. With quad bikes roaring back and forth raising the dust up plus making it unsafe to cross the road. Plus large groups of  unsupervised snorkelers just standing around talking while walking on the coral.. This site will not be worth going to if the Egyptians don't take care of it. 
  I know the people operating the bikes and snorkel trips want to make money but there customers are destroying the area. In the end it will not be worth going to.

reviews.title: 5 minutes away from happy life village,
reviews.text: Snorkelling  here is amazing,  advised  not to snorkel alone, so safety is paramount,  you can also go on a quad bike tour from here, it is very rustic  but in my opinion  quite safe

reviews.title: Spectacular above and below the water
reviews.text:
Our group was at Three Pools from 9-4pm., and could have been there even longer! Our group was primarily there to dive, but I was interested in horseback riding. 
The guide from Mona Lisa Stable met me at the dive site with horses and we rode out from there. He was flexible about the timeline, and we ended up riding just past Gabr el Bint (3 hours roundtrip with a solid amount of galloping). My guide was incredibly kind, thoughtful, and happy to discuss the horse culture in Egypt (e.g. nutrition, stable management, etc). We galloped in areas where the footing allowed and he even offered to film video. I'd guess that he would be just as willing to provide a shorter and/or more leisurely ride for novice equestrians or those just looking to experience such wonderous scenery from horseback. I highly recommend this stable! The animals are well cared for (healthy weight, feet, grooming), the guide is thoughtful and friendly, and the price is very fair. I wouldn't have ridden with this stable if the animals were not correctly cared for. This stable came recommended by local ex-pats and I'm glad to have followed their advice. I'll always remember riding with MLS as the highlight of my week-long trip to Dahab!
At the dive site our group had our own cabana area right on the water where we could safely leave our items. The hosts offered food and drink that was very satisfactory for our hungry divers. I did not eat, but did enjoy a lemon-mint juice that was refreshing and very sweet.

reviews.title: karakeeb the best cafe in 3 pools
reviews.text: I stayed 12 days at happy life hotel and was walking along near that area, so  KARAKEEB cafe touched my heart  in 3 pools:-). The people who worked there are very hospitable and friendly, some of them speak quite fluent English, so you can have a meaningful conversation and stay in peace there and quiet. Also guests who are visiting cafe. They are interesting to talk with, you can meet there many people from it sector to locals, from doctors to yuga instructors from Moscow. Food and drinks are very good also. The place for swimming is super attractive as your might see all the rich fish world. So the place is highly recommended.

reviews.title: Shockingly sad dead reef
reviews.text: The three pools part of Three Pools is essentially a dead reef. There is a guy with a whistle telling snorkellers not to touch the coral. But it's too late for the pools themselves, almost all of the coral is dead. There is a small drop-off beyond with ok coral coverage, but literally all of the other dive sites in Dahab Town have way more life. I don't know what happened here. Apparently a few months ago it was not like this and I can't see how even a lot of incompetent swimmers could cause this level of die-off. There is broken dead coral, but mostly there's unbroken, unbleached, sediment covered dead coral. The only thing I can think of is suncreen. This should be investigated.

reviews.title: This is what Dahab is all about
reviews.text: Best place in Dahab for diving, snorkeling, dining,  Bedouin setting, raw nature, amazing view, safe, best relaxing place. Highly recommended in the early morning before it gets crowded.

reviews.title: Good quality snorkelling - but one or two compromise points
reviews.text:
Overall this is a positive experience and if you've come hear to snorkel and relax it's a good choice.   The quality of hte reefs are good but if it gets busy you may not see as many fish as you would expect to....

There are plenty of places to hire snorkel gear from and you can leave your bags at any of the eateries whilst you're in the sea.    The whole area has a pretty relaxed vibe but its a terminus or start point for quad bike tours that do generate a lot of noise and dust...

reviews.title: Nice spot for diving, but too much tourism here
reviews.text: Been here for diving at three pools and golden blocks. We had some food here in the surface breaks which was good, same for the service. but annoying amount of quad tourers here.

reviews.title: highly recommended
reviews.text: One of the best spots in Dahab The three pools are amazing for snorkeling and diving activities you can also have Shisha at the beach and chill and relax at the coffee shop

reviews.title: Perfect for snorkeling and diving
reviews.text: It is a perfect place for diving and snorkeling, relatively crowded, and it is recommended to select best coffee shop to stay for better experience.

ranking: #45 of 98 Boat Tours & Water Sports in Dahab
description: Deep Blue Divers is situated right at the very heart of Dahab, an old Bedouin village, in the midst of remarkable surrounding landscapes of the Red Sea and Sinai Mountains. The sea is where we do our business which, of course, is diving. As we are lucky enough to be situated right on the glorious Red Sea, we can guarantee that your diving experience with us will be fantastic and unforgettable, with abundant varieties of exotic fish, beautifully colored corals and plenty of sparkling, crystal clear blue water! We specialize in everything from diving to snorkeling, and can offer you much more, such as an array of dive safaris, either by boat, camel or jeep. Deep Blue Divers has been providing top quality diving holidays in the Red Sea since we first opened our doors back in August 2000.

reviews.title: Best prices in Dahab!
reviews.text: Great equipment, great prices! Our hostel offered a discount on diving at Octopus, but even with the discount Deep Blue was almost half the cost. Very professional and safe. The only thing I would've changed is the dives were pretty short and shallow. (But I think all the companies do the same dives). We did 6 dives, including 2 at the Blue Hole.

reviews.title: One week holiday to stay and scuba dive
reviews.text:
I booked a week holiday with Deep Blue Divers to to learn PADI open water course with some friends.
Ayman was our instructor ,lucky us,he planned every thing for us including stay and transfers to and from airport.
I highly recommend Deep Blue and I definitely coming back.

reviews.title: Can only recommend Ayman
reviews.text: We booked the package with airport transfer, hotel, advanced diving course and some fun dives. Organisation (pick-up from airport, getting our room, the course itself) was perfect, as a teacher he was calm and friendly and for the fun dives we got to choose what we want to see. Certificate arrived about 2 weeks later in the mail. This is how diving vacations should be!

reviews.title: Very good
reviews.text: I dived twice with Ayman and he was perfect! He had the patience with my mom’s first dive and also with my son. I surly recommend!

reviews.title: excellent dive school, basic hostel
reviews.text: We are a group of 5 people who learned to dive with Ayman. Ayman managed to explain everything very clear to all of us.We felt very safe in his hands and had a great time! The equipment was excellent also. The hostel was very basic, very cheap also. It could use a good cleanup, but because it was so cheap it is still a good value for money.

reviews.title: Good hostel
reviews.text: Not bad was kinda clean, the staff was good, the location great , and its cool for solo traveler to meet new ppl, I like the cats.

reviews.title: bucket list activity in hippie style
reviews.text:
been there . did that.. 
I stayed at the deep blue divers hostel made really good friends with the fellow divers , trained professional staff and friendly, they seriously helped me fight with my fear of scuba diving.

reviews.title: Great hostel and location, very friendly staff
reviews.text: The hostel was quiet the time of the year I was there, which gave me exactly the privacy and quietness I was looking for. The staff is friendly and the hostel is on the better end of hostel standards as far as my experience goes. Clean, tidy, comfy. GREAT rooftop.”

reviews.title: Genuinely worth all of his 5 stars!
reviews.text: I stayed in the Deep Blue Divers for almost a week, mainly to do my Advanced Open Water and some fun dives. I look back with so much joy and thankfulness. The hostel is great: the room (10- bed dorm) and bathroom were clean, there is a common refrigerator and a little kitchen, but what I enjoyed the most is the terrace on the roof where you can enjoy a beautiful sunset. Staff is really professional and very helpful. Great place if you’re travelling alone and want to meet people. I can also really recommend the diving there: Ayman is a very inspiring and experienced instructor who guides you with a lot of enthusiasm and passion. The gear and equipment are good. Best place in Dahab; I really recommend it!

reviews.title: Amazing diving experience
reviews.text:
The five stars diving center . Things I like about my exprience here in deep blue divers 

0- when you dive here with mr Ayman you are not just diving , your dive is being recorded and under water picture with Ayman's great shooting skills . 
 
1- the diving center is well equiped with all equipment 
2- the diving center has a great variety of courses you can enroll in and the timing is flexible 
3- the trainer is great and Always by your side speacilly if you are just starting your diving journey 

Diving here will sure make me come back again and special thanks to mr Ayman for his great assistance

reviews.title: Подводный мир Дахаба:)
reviews.text: Очень понравился данный клуб: обучение на уровне, организация хорошая, инстуктора приветливые. Спасибо большое, что познакомили с подвым миром Дахаба! Будем рады новым встречам!

reviews.title: Отличное место для релакса ныряли!!!

reviews.title: Рекомендуем Русский клуб Дахаб
reviews.text: Юля, Юра Россия Нижний Новгород, aowd. Слаженный коллектив, очень организованная команда, все комфортно. Надеемся, вернёмся! Отдельное спасибо начинающему гиду Лере и Ашрафу! И всей команде!

reviews.title: Хочется вернуться....
reviews.text:
Совсем недавно вернулся из Дахаба. Получилось понырять с "Русским клубом" очень познавательно и интересно. Удачно попал в пару инструктор-дайвмастер (Оксана с Александром), которые согласились взять неопытный "хвост" и очень много показали и рассказали, как на берегу, так и под водой. Спасибо этим увлеченным и влюбленным в дайвинг людям!  Отдельное спасибо за отзывчивость и понимание Жоре.
Удачи вам, ребята!

reviews.title: Лучше быть не может
reviews.text: Все молодцы!!!! Коля- самый лучший!!!! Сто символов лень писать. Пишет Дима (Россия). Лысый и с бородой.

reviews.title: Лучший Русский клуб
reviews.text: Приехали в Дахаб первый раз, для того, чтобы сдать экзамен OWD и AOWD. С клубом списались и созвонились за месяц до поездки. Ребята очень отзывчивые, помогли, рассказали и показали все вокруг. Очень хорошие инструкторы. Отдельное спасибо администратору Жоре и инструктору Максиму. Нам показали лучшие места для дайвинга в Дахабе. Веселая компания и адекватные цены вам гарантированы. Очень всем рекомендуем.

reviews.title: Нырялка в Дахабе с Русским клубом
reviews.text:
Нырял с Русским клубом в 2017 году. 
Вцелом все понравилось. Общался с Жорой, Максом и Николаем.

Жора помимо прочего обслуживает регули. Ответственно подходит к вопросу.
За диагностику денег не берет, за что ему отдельное спасибо :)

Рекомендую ночной дайв. Очень понравилось, на ночном был в первый раз, нырял с Николаем. Много живности, очень интересно.

Дайвцент в хорошем состоянии, организация на должном уровне.

Вцелом Дахаб понравился, точно приеду еще раз :)

Ребята, извиняйте, что пишу отзыв через год, но так он правдивее :)))

reviews.title: Рекомендую всем дайверам!
reviews.text: В дайв-центре работают отличные люди, атмосфера потрясающая, инструкторы профессиональные и очень душевные. Учился технике и это лучшее место в мире для подобного! В Дахаб и в русский клуб хочется вернуться много раз. Снаряга в хорошем состоянии, все по-расписанию, Учиться одно удовольствие. Расположение комфортное, короче, впечатления самые прекрасные!

I truely command this diving center, nice guys, perfect diving spot, good gears ❤️❤️❤️

reviews.title: Incredible all rounded diving experience in Dahab
reviews.text: Incredible diving experience in Dahab. I did the open water diving course with Yasser who was the most patient, calm and knowledgable teacher. His experience and demeanour always made me feel safe and gave me confidence in my own diving skills. He knows the course and the water like the back of his hand so is easily able to break it all down simply for beginners like myself. I would definitely recommend diving with him if you can. He also takes photos through the dives and training and sends them to you promptly after the session. All the staff are extremely friendly and have a genuine passion for what they do. Omar provided transport to and from our hotel everyday and helped us with all the equipment. He was so kind and friendly as well. 10/10 would definitely recommend diving here!

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.text: Had really good time and enjoyed all the dives. I did an open course with Yasser he is the best diving instructor and he will make sure you learn properly

reviews.title: Your second home in Dahab
reviews.text:
This is THE PLACE to dive in Dahab. 

Mr. Magdi (the owner) has established a cozy and friendly space where you'll instantly feel home.

Yasser is the guru of diving. I took both my open water and advanced course with him, I went for fun dives (solo and with groups), and Yasser has always managed to be on top of everything. He is such a dedicated instructor, briefs you in a patient and thorough manner, and makes you feel safe and well taken care of. Always ask for him.

The rest of the staff is equally helpful and friendly. Tamer manages everything perfectly, Omar is indispensable (he drives you everywhere and anywhere and always helps with the kit while keeping a smile), Ali is always there to greet and help you when you're back from the dive (and gets you coffee in the morning), Ashraf and Adham are also an integral part of the family.

Thank you everyone for the great time as usual ❤️

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.text: Enjoyed the diving and stay a lot of thanks   for tamer and all the Friendly staff  , I went there with  a friend to take our advanced diving course , it was fun and efficient

reviews.title: Relaxed Diving in Dahab
reviews.text:
A last minute invite to join one of my friends for some relaxed diving over Eid Al Adha had be franticly booking flights on FlyDubai to Sharm El Sheikh from Dubai.

We were met by Yasser from Divers House at the airport and transported to Dahab, which took around an hour by road in a small minibus.

The diving was mainly shore diving, and a day trip to Sharm for a boat trip to dive the Thistlegorm had also been arranged.

The diving set up was much different to what I have been exposed to before, and much more relaxed, which was what I was looking for. The Dive Op is also situated away from the main part of Dahab, so no interruptions due to noise.

The Dive Guide (Yasser) was very thorough with his briefings and I enjoyed diving with him. My only regret was not having one of my regular UW photographic buddies with me as we would have dived at a much slower pace.

One thing to note is that Nitrox is not regularly supplied here and the Divers House do not have a Nitrox analyser. Nitrox can be supplied but they will also have to borrow an analyser. Therefore if planning to use Nitrox, bring your own analyser.

There is a great camaraderie with Jasmine their neighbours and we were well supplied with tea and coffee whenever we needed it.

Big shout out to Tamer who manages the place and the other staff who took care of tank fills, loading the pick-up and driving us to the various sites.

reviews.title: Awesome place
reviews.text:
Took my open water course there with Hussam.. he was an excellent instructor, Tamer was very helpful! & extremely professional the Diver’s House is definetly recomended 

It was a great experience and hope to go back soon.

reviews.title: Great experience
reviews.text: I took my open water course at Divers House. It was a great experience, my trainer Yasser was very thorough & made sure I mastered all the necessary skills in the water & understood all the theoretical knowledge too. At the end of my course I felt very comfortable and confident with diving. I would like to thank my trainer Yasser & Tamer from the management of the Center for making my first diving experience memorable.

Taxi Sinai was a first experience for organising our own transport by minibus from Sharm el Sheikh to Dahab and back. As we are family of 5, taxi was not sufficient.
All was arranged nice and quick, either via whatsapp or phone.
The busses are nice, clean and good and the drivers kind, friendly and all spoke good English.
On our way back our bus got a flat tyre just outside Dahab, due to the bad road. The driver immediately called for another bus and within a few minutes we were back on the road with another bus and driver. Super arranged! 
I can recommend Taxi Sinai for your trips.

reviews.title: Школа со 100% качеством!!!рекомендуем
reviews.text: Хотим выразить огромную благодарность Александру и Олесе. Мы заранее связались с ребятами. Мы созвонились и нам все все все рассказали, и подготовили к серьезному отношению к обучению, так как наша цель была, научиться и получить самый первый сертификат умения дайвингу, после курса мы поняли, что не будем останавливаться и по возможности будем стараться продвигаться дальше в познании подводного мира под руководством Александра! Благодаря, великолепной системе обучения, мы из «думающих, что умеем опускаться под воду с аквалангом», действительно стали начинающими дайверами. Техничный и спокойный стиль инструктажа вызывает доверие и уважение. Поначалу мы, наверное, как и все новички, паниковали при выполнении упражнений, но Александр сказал, что пока всему не научимся дальше подвигаться не будем, потому что безопасность превыше всего. Хочу отметить, спокойная реакция Александра давала нам возможность успокоиться и понять что все под контролем, а позже мы и сами хотели перевыполнить упражнения на пять баллов. Обучение очень понятное и грамотно распланировано,все внештатные ситуации были разобраны и сымитированы под водой, недалеко от берега, после чего, мы уже вообще не боялись ничего. Вообще, слов благодарности и их последовательности, конечно же не хватает. Александр спокойный, техничный профессионал, уверены, что все последующие дайвы, мы теперь только в школу к «ластоногим». Ребята умеют заразить любовью к подводной жизни и тому куда можно двигаться дальше. Огромное спасибо за индивидуальный подход и действительно так и есть «очень много практики». За наш непродолжительный отпуск мы, действительно зарядились красотой подводного мира, а потом получили прекрасные фотографии и видео погружения, как приятный бонус на память.

reviews.title: Рекомендасьон!
reviews.text:
Повезло учится у Александра! Так как было желание в далекой перспективе погрузится в пещеру, то сразу начали учится с техническим уклоном. Все дни занятий прошли познавательно, продуктивно, с удовольствием. И главное, что на первом месте безопасность и практичность! Всем кто хочет начать или повысить свой уровень рекомендую Александра как суперпрофессинала, а так же сможете взглянуть на Дахаб с другой стороны. 
Спасибо!

reviews.title: Дайвинг в Дахабе
reviews.text: Приезжаем понырять не в первый раз. Однозначно только к Саше и Олесе. Профессионализм ребят на высшем уровне.  Саша и Олеся, вы такие замечательные. Спасибо Александру за его терпение при обучении, А если Саша похвалил, то чувствуешь себя как минимум завоевателем мира, которому подвластно все😁. Олесе за клёвые дайвы и за моральную поддержку. С каким бы вопросом не обратился к ребятам, всегда получишь квалифицированный совет.

reviews.title: Спасибо за пропуск на глубину!
reviews.text:
С Александром Устюговым я познакомился на выставке Moscow Dive Show, а затем впервые приехал в Дахаб, чтобы пройти обучение на курсах PADI Deep и Night Diver. 

Александр — технический дайвер с огромным опытом и количеством глубоководных погружений, а мне было важно учиться именно у такого профессионала. Он очень спокойный и надёжный человек. Сразу обратил внимание на некоторые недочёты моего снаряжения и помог всё исправить. До приезда в Дахаб я считал, что технический дайвинг мне не сильно интересен, но, пообщавшись с Александром, понял, что в будущем хочу продолжить обучение — и именно у него, но вначале буду нарабатывать опыт.

Александр и Олеся Устюговы — прекрасные дайверы и учителя, с которыми легко и приятно общаться, обучаться у них и просто очень комфортно нырять. Спасибо!

reviews.title: как всегда все на уровне !
reviews.text:
уже не в первый раз в Дахабе, и не в первый раз ныряем с Сашей и Олесей, так-что рекомендую однозначно...

в этот раз ехали за специализацией , все классно : и курс отработали и фан от души поныряли .

если вы начинаете нырять- то проведут аккуратно и за ручку, а если у вас есть сертификат и хотите большего, то готовьтесь ответить за сертификацию, с вами будет нырять техно-инструктор, а он и навыки спросит, на ошибки укажет, и советы правильные даст на будущее.

reviews.title: Обучение PADI Open Water Diver у Олеси и Саши.
reviews.text: В октябре 2018 проходили с мужем обучение у Олеси и Саши по курсу PADI Open Water Diver. Олеся и Саша - большие профессионалы, с которыми приятно работать. Олеся очень подробно доносит информацию, все объясняет, требует должного уровня выполнения упражнений под водой, и при этом очень дружелюбная и всегда готова помочь. Саша - само спокойствие, равновесие, которое придает уверенности. Он буквально заражает любовью к своему делу, к погружениям. Очень советую ребят! Сайты для подводного плаванья в Дахабе интересные. Сожалеем, что ездили по сайтам только 3 дня. Надеемся вернуться и продолжить.

reviews.title: Новые впечатления от Дахаба!
reviews.text:
Много раз была в Дахабе, но всё время одним днем приезжая из Шарма. Познакомившись в один из таких однодневных приездов с Александром и Олесей и услышав их рассказы про красивейшие дайвсайты Дахаба, помимо «окрестностей» Блю Холла, захотелось увидеть в Дахабе, что то новое!!! 
В сентябре 2018 это удалось!!! 
Спасибо Саша и Олеся за замечательно организованный, безопасный дайвинг и супер логистику, за массу отличных впечатлений и красивейших моментов. Спасибо вам огромное за знакомство с «другим» Дахабом!!! 
Удачи и процветания Вам!!! 
Буду рада вернуться!

reviews.title: Первая поездка в Дахаб
reviews.text:
Несколько лет назад впервые осознанно приехал в Дахаб. Бывал здесь и раньше, рейдами из Шарма, но это другая история .... 
Дахаб был занесён в список мечт, но как то долго не получалось из за того, что планета большая ))
И вот свершилось. Дахаб очаровал своей,только ему присущей аурой. Теперь Хургада и Шарм рассматриваются только как пункты транзита, не более.
Но. 
Это важно! 
Если бы в тот приезд судьба не свела меня с Сашей, не знаю, насколько бы сильным было желание возвращаться сюда вновь и вновь.
С тех пор я и моя половинка ( и в дайвинге тоже) каждую весну и осень летим в Дахаб, к морю, к солнцу, к друзьям. 
Качественная и безопасная нырялка, много нового и интересного, непрекращающийся процесс обучения и познания тонкостей дайвинга.
Спасибо за всё это Александру и Олесе! 
Однако заболтался, пойду покупать билеты на Синай .....

reviews.title: И на третьем десятке посещений сайты Дахаба открываются по-новому
reviews.text:
И снова май.. и снова Дахаб.. и снова Дахаб открылся по-новому.
И сайты вроде те же - да не те, другие, пройденные по другим маршрутам, где-то глубже, где-то нет, но везде какая-то новизна.
И только с Сашей и Олесей все по-прежнему, все без изменений... Все на высочайшем уровне.

reviews.title: Внимание! Здесь не просто дайвинг!
reviews.text:
К Саше и Олесе можно приехать просто понырять. Вам покажут такие места, от которых сперва захватит дух, но будет и последующий эффект - вы поймете, что было мало! Что самое крутое, классное и невероятное - оно там, дальше! Жить с этим будет нельзя, захочется продолжить и придётся вернуться. 
Не буду писать про подводный мир. Напишу о другом. Испытывали ли вы когда-нибудь кайф от того, что чему-то учитесь? Если да, и если помните, что чувствовали, когда получилось, и хотите ощутить это еще не раз - тогда вам сюда. Между прочим, радость достижений - вторая по силе эмоция после любви :) А достижения будут - ого-го! Позвольте себе мечты, от которых кружится голова, возьмите с собой труд и терпение. Саша и Олеся - не просто лучшие, талантливые профессионалы. Про ответственность, внимание, точность и другие мелочи, которые на самом деле не мелочи, вы узнаете и научитесь от них сами. Еще захочется снова приехать, снова сюда, снова к ним за новыми радостями достижений. Может, это наркотик, да? :)
Пойду другие отзывы почитаю..

reviews.title: nice trip in the mountain at night
reviews.text: in our previous trip in Dahab we went to the mountain at night with wood and fire ,we listened to Egyptian songs and we danced also .

reviews.title: A day with the locals
reviews.text: Trip to Saint Catherine and the Sinai Everything was well organized, on time, good guides and very relaxed. The visit to the bedouin was a real stay with the locals and no tourist place. Exactly what we wanted.

reviews.title: Good organisation
reviews.text: We went to zt catherine and the mountain and it was organised very quickly for a good price. The trip was interesting and not too difficult to do. Afterwards we were very happy but also very tired

reviews.title: A great trip
reviews.text: everybody said we had t go here, o we booked this trip for the sunrise. We had t climb the mountain in the very early morning, but it was much more easy thatn i expected. The sunrise was beautiful, and the walk in the  monastery lovely. Lots of herbs. we had a very good guide.

reviews.title: Best tour operator in town
reviews.text:
I did several trips over 15 dys. Highlights were absolutely the trip into the desert to visit Wadi weshwashi, Mt Sinai and Petra

You have to gety used to the Egyptian way of organisation and timing, but I loved it.

reviews.title: 5 days in the desert, got ridd of all my stress and anxiety
reviews.text:
I booked a private desert trip of 5 days with 3 friends. We were lucky that Joseph and Annet from youtube-channel Dahablive were our guides.  I have been to Dahab many times and finally, this is the first time someone offers an interesting desert tour. I have been sleeping in the desert before, but all the archaeological sites make it so much more interesting. And on top of that, we met and slept with the Bedouin Hamada-tribe who is still living in the desert on the traditional way. 

Umm Yasser is such a strong woman. I feel very privileged and my next visit to the Sinai Desert is already planned! 

Ask for Joseph of overnight trips in the desert. they are absolutely amazing"

reviews.title: Such a beautiful place
reviews.text: thank you for helping me organise this for us! It was great to see all these special things in the desert and thank you for the very knowledgeable guide. It was the highlight of our holiday

reviews.title: King Safari Tours is the best
reviews.text:
I booked a daytrip to Wadi Gnei and Three Pools. It was very busy but there was a good vibe. My girl didnt join me but I still had a good time. The tour guide was absolutely great and took us on the quad bike into the mountains which was awesome. 

Next day we went to St Catherine and Mount Sinai, also well worth a visit! There is a lot to do in and around Dahab, but I recommend doing it with a proper agency like King Safari. One of the other hotelguests booked the same trip somewhere else and was very disappointed and didnt have a good time.

reviews.title: Stunning Petra trip
reviews.text:
First trip i did was St Catherine and that was great so I booked the 1 day trip to Petra. 

 It was an early start, We took the ferry to Aqaba and we had 4 hrs to spent in Petra. It was too short to see everything, but what a beautiful experience. Luckily I will stay in Egypt for an other yeas so my next visit to Dahab I hope to go again and spend more time there! 

The trip was very well organised.

reviews.title: Ras Abu Galum - poor service
reviews.text:
Ras Abu Galum

1. We were told that entrance fee to Blue Lagoon is included in the trip, yet we had to argue at the entrance to the site that we already paid it because King Safari Dahab didn't inform trip organiser

2. We were promissed to have a lunch on the trip (Egyptian chicken, etc.). It turned out that the trip organizer also wasn't informed that we booked a lunch. We ended up without it. While we only wanted 80 EGP per person refund (the cheapest chicken meal in menu - see picture) King Safari offered us 50 EGP per person, arguing that "this is what meal costs them". 

I am happy guys that you only pay 50 EGP but we had to pay more. If you negotiated with a trip organizer that transportation is, say, cost of 200 EGP and lunch (as part of this negotiation discount) is only 20 EGP would you only refund us 20 arguing that it is "your cost"?

Long story short we had to pay for their mistake. Not recommended.

FYI my snorkel mask was leaking and my partner had broken snorkel tube but we do not include it as a part of rating because you most likely won't find a better equipment in any other office. Tip: invest in your own mask and tube.

description: From the Red Sea coast to the mountains and valleys of the interior Sinai desert, let Sinai Inside take you on a trip through history, Bedouin culture, and the natural beauty of the land. We offer a range of services including, but not limited to; trekking, camping, desert safaris, bespoke desert trips, and Bedouin desert experiences, like an evening meal under the stars.

reviews.title: great desert experience
reviews.text: I did two trips with the Sinaiinside-Team to the desert and they were just awesome. We had spectacular views, great Bedouin food and a great night sleeping under millions of stars. Moneem has a huge knowledge about the desert and you can actually feel his love and respect for the desert and nature which creates a nice atmosphere during the whole trip. Thank you very much for the amazing time!!! Hope to meet you guys soon again!!!

reviews.title: Best Desert Safari
reviews.text:
On every trip to Dahab it is always a must that I attend a safari trip with Sinai Inside.
Just a wonderful and very knowledgable team.
Monem is an outstanding guide with in depth information about the sinai region, history, traditions.

I highly reccomend atleast a one night trip in the desert where you will experience the great nature and amazing star gazing along with a bonfire and delicious bedouin dinner.

reviews.title: Not my first visit!
reviews.text:
Sinai desert is a life changing experience! The first day I spent there was only the beginning of so many other days I spent during all my visits, as I fell in love with it.

First of all, I would like to thank Monem from the bottom of my heart as he has a passion and love for the dessert I’ve never seen before, which made my experience miraculous. He was also incredibly welcoming, super helpful, very kind and caring, resourceful, and cheerful. But it’s not only Monem, it’s all Bedouin, they welcome you and make you feel like you’re truly part of their family, which is one of the reasons I consider Sinai my home and I keep going back.

Enjoying the desert with great company away from city life, with nothing surrounding us but the mountains and the only sounds we can hear are the sounds of nature and our laughter. In summer we didn’t need fire, but in winter the fire at night kept us warm and cozy. Every night the view of the night sky and the bright and clear stars left us speechless and it makes you wonder and dream with it. Sleeping in the dessert was the best sleep I’ve ever had and waking up at dawn to watch the sunrise is something you can’t miss as it’s breathtaking.
I owe all that to Monem and all his friends. I can’t thank him enough for making me feel like I have a home and I can’t wait to be back.

These pictures were taken from my phone, so the quality is not good, but notice the stars in the sky.

reviews.title: Stargazing happiness
reviews.text: I spent one night in the desert with Monem, one of his crew and two of my Dahab friends. It was such an incredible experience, full of joy, fun, happiness, comfort, laughter, silence and connection. Monem organized everything perfectly. He is a truely warm hearted, welcoming and knowledgeable person. We were sitting around the fire, telling each other stories, eating the yummy bread that they baked freshly in the fire. We had enough blankets so we felt warm and cozy. We slept underneath the millions of beautiful stars, watched shooting stars and in the morning went up on a hill to see the sunrise. I'm very thankful for this time in the desert, that's always a reminder on our connection to nature, to the rhythm of life, and on our inner peace and true community. I can highly recommend everybody to experience this yourself! Thank you Monem and Sinai inside for making it happen!

reviews.title: A trip that heals your soul
reviews.text:
The desert always does the trick, once you have been there, u won't be able to get enough of it, we spent an over night trip that heals the soul with monem and his crew, it was a surreal view, the landscape, the sun and the skyline while the sunset, all of it was an amazing experience that I'm willing to do more and more,
Monem and his crew was so organized and so patient with us, everything was so fine and the food tasted so good, it was an amazing trip I hope that I can do it once more soon with Sinai inside...

reviews.title: A truly unforgettable experience!
reviews.text:
This is not my first experience with Sinai Inside but this review is just about due.

Truly an experience worth trying over and over. The team are very hospitable and friendly, they make you feel like the mountains and the desert are a place you could actually call home. 

The food is super special, not only because they make it themselves, but also the variety of bedouin foods offered are really very delicious, and don’t just take my word for it, all the people i went with thought the same.

With more than a mesmerizing bonfire, coal hot bedouin tea, the amazing view of the mountains and the bright shining stars, i really couldn’t think of something so worth it’s value.

I would really recommend this experience to anyone!

reviews.title: Amazing landscapes, great Bedouin crew, cute camels - a memorable experience!
reviews.text: My wife and I spent five days and four nights in the Southern Sinai Desert (we crossed from Eilat to Taba in Egypt), with a crew of three Bedouins and three cute camels. We walked and rode camels every day without seeing any other soul, wondering at the tranquility of the place and the amazing beauty of the desert. Usually, around four pm we would set up camp, Amer (the lead Bedouin) would make a bone fire, bake a fresh bread for us and we would have it with tasty food, followed by a delicious tea. We then would set up our sleeping bags on the ground, and fall asleep looking at the Milky Way and the endless night sky... It was an amazing experience, not to be forgotten.

reviews.title: Best tour ever
reviews.text:
On my third visit to Dahab, i already heard about Monem and Sinai inside and now i understand why he have 5* rating.I ve been in different deserts several times in different countries, but this experience was unique, very private,safe and fun experience, you feel at home,like a family in an unforgettable environment, delicious food,people and landscape,good 
vehicles and everything you need to sleep on the desert,  im sure i ll never will see the stars as clear as on this trip. I can strongly recommend it,will repeat on my next visit to Dahab, thank you very much Monem and your team!!

reviews.title: Authentic experience
reviews.text: I was always fascinated by the Egyptian deserts and tried to discover the magic in them with different groups. Then I bumped into Sinai Inside and went with them for a trip in Dahab. To cut it short this was the most wonderful, authentic, professional and useful desert experience I ever had in my life. Monem (the guy behind Sinai Inside) is extremely friendly and helpful, you will definitely admire him and his passion toward keeping the experience as authentic and real as possible. The rest of the team were also very friendly and helpful. I went back for another 3 trips with Sinai inside and the quality of the trips were as perfect as my first one. This is a must do thing when you come to Dahab.

reviews.title: Life changing!!
reviews.text:
We had an amazing time with Monem. We went for an over night tour of the Sinai desert and it will be a trip I will never forget. Monem and his team made sure.we were comfortable, happy, and well fed the entire trip. We wanted for nothing. They even arranged for our pick up at the airport to Sinai Inside. It was effortless. I had no idea what to expect and they helped me the whole way.
I never knew how beautiful the Sinai really was; and too sleep out under those stars...just breathtaking! 

Thank you again for doing all that you did Monem. I can't wait to.come back and spend more time in the Sinai.

We also hire equipment, including our very own custom built heated dynamic training pool. We can tailor personal training days to suit your needs. We are based at H2o dive centre. The courses are run with small groups (max 4) and can be on a one to one basis for only a 20% premium. Courses are AIDA certified, and include all the equipment required.

reviews.title: Great place excellent training
reviews.text:
Brian is an excellent instructor and he has his own pool which is designed for freediving.I learned a lot about freediving.
The diving center was clean and comfortable.
My 2 months in Dahab was surely a wholesome experience.

Regards Kai

reviews.title: Journey of self-discovery
reviews.text:
When you're in Dahab for an extended period it seems like freediving is the thing to do, so I gave it a shot. I'm so glad I did, and I'm glad that Brian was my instructor. I don't have much natural talent but the whole experience was so enjoyable, largely thanks to Brian's mellow and non-judgmental attitude, as well as his engineer's brain--he'll tinker with techniques so as to maximize your depth/breathhold limits. He's also generous with his time and expertise and an all-round great guy.
In the course of the AIDA** I learned a lot about how I manifest anxiety and how dysfunctional certain of my breathing patterns were, and the training I did really helped me learn to relax both in and out of the water. I've become a bit of an evangelist for freediving as a sport, even though I don't ever plan to go very deep. Highly, highly recommended--if you're reasonably healthy and comfortable in the water, you should try it.

reviews.title: Top instructor,, one the best !
reviews.text: Brian is without doubt amongst the worlds best free diving instructors.  I first met Brian in 2008, since which time I have completed all my Aida courses under his tutorship, and progressed to being a 70+ no fins diver.  Brian's USP in my opinion is his attention to detail in everything he does.  The advice he gives in & out the water, the calmness he brings when you are on the line, and the peace of mind you have in his wealth of knowledge & attention to safety detail.  I whole heatedly recommend BlueOcean to anyone wanting to learn free diving, or progress themselves.

reviews.title: Highly recommended
reviews.text:
Worked with Brian recently and passed AIDA***

Like everybody else, I've only got positive things to say. Incredibly patient and encouraging. Exactly what I needed to help me to stick with it. Didn't feel under pressure at all and Brian was really flexible and generous with his time.

I'm hoping to come back out to Dahab, with a bit of luck before the end of the year, and will be planning to do some more diving with Brian.

Most importantly, this training helped me to find confidence and self belief that I'd forgotten about years ago. 

If you're considering doing some freediving and are not sure whether to or not, I'd recommend you go ahead and book up.

reviews.title: Solid teaching, professional set up
reviews.text:
I,be just done some freediving with Brian Crossland and I found it to be a great set up and good service. Personally, when on holiday I don,t want to worry about whether I,m going to get what I,veg paid for. I,m glad that with Brian, I could just let go and focus on what I was bein taught.

Great facilities, good teaching, fair deal.

reviews.title: Breathing training for Techical Divers
reviews.text: I attended a One Day Breathing Course for Scuba Divers at Blue Ocean Free Divers. Brian is an excellent instructor and took me through breathing exercises and theory in their purpose built facility. His relaxed approach, knowledge and instruction has lead to a massive 25% drop in my SAC rate which will be valuable in both recreational and especially technical diving due to the cost of helium. I'd strongly recommend Brian to any one and hope to do another course soon.

reviews.title: Top Class Freedive Instruction
reviews.text:
Brian was recommended to me by another freediver for the AIDA 4* course, and I was not disappointed. Although the course is available over a shorter period, I completed the 4* as a two week internship, which was a great way to immerse myself into a decent training routine. 

The things I really like about Brian's instruction are:

- safety always comes first, Brian never let standards slip; 
- right away I felt confident in his breadth and depth of experience. He trains students all the way from absolute beginners to record breaking freedivers, plus he helps to run competitions and record attempts (both for freediving and scuba). As a result he is hugely knowledgeable, and he is always happy to share his knowledge with you;
- he is ever patient and calm, and is very student focused.

In addition, he has built his own dynamic training pool. I stayed at one of his lovely villas next to the pool, it was a great spot, and using the pool between training sessions was a real treat.

Overall, I would highly recommend Brian for freedive training, whether you are an absolute beginner or a well seasoned diver.

reviews.title: Blue Ocean Free Divers Dahab
reviews.text: Two of us, both experienced freedivers, travelled to Dahab last year to do some light training with Brian Crossland and found the Blue Ocean set-up to be excellent. Diving at the Blue Hole, the Lighthouse or dynamic training in Brian's purpose built pool is all possible as and when you want it. Brian also spent extra time with us generally providing added advice and feedback which was much appreciated.

reviews.title: Perfect place, excellent instructor
reviews.text:
I was looking for a freediving course in Dahab. Brian was strongly recommended to me as an instructor. I was happy with his way to learn as he gave more information than the course contained. I did my AIDA 4* and AIDA IC with Brian and could say he was an excellent instructor.
The open water trainings were conducted at Light house bay or Blue Hole. H2O centre is located just in 1 minute on foot from easy entrance at Light house beach and offers a place for theory sessions, briefing, debriefing, leaving stuff, taking shower, etc. Confined water sessions were conducted in Brian's swimming pool. It's 30 meters length and 2 meters depth so it's perfect for static and dynamic trainings. 

Thus if you want to learn freediving it's a good choice :-)

reviews.title: A great AIDA instructor internship and training facilities in Dahab.
reviews.text:
I have spent one month training and being taught to become an AIDA freediving instructor with Brian at Blue Ocean FreeDivers, under his instructor internship program. Over this extended period I have been consistently impressed by his ability to make my freediving and my learning experience stress free and rewarding. He created an atmosphere whereby I was both challenged and encouraged in a way which lead to rapid development in my abilities as both a freediver and as an instructor. I have ended the course very confident in my own abilities and this is perhaps the best compliment I can pay. 

The foundation of his approach is an organised and friendly professionalism. Upon this he builds a great working relationship through trust and communication. I had a health concern throughout the course and the way he dealt with this and accommodated for it was outstanding. 

I have spent one month training and being taught to become an AIDA freediving instructor with Brian at Blue Ocean FreeDivers, under his instructor internship program. Over this extended period I have been consistently impressed by his ability to make my freediving and my learning experience stress free and rewarding. He created an atmosphere whereby I was both challenged and encouraged in a way which lead to rapid development in my abilities as both a freediver and as an instructor. I have ended the course very confident in my own abilities and this is perhaps the best compliment I can pay. 

The foundation of his approach is an organised and friendly professionalism. Upon this he builds a great working relationship through trust and communication. I had a health concern throughout the course and the way he dealt with this and accommodated for it was outstanding. He was also flexible to work around a change in my work outside of the course.

He has a heated pool, which makes for a great learning and training environment and a comprehensive range of freediving equipment available all included with the cost of the internship program. He also took me freediving with his scooters as a free 'bonus' experience!

If you are thinking of becoming an AIDA instructor in Dahab I recommend Blue Ocean Freedivers.

description:
Fun Divers is a PADI and SDI/TDI scuba diving center located in a beautiful small town Dahab in Egypt. Established at 2004 by legendary technical diver Pavel Sidorencko.
We are providing all kinds of recreational & technical scuba diving courses on Russian & English languages.

Click below for expert advice on animal welfare in tourism.

reviews.title: Incrdible new experience and many impressions
reviews.text:
I studied on a scuba diving course with a professional instructor Anastasia.  Anastasia personally spoke in detail about the various nuances, showed how to assemble equipment, together in the water we worked out many times various skills and situations that can happen under water.  
Anastasia was always attentive and helpful. 
 I want to express my deepest gratitude for a wonderful new experience and impressions and I will be glad to continue my studies in this dive center :)

reviews.title: The best impressions!
reviews.text: I have done near 30 dives with this club both day and night. Employees are always distinguished by high professionalism, attention to safety, and the desire to organize comfortable dives. The club always has a very friendly atmosphere, I always want to come back for the next vacation. The most vivid impressions remained from the trip to Bali organized by Pavel Sidorenko – it was a real adventure not only underwater, but also on land!

reviews.title: Really nice dive club!
reviews.text: Really good diving club, good location near the Light House dive site, good equipment and very experienced instructor Pavel. I completed some TDI courses up to Advanced Trimix with Pavel and recommend him for recreational and technical courses!

reviews.title: Best dive club in Dahab
reviews.text:
This is definitely the best dive club in Dahab! I've trained from  an OWD newbie to technical (TDI) diver there. We dove all the fascinating canyons around, descented 100m deep into Blue Hole and visited 70 m Ras Mamlakh cave two times. We also dove at Thistlegorm ship wreck and have a few other sea trips. That's all in two visits to Dahab a month each.
Pavel Sidorenko is not just a super experienced technical diver, but a very friendly and positive person.

Same for other club instructors who taught me a lot. We became good friends and had beer dives in the evening :)

Pavel is the only person in Dahab who can lead you to Ras Mamlakh which is not a canyon, but a quite narrow and very deep cave. I was so impressed that dove there once again.

Club manager Nadia always ready to solve any problems. When I damaged my knee during windsurfing and was sitting home for a week, she even brought me food and medicals :)

I am really glad I was advised to learn diving at Fun Divers by my friends and definitely recommend them.

reviews.title: Save, professional, friendly
reviews.text: When we are in Dahab we always do scuba diving with Fun Divers. We have done recreation dives and passed two technical divers course. Instructors and staff are professional,  friendly and ready to help. We always feel safe and welcomed. Thanks a lot. We return again and again.

reviews.title: Professional team
reviews.text: As an instructor, I have been cooperating with this team for a very long time.  very pleased with the organization and professionalism.  comfortable conditions for diving with large and small groups.  I recommend!

reviews.title: Highly recommend!
reviews.text:
Was planning a trip to Dehab with for a while but there was so many dive centres to choose from. In the end, I chose to dive with Fun Divers Dehab through a recommendation.  I took a package for 5 days - 10 dives (the more days you take – the less you pay per dive) and 1 boat trip to Gabr El Bint. 

Literally everything was great. Instructors were friendly, helpful and professional, all equipment was fairly new, and what was the most important for me – there was a high level of safety standards. 

My favourite dive was in a Canyon - absolutely loved it.!  As it’s a busy dive site, we came earlier to avoid the crowds.  Thank you, Fun Divers team, I had a great time!

reviews.title: Nice and professional
reviews.text: Very professional and decent, helpful and welcoming, we enjoyed diving with them and looking forward for the next trip

reviews.title: Awesome Experience
reviews.text:
Great experience for 5 days dives, professional & friendly team. Very good equipment … 
… sure will be back soon 👌🏽

reviews.title: Awesome diving center for technical & recreational diving
reviews.text:
Very friendly and professional team that I went there as a clint and i left as a friend 🥰🥰
I had the best day in my life with them when i had my technical diving course and went through the arch of the blue hole 🥰
Thank you guys and see u soon

reviews.title: Advanced course in Daniela
reviews.text: I did the open water course + Advanced, it took five days. The crew was really nice and you feel safe with them underwater. During the course we dived in spacial locations , like blue hole and Canyon, including night dive

reviews.title: Amazing!
reviews.text: 1000% recommend this center to anyone interested in diving in Dahab. Captain Ahmed El Far and his crew make sure every single diver walks out of their dive confident in what they learned and practiced that day. The crew has a great amount of experience and knows the ins and outs of Dahab like the back of their hand. You can ask them all the questions imaginable and they will have an answer or story. Safety is their top priority, so they will make sure you have all the proper gear, knowledge, and confidence with each dive.The are extremely kind and invested in making sure each diver is satisfied with their experience. I am so happy I chose this place to do my Advanced Certification over other options because the amazing people we met, the amount I learned and retained, and the dives we did that I will remember for a lifetime. Can’t recommend this diving center enough!

reviews.title: Nir
reviews.text: This diving center is the best diving center at Dahab! I recommend this place! The instructors are the best!!!!

reviews.title: Highly recommended dive center
reviews.text:
A really great diving center. The staff is professional and very friendly, equipment and gear in excellent condition. 
The dive center is located at the Daniela Hotel, but is separate from it. Great facilities and very organized. 
Highly recommended.

reviews.title: Fantastic diving experience with people feeling like friends
reviews.text: We came with no precise plans and met by chance the first evening Mariam in front of the diving school. The next day we started. The inscription was easy done, everybody was more than friendly giving you the feeling of belonging there and having friends. The diving was just divine and Mariam is the best diver teacher ever. Equipment was great, the place so quiet and non turistic. We had a very happy vacation and will be definitely back soon. h

reviews.title: Don't miss this place
reviews.text:
My home in Dahab. I can't tell how many times I've been there; just a perfect place for a relaxing vacation with diving.

The staff are very kind, the location is the best for diving, and the diving instructors are very professional.

reviews.title: The place to stay
reviews.text:
We've spent two holidays at the Daniella and coming back soon again.
This is definatly the top place for a holiday and also for diving.
The service , the beach, the pool the owner the diving the desert trips and the atmosphere make it perfect for your Sinai holday.

reviews.title: Een prima duikershotel, met zoet- en met zoutwaterzwembad
reviews.text: We had a great time. The diving is excellent .  The dive guides did an excellent job giving us wat we wanted. The Daniela Village is wonderful. Fresh- and saltwater pool. Good snrokling on the house reef. Frendly and customer focused personell. We will come again!

reviews.title: A warm welcome home by the nicest staff and crew in Egypt
reviews.text:
After 8 years we decided to go back to Daniela Village. Nothing's changed over there and to my opinion, that's a good thing. You don't go to Daniela if you're demanding full-on luxury. You go there because the people who work there still remember you and do their very best to make you feel at home. Hagag, Karim, the big chef and his brother, our taxi driver and his two sons, Saleh and all I may have forgotten, guys, you make this place a feast for us.
So for diving purposes, just a few minutes away from the best Red Sea diving spots, Daniela is a must!

reviews.title: Excellent stay
reviews.text:
Daniella resort is perhaps the best beach resort I have been to. Very calm, serene and away from the hustle of the main town. Rooms were very good and spacious. Good swimming pool with a small bar on its side. They have a large private beach area full of beach chairs lounges, thatched huts, swings etc. by the beach. Great service from the staff. they arranged transport to and from the main dahab town. 
Very relaxing atmosphere. They provide good breakfast and have a dinner buffet which are very good. Spent 4 days which I felt was too less. will definitely be back again.

location.address: Daniela Hotel, Blue Hole rd, Dahab 46617 Egypt

reviews.title: Snorkeling fun
reviews.text:
We went to rent snorkeling equipment, and we got full professional treatment (flexibility, friendly staff, possibility to take shower and rest in their lounge after) and a good price.
Also there is a ciral reef just in front of them, lot to see! 😉

reviews.title: A diving must!
reviews.text: Amazing diving experience! We did the beginner diving class with two very professional instructors Wassim and Selim. The diving center is very professional and they did an amazing job teaching us the proper instructions in advance. They went over and above under the sea to give us the best possible experience, diving depth, exploring the underwater world and the location itself is excellent. The price is very reasonable compared to the quality, experience, and hygiene. Totally recommended diving center in Dahab!

reviews.title: Friendly staff, easy diving
reviews.text:
Awesome diving center, highly recommended! Equipment and facility feels fresh and easy to use. 

Only bad thing was we never got to see a turtle :(

reviews.title: Dahab trip
reviews.text: Best place to dive just infront of the dive center, is buatyfull home reef, very friendly staff and good equipment in dc made my Holidays even better, all day diving on different dive sites make it really amazing, we had luck to see sea horse, giant muray, napoleon fish, turtle and more, this area has lot off life underwater

reviews.title: Feeling like by friends
reviews.text: Lighthouse is our favourite diving center. If you want to feel, thats someone really cares like your friend, go there. Staff in diving center is really nice and they have respect to divers as well as to nature. The restaurant is also very good with great service. You enjoy staing there, because you dont have to care about anything else.

reviews.title: Great liveaboard trip (Egypt Deep South with Lighthouse-1 boat)
reviews.text: Great choice of diving spots (most days 4 dives a day), good briefing on a flat TV, comfortable cabin and a nice clean boat, good food.

reviews.title: Best fresh juices
reviews.text: I can't say for other things there because we were just snorkeling there but their mango juice is best in the world.

reviews.title: The Best Fresh Juice I found so Far
reviews.text:
This a Dive-centre and a restaurant; I only eat there.

I have visited Dahab many times and drunk many fresh juices, but this is the best so far.  I drink Mango juice there on several occasions, across several days and it is still my favourite.  It was so chilled that it had ice particles.  The burger was very good as well.

Highly, highly recommended!

reviews.title: Best dive guides ever!
reviews.text: We had a really nice time here! Balu is a wonderful guide. Relaxed atmosphere, possibility for boat dives to the south of Dahab where you can not come by car, best site for me was Gabr el Bint, north part. Just amazing sealife! And Mohammed makes you a great mojito!

reviews.title: best place in dahab to rent equipment
reviews.text:
I had been there to rent snorkeling equipment for my first time ever and it was amazing . the people are really friendly and tell you everything . the place is jut in front of the light house coral reef and its a nice place for snorkeling  . 
I enjoyed it so much and I hope you all the same

subcategory_ranking: #69 of 122 Tours in Dahab
ranking: #69 of 122 Tours in Dahab
description: Enjoy true Bedouin hospitality You'll have a wonderful, relaxed evening under the stars at a quiet mountain location close to Dahab, South Sinai. Held every Saturday, delicious, slow cooked meat is our speciality, especially fresh goat, cooked under the ground until it almost falls off the bone. We also offer beef and chicken, and vegetarians are catered for. Watch Bedouin bread being made, and drink sweet tea or bring your own alcohol. If you have any burning questions about Bedouin life, Mondi and Sofian will be happy to sit and chat with you. There's no rush - we'll pick you up at 5.30pm and take you back when everyone's ready to leave, usually around 10pm. If you would like to eat your dinner in an alternative location or go on one of our desert safaris we'd be happy to speak to you about your requirements. We look forward to providing you with a traditional Bedouin dinner and a memorable evening! Cost per person (including transport there and back): Goat: 250 EGP or €30 Beef: 200 EGP or €25 Chicken: 150 EGP or €20 Vegetarian: 100 EGP €15 Sleeping overnight and traditional breakfast in the morning: 100 EGP or €15 extra (bring your own tent or sleep under the stars on our mattresses). Prices include your choice of meat, vegetables, rice, salad, Bedouin bread, and tahina. The food is plentiful!

ranking_subcategory: #79 of 122 Tours in Dahab
subcategory_ranking: #79 of 122 Tours in Dahab
ranking: #79 of 122 Tours in Dahab
description:
Welcome to Sinai (Egypt)! 
--------------------------
"Sinai Bedouin Safari" is delighted to welcome you to the blessed and beautiful land of the Sinai peninsula. We invite you to discover the treasures of true deserts, surrounded by the stunningly azure-blue Red sea. The blue color of our special sea is caused by the combination of iron in our sands with salt in the sea. 

About Sinai:
-----------------
Sinai is located between the Gulf of Aqaba, the Suez canal and the Mediterranean Sea. The Sinai peninsula is approximately 380 kilometers long between the North and South coasts and 220 kilometers from West to East. There are 22 different Bedouin tribes living here. They are natives to this land for centuries.

About Dahab:
-------------------
Dahab is located on the Red Sea between Sharm-el-Sheikh to the South and Nuweiba to the North. Dahab is one of the most attractive beach resorts in South Sinai, Egypt. Its sea shore is covered with fine golden sand that might have given Dahab its Arabic name, "Gold".
Dahab is a real paradise for diving and snorkeling thanks to amazing underwater landscapes of the Red Sea. Dahab is also a well-known spot for kite- and windsurfing because it is located in the wind tunnel of the Gulf of Aqaba. 

Please feel welcome to join us in Sinai on a desert safari. 'Sinai Bedouin safari' offers trekking and camel trips around the scenic desert, 4x4 jeep safari, backpacking, the unique experience of a Bedouin dinner in the mountains, and rock climbing, to name a few of our activities- all led under the watchful eye. Of our expert and trustworthy guides. You are most welcome to discover secret Bedouin pathways with us.

Enjoy the miracles of the Red Sea by scuba diving, snorkeling, and boat trips.

Relish the water-and-wind delights with wind surfing and kite surfing. 'Sinai Bedouin Safari' can arrange your Accommodation and transportation to and from any airport or hotel in Egypt.

The duration of our trips is ranging from 1 to 12 days, so you can choose the most suitable kind of trip or safari for your holidays.

Just e-mail us and we will take care of the rest.

description: Hands of Dahab Community Market is a weekly market where, every Thursday between 2-6 pm, the talented hands of the Dahab Community show off their skills and wares. Ranging from delicious homemade foods, juices, soups and treats, to handcrafted jewellery and crystal creations, and livened up with kid's activities, live music and movies, here is something for everyone to enjoy!

name: Poseidon Watersports
location_string: Dahab, South Sinai, Red Sea and Sinai
description: Welcome to Poseidon Watersports. We belong to Poseidon Divers, a long established group of dive centres that were the first PADI Career Development Centres and PADI National Geographic Centres in Dahab.We offer a wide range of fun for the whole family to enjoy. From adrenaline rushing watersports activities like waterskiing and tubes to memorable snorkeling trips to Dahab’s most spectacular sites like Blue Hole and Napoleon Reef. We organize snorkeling trips by boat or by jeep on a daily basis. Experience Sinai like you never did before and join us on our full day snorkel safaris by boat or by camel! Our enthusiastic staff members are all qualified snorkel guides who guarantee you an unforgettable experience.We are located in the luxurious Le Meridien Resort & Spa. Feel free to join us no matter where you’re staying in Dahab. All our trips and activities include the transfer from and to your hotel.
